四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006145	Central Y-shaped metacarpal	中央Y形掌骨	A central Y-shaped metacarpal is the result of a partial fusion of two central metacarpals (i.e., metacarpals 2-4) of the hand, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Central Y-shaped metacarpals may be seen as a result of a central polydactyly with partial fusion of the duplicated metacarpal.	中央Y形掌骨是人的手两个中央掌骨（即，掌骨2-4）中，与在远端方向在Y指示的两个臂部分融合的结果。中部Y形掌骨可以被看作是一个中央趾与重复的掌骨部分融合的结果。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006146	Broad metacarpal epiphyses	掌骨骨骺变宽	Increased side-to-side width of the metacarpal epiphyses.	增加侧到另一侧的宽度掌骨骨骺。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006147	Progressive fusion 2nd-5th pip joints	进行性第2-5指间关节融合		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006149	Increased laxity of fingers	手指过度松弛		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006150	Swan neck-like deformities of the fingers	手指的天鹅颈样变形	A swan neck deformity describes a finger with a hyperextended PIP joint and a flexed DIP joint. The most common cause for a swan neck-like deformity is a disruption of the end of the extensor tendon. Conditions that loosen the PIP joint and allow it to hyperextend, for example conditions that weaken the volar plate, can produce a swan neck deformity of the finger. One example is rheumatoid arthritis. Another cause are conditions that tighten up the small (intrinsic) muscles of the hand and fingers, for example hand trauma or nerve disorders, such as cerebral palsy, Parkinson's disease, or stroke.	天鹅颈样变形所描述的是手指有过度伸展的PIP关节和弯曲的DIP关节。导致天鹅颈状变形最常见的原因是伸肌肌腱的末端的损坏。PIP关节松弛使手指能够过伸，例如掌板力量减弱，这些因素都可产生手指的天鹅颈变形。例如类风湿性关节炎。另一个原因是手和手指的小（内收）肌群挛缩，例如手外伤或神经疾病（如脑性麻痹、帕金森氏病或中风）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006152	Proximal symphalangism (hands)	近端指间关节粘连	The term proximal symphalangism refers to a bony fusion of the middle and proximal phalanges of the digits of the hand, in other words the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIJ) is missing which can be seen either on x-rays or as an absence of the proximal interphalangeal finger creases.	术语近侧symphalangism指的手的数字的中间和近端指骨的骨融合，换句话说近端指间关节（PIJ）是缺失的，可以看出无论是在X射线或作为不存在近端的指间手指折痕。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006193	Thimble-shaped middle phalanges of hand	手指顶中间指骨呈顶针形	The `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817) resembles a thimble, a small metal cap to protect the finger while sewing that has a broad (proximal) base and narrower top, whereby both base and top are flat.	手指中节指骨像顶针（缝纫时使用的一种小金属杯状物，它的开口较宽顶部窄，套在手指上用来保护手指，将针顶穿所缝制的物件）形状，而正常指骨的两端（底部和顶部）都是平的。

This results in gas exchange impairment leading to dyspnea and alveolar infiltrates.	肺泡与远端细支气管巨噬细胞内的表面活性物质样，高碘酸 - 席夫阳性脂蛋白样物质异常沉积。这导致了气体交换障碍，从而引起了呼吸困难和肺泡浸润性改变。

免疫系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0006521	Pulmonary lymphangiectasia	肺淋巴管扩张	Abnormal dilatation of the pulmonary lymphatic vessels. Lymphatic fluid in the lung is derived from normal leakage of fluid out of the blood capillaries in the lung. In pulmonary lymphangiectasia, the pulmonary lymphatics are not properly connected and become dilated with fluid.	肺淋巴管异常扩张。肺的淋巴液是从肺毛细血管中正常漏出产生的，在肺淋巴管扩张时，肺淋巴管的连接出现异常，导致扩张。

消化系统的异常	HP:0006554	Acute hepatic failure	急性肝功能衰竭	Hepatic failure refers to the inability of the liver to perform its normal synthetic and metabolic functions, which can result in coagulopathy and alteration in the mental status of a previously healthy individual. Hepatic failure is defined as acute if there is onset of encephalopathy within 8 weeks of the onset of symptoms in a patient with a previously healthy liver.	肝功能衰竭是指肝脏无法行使其正常的合成和代谢功能，这将导致凝血病和正常个体的精神状态的改变。若原先肝脏为正常的病人在肝功能衰竭症状发生8周内脑病发作，则为急性肝功能衰竭。

体壁的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0006579	Prolonged neonatal jaundice	新生儿黄疸期延长	Neonatal jaundice refers to a yellowing of the skin and other tissues of a newborn infant as a result of increased concentrations of bilirubin in the blood. Neonatal jaundice affects over half of all newborns to some extent in the first week of life. Prolonged neonatal jaundice is said to be present if the jaundice persists for longer than 14 days in term infants and 21 days in preterm infants.	新生儿黄疸是指新生儿皮肤或其他组织呈黄色，是血液中胆红素浓度升高所致。新生儿黄疸影响超过一半的一周大的新生儿。如果黄疸在足月儿持续超过14天，在早产儿持续超过21天则为新生儿黄疸期延长。

Congenital pseudarthrosis of the clavicle generally presents as a painless mass or swelling over the clavicle.	锁骨（对应于锁骨的两个主骨化中心）的两部分都通过一个纤维桥邻接与骨膜相连，和一个滑膜发展，导致与二分外观X线一个锁骨。锁骨先天性假关节一般表现为无痛性肿块或肿胀锁骨。

骨骼系统的异常	HP:0006611	Decreased number of sternal ossification centers	胸骨骨化中心数量减少	A less than normal number of sternal ossification centers. The sternum is initially formed from bilateral sternal plates that chondrify and begin to fuse with ribs at 10 weeks gestational age. Ossification starts in the manubrium and upper part of the sternal body at the 6th month, in the middle of the sternal body at the 7th month, in the lower part of the body during the 1st postnatal year and in the xiphoid process between years 5 and 18. The number of ossification centers vary up to six, and it is the ossification centers that are visualized by prenatal ultrasound. This term describes a reduction in the number of ossification centers compared with age-related norms.	一个不到正常数量的胸骨骨化中心。胸骨开始从双边胸骨板指chondrify，并开始与肋骨融合10周的胎龄形成。骨化开始在柄与胸骨上身在第6个月，在胸骨体的在第7个月的中间，在身体的下部在第一产后年和在之间年5和剑突

心血管系统的异常	HP:0006677	Prolonged QRS complex	QRS波群延长	Increased time for the complex comprised of the Q wave, R wave, and S wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).. In adults, normal values are 0.06 - 0.10 sec.	由心电图（EKG）测量所得的由Q波，R波和S波组成的复合波的时间过长，成年人的正常的数值是0.06 - 0.10秒。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0006679	Granulomatous coronary arteritis	肉芽肿性冠状动脉炎	Inflammation of the coronary arteries involving a granulomatous response, i.e., a non-specific inflammatory response involving granulomas, defined as a compact organized collection of mature mononuclear phagocytes including epithelioid and giant cells.	涉及肉芽肿反应的冠状动脉炎症，即涉及肉芽肿的非特异性炎症反应，肉芽肿定义为包括上皮状的细胞和巨细胞的成熟单核吞噬细胞紧凑有机聚集。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0006681	Absent atrioventricular node	房室结缺失	Absence of atrioventricular node，which is a small nodular mass of specialized muscle fibers located in the interatrial septum near the opening of the coronary sinus. It gives rise to the atrioventricular bundle of the conduction system of the heart. a section of nodal tissue that lies on the right side of the partition that divides the atria, near the bottom of the right atrium.	房室结是一小块结节性特化肌纤维，位于房间隔内，靠近冠状窦开口处，其功能是将心脏传导系统的冲动传给房室束。它的缺失即房室结缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0006682	Ventricular extrasystoles	室性早搏	Premature ventricular contractions (PVC) or ventricular extrasystoles are premature contractions of the heart that arise in response to an impulse in the ventricles rather than the normal impulse from the sinoatrial (SA) node.	室性早搏（PVC）或室性期外收缩是心脏响应了一个心室脉冲而不是从窦房（SA）结的正常脉冲从而提前收缩。

神经系统的异常	HP:0006929	Hypoglycemic encephalopathy	低血糖脑病	Brain damage related to a lowering of blood glucose below a critical level (around 30 mg/dl), which may lead to confusion, lethargy and delirium followed by seizures and coma. Prolonged hypoglycemia may lead to irreversible brain damage.	血糖低于临界水平（约30毫克/分升）相关的脑损害，可能导致意识模糊、嗜睡和谵妄，随后出现癫痫发作和昏迷。长期低血糖会导致不可逆的脑损害。

神经系统的异常	HP:0006937	Impaired distal tactile sensation	远端触觉感觉障碍	A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation) on the skin of the distal limbs. This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel's hair brush, by asking patients to say 'now' each time they feel the stimulus.	肢体远端皮肤触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。

神经系统的异常	HP:0006989	Dysplastic corpus callosum	胼胝体发育不全	Dysplasia and dysgenesis of the corpus callosum are nonspecific descriptions that imply defective development of the corpus callosum. The term dysplasia is applied when the morphology of the corpus callosum is altered as a congenital trait. For instance, the corpus callosum may be hump-shaped, kinked, or a striped corpus callosum that lacks an anatomically distinct genu and splenium.	胼胝体发育不全是胼胝体发育不良的非特异性描述。胼胝体的形态为先天性因素所致时使用此术语。例如，胼胝体可以是驼峰形的，弯曲的，或有条纹但缺乏解剖学上截然不同的膝部和压部。

神经系统的异常	HP:0007002	Motor axonal neuropathy	运动轴索性神经病	Progressive impairment of function of motor axons with muscle weakness, atrophy, and cramps. The deficits are length-dependent, meaning that muscles innervated by the longest nerves are affected first, so that for instance the arms are affected at a later age than the onset of deficits involving the lower leg.	进行性运动轴索功能障碍伴有肌无力、肌萎缩和痉挛。这种障碍是长度依赖性的，这意味着由最长的神经支配的肌肉首先受累，比如上肢的受累要晚于下肢。

The main symptoms are distractibility, impulsivity, hyperactivity, and often trouble organizing tasks and projects, difficulty going to sleep, and social problems from being aggressive, loud, or impatient.	注意缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）临床表现出现在2 - 3岁，或最晚一年级。主要症状是注意力涣散、冲动、多动、经常扰乱组织任务和项目、难以入睡，并且由于其进攻性、嘈乱、或耐心不足导致社会问题。

神经系统的异常	HP:0007164	Slowed slurred speech	慢而含混不清的语言		
神经系统的异常	HP:0007165	Periventricular gray matter heterotopia	脑室周围灰质异位	A form of gray matter heterotopia were the mislocalized gray matter is typically located periventricularly, also sometimes called subependymal heterotopia. Periventricular means beside the ventricles. This is by far the most common location for heterotopia. Subependymal heterotopia present in a wide array of variations. There can be a small single node or a large number of nodes, can exist on either or both sides of the brain at any point along the higher ventricle margins, can be small or large, single or multiple, and can form a small node or a large wavy or curved mass.	
神经系统的异常	HP:0007166	Paroxysmal dyskinesia	阵发性运动障碍	Episodic bouts of involuntary movements with dystonic, choreic, ballistic movements, or a combination thereof. There is no loss of consciousness during the attacks.	不自主运动的发作，表现为肌张力障碍、舞蹈病、芭蕾样动作或以上动作的综合。上述表现是无意识丧失

神经系统的异常	HP:0007270	Atypical absence seizures	非典型失神发作	Absence seizures characterized by insidious begin and end and often prolonged duration, accompanied by slow spike-wave discharges on EEG.	失神发作以突然的开始和结束为特点，往往时程延长，并伴有脑电图慢棘波放电。

头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0007285	Facial palsy secondary to cranial hyperostosis	面神经麻痹继发于颅脑骨质增生	Paralysis of the facial nerves on the basis of overgrowth of the cranial bones causing impingement upon the seventh cranial nerve.	颅骨过度生长导致第七颅神经受夹击，进而导致的面部神经麻痹。

神经系统的异常	HP:0007377	Abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials	体感诱发电位异常	An abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials (SSEP), i.e., of the electrical signals of sensation going from the body to the brain in response to a defined stimulus. Recording electrodes are placed over the scalp, spine, and peripheral nerves proximal to the stimulation site. Clinical studies generally use electrical stimulation of peripheral nerves to elicit potentials. SSEP testing determines whether peripheral sensory nerves are able to transmit sensory information like pain, temperature, and touch to the brain. Abnormal SSEPs can result from dysfunction at the level of the peripheral nerve, plexus, spinal root, spinal cord, brain stem, thalamocortical projections, or primary somatosensory cortex.	异常的体感诱发电位（SSEP），即躯体对特定刺激产生的传递到脑的电信号。记录电极放置在头皮、脊柱、和外周神经刺激部位的近端。临床研究一般采用外周神经电刺激引出电位波形。SSEP检测可以确定外周感觉神经是否能够向大脑传递感觉信息如疼痛、温度和触觉。SSEPs异常可定位于不同水平，如外周神经、神经丛、神经根、脊髓、脑干、丘脑皮层投射，或初级躯体感觉皮层。

体壁的异常	HP:0007475	Congenital bullous ichthyosiform erythroderma	先天性大疱性鱼鳞病样红皮病	An ichthyosiform abnormality of the skin that presents at birth or shortly thereafter with generalized, erythema, blistering, erosions, and peeling. In the subsequent months, erythema and blistering improves but patients go on to develop hyperkeratotic scaling that is especially prominent along the joint flexures, neck, hands and feet.	一种鱼鳞病样皮肤发育不良，表现为在出生时或出生后不久出现的广泛的红斑，水疱，糜烂，脱皮等异常表现。在随后的几个月，红斑和水泡改善，但同时会出现角化过度性鳞屑，尤其是关节屈曲部位、颈部以及手足部位。

体壁的异常	HP:0007479	Congenital nonbullous ichthyosiform erythroderma	鱼鳞病样红皮病(大疱型)、大疱性鱼鳞病样角化过度症、显性遗传性先天性鱼鳞病、表皮松解性角化过度鱼鳞病	The term collodion baby applies to newborns who appear to have an extra layer of skin (known as a collodion membrane) that has a collodion-like quality. It is a descriptive term, not a specific diagnosis or disorder (as such, it is a syndrome). Affected babies are born in a collodion membrane, a shiny waxy outer layer to the skin. This is shed 10-14 days after birth, revealing the main symptom of the disease, extensive scaling of the skin caused by hyperkeratosis. With increasing age, the scaling tends to be concentrated around joints in areas such as the groin, the armpits, the inside of the elbow and the neck. The scales often tile the skin and may resemble fish scales.	火棉胶样婴儿指新生儿皮肤表层附着类火胶棉样物质（称火胶棉层），这只是一个描述性术语（如综合征），而非特异性的诊断或疾病。患病婴儿出生时皮肤呈光泽蜡质外观，出生后10-14天皮肤表层大面积角化过度并发生脱落，是该病的一个特征。随着生长，皮肤脱屑主要在关节周围区域，如腹股沟、腋窝、肘窝、颈部。脱落的表层如瓦片状覆盖皮肤，似鱼鳞样外观。

The lesions generally occur symmetrically along the top of the foot and on the legs, appearing more rarely on the arms, forearms, palms, and soles, and even on the oral mucosa.	持久性豆状角化过度病（HLP），又名Flegel病，是一种角化不良性疾病，主要特征为针头大小的红色丘疹，刮除表面可见点状出血，不伴其他症状。皮疹一般对称性发生在足背、小腿，较罕见于上肢掌趾，口腔黏膜更少见。

Nonarteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy can be associated with flame hemorrhages on the swollen disc or nearby neuroretinal layer, and sometimes with nearby cotton-wool exudates.	急性病症特征为突然的视力丧失（通常发现在早晨），视神经乳头水肿发病时，视盘相关视野缺损。非动脉前部缺血性视神经病变可以与出血火焰对肿光盘或附近的视神经视网膜层相关联，并且有时与附近棉絮状渗出物。

眼睛的异常	HP:0007802	Granular corneal dystrophy	颗粒状角膜营养不良	The presence of central, fine, whitish granular lesions in the stroma of the cornea. This type of corneal dystrophy is usually asymptomatic and begins in childhood and shows a slow progression. Later in the course, the corneal epithelium and Bowman's layer may be affected. Histologically, the cornea shows a uniform deposition of hyaline material.	角膜的基质中央出现的细小，白浊粒状病变。这种类型的角膜营养不良的通常是无症状的，并且开始于儿童期，常伴有缓慢的进展。随着病变进展，角膜上皮和鲍曼氏层可能会受到影响。组织学上，角膜显示透明材料的均匀沉积。
眼睛的异常	HP:0007803	Monochromacy	全色盲	Complete color blindness, a complete inability to distinguish colors. Affected persons cannot perceive colors, but only shades of gray.	完全色盲，完全不能分辨颜色。受影响的人无法感知颜色，只有灰色阴影。

Thus, the maximum distance between the fissures is offset from, and medial to, the center point.	上眼睑呈向下的拱形，下眼睑呈向上的拱形，偏向内侧眼角，这使眼睑的裂开轮廓呈一种杏仁形状。因此，裂缝间的最大距离是从中心点偏移至靠内侧。

Although the opacities may be observed during fetal development and childhood, usually visual acuity is only mildly reduced until adulthood, when lens extraction is generally necessary.	蔚蓝白内障是一种'先天性白内障`（HP:0000519），晶状体周边部存在蓝色和白色不透明区，呈放射状排列。虽然混浊可发生于胎儿发育和儿童期，通常不影响视力，成年后如果影响视力，当行晶状体摘除。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0008321	Reduced factor X activity	X凝血因子活性降低	Reduced activity of `coagulation factor X` (PR:000007294). The extrinsic and intrinsic pathways converge at factor X (fX). The extrinsic pathway activates fX by means of d factor VII with its cofactor, tissue factor. The intrinsic pathway activates fX by means of the tenase complex (Ca2+ and factors VIIIa, IXa and X) on the surface of activated platelets. Factor Xa in turn activates prothrombin (factor II) to thrombin (factor IIa).	`凝血因子X`（PR:000007294）的活性减少。外在和内在的途径在凝血因子X（FX）会合。外源性途径通过D-因子VII及其辅助因子，组织因子激活FX。内在途径由活化的血小板的表面上的tenase复合物（Ca 2+和因子VIIIa，Ⅸa和X）的共同作用激活FX。 然后Xa因子激活凝血酶原（II因子）生成凝血酶（IIa因子）。

Normally, platelets adhere to collagen in the vascular subendothelium within seconds of injury via a receptor made up of glycoprotein Ia and IIa and GPVI and to vWF via receptor GPIb/IX/V. The adherent platelets then release granules that lead to platelet activation and aggregation.	凝血细胞粘附的异常。通常，在血管内皮下膜损伤数秒以内，血小板通过由糖蛋白Ⅰa和Ⅱa和GPVI构成的受体粘附于胶原蛋白，通过GPIb/ IX / V受体粘附于vWF因子。粘附的血小板然后释放颗粒，导致血小板激活和聚集。

耳朵的异常	HP:0008628	Abnormality of the stapes	镫骨异常	An abnormality of the `stapes` (FMA:52751), a stirrup-shaped ossicle in the middle ear.	在`镫骨`的异常（FMA: 52751），镫骨为中耳中的一个镫形小骨。
耳朵的异常	HP:0008629	Pulsatile tinnitus	搏动性耳鸣	Pulsatile tinnitus is generally classified a kind of objective tinnitus, meaning that it is not only audible to the patient but also to the examiner on auscultation of the auditory canal and/or of surrounding structures with use of an auscultation tube or stethoscope. Usually, pulsatile tinnitus is heard as a lower pitched thumping or booming, a rougher blowing sound which is coincidental with respiration, or as a clicking, higher pitched rhythmic sensation. Pulsatile tinnitus may be associated with vascular abnormalities such as arterioevenous shunts or glomus tumors or the jugular vein, arterial bruits related to a high-riding carotid artery (close to the auditory areas) or carotid stenosis, or venous abnormalities such as a dehiscent jugular bulb or to hypertension. Finally, in some patients, mechanical abnormalities such a spatulous eustachian tubes, palatomyoclonus (small spasms of muscles in the soft palate area), or idiopathic stapedial muscle spasm may represent the underlying cause of pulsatile tinnitus.	搏动性耳鸣通常被分类为客观性耳鸣，意味着不仅是病人可听及耳鸣声音，检查者应用听诊管或听诊器对耳道和/或其周围结构进行听诊时亦可听及。搏动性耳鸣一般为低的重击声或者隆隆声，粗糙的与呼吸一致的吹风声，或者为较高音调的有节奏感的敲击声。搏动性耳鸣可能与血管异常相关，如动静脉分流、颈静脉球体瘤，高位颈动脉（近听觉区域）相关的动脉杂音或颈动脉狭窄，或静脉异常如颈静脉球开裂或高血压。最后，在一些患者中，机械异常如咽鼓管扩张、腭肌阵挛（软腭区域肌肉小痉挛）或特发性镫骨肌痉挛也可能是搏动性耳鸣的根本原因。

These are the `anterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50028), the `middle cerebral artery` (FMA:50079), and the `posterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50583).	脑动脉的异常。供应大脑血流的脑动脉包括三支主要动脉及其分支。分别是`大脑前动脉`（FMA:50028），所述`大脑中动脉`（FMA:50079），以及`大脑后动脉`（FMA:50583）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009147	Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指末节指骨骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	位于第五手指的末节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009148	Small epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指末节指骨小骨骺	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于小手指的末节指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009149	Triangular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小指的末节指骨三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the little finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	小指末节指骨骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009150	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指近节指骨异常	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the little (5th) finger.	小手指的近节指骨异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009152	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the 5th finger	小指骨骺异常	Abnormality of one or all of the epiphyses of the proximal, middle, and distal phalanges of the 5th finger.	小指的近端、中间和远端指骨的一个或全部骨骺异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009153	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指近端指骨骨骺异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the fifth finger. This epiphysis is located on the proximal end of the phalanx.	小指的近节指骨骨骺异常，其骨骺位于指骨的近端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009154	Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小指的近节指骨三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the little finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	小指近节指骨的骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009155	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指近节指骨的锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the little finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	锥形外观手的小指近节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009157	Ivory epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指近节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the little finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化小指近节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009168	Bullet-shaped middle phalanx of the 5th finger	子弹形的小指中节指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the middle phalanx of the 5th finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第五手指的中间指骨受到影响。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009182	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 5th finger	小指三角形中节指骨	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 5th (little) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	小指的中节指骨呈三角形。三角指骨是受累指骨骨骺的典型结果。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009183	Joint contracture of the 5th finger	小指关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion in the 5th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 5th finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	关节运动在第五手指的慢性损失是由于非骨组织结构变化。第五手指的术语camptodactyly用于如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009184	Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger	小指的远端指间关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	第五手指的远端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009185	Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger	小手指的近端指间关节挛缩	Proximal interphalangeal (PIP) flexion deformity of the little finger. That is, the PIP joint of a little finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.	小指近端指间（PIP）屈曲畸形。即，小指的画中画关节弯曲（挠曲），不能被主动或被动地拉直。它因此是关节运动的慢性损失，由于肌肉的结构变化，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤，防止正常运动。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009186	Contracture of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 5th finger	小手指的掌指关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 5th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	第五手指的掌指关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009187	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指末节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009193	Pseudoepiphyses of the metacarpals	掌骨假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis. The normal metacarpal epiphyses are located at the distal ends of the metacarpal bones. Accessory epiphyses (which are also known as pseudoepiphyses) can also occasionally be observed at the proximal ends of the metacarpals, usually involving the 2nd metacarpal bone.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。正常掌骨骨骺位于该掌骨的远端。附件骨骺（其也被称为pseudoepiphyses）也偶尔会在掌骨的近端观察，通常涉及的第二掌骨。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009209	Ivory epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指中节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the little finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化的小指中节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009210	Pseudoepiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger	第五手指中节指骨假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009211	Small epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指中节指骨骨骺小	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于小手指的中间指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009212	Stippling of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger	小指中节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger.	小指中节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009213	Triangular epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger	小指中节指骨三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the little finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	小指中节指骨的骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009214	Absent epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨骨骺缺失	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指中节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009215	Bracket epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009216	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨的锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the ring finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	锥形外观手的无名指中节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009217	Enlarged epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	位于第4个手指中节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009218	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨骨骺碎裂	Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger.	第四手指中节指骨骨骺零散出现。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009219	Irregular epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	我们指中节指骨骨骺不规则	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指中节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009220	Ivory epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the ring finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化的无名指中节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009221	Pseudoepiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	第四手指中节指骨假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009222	Small epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨小骨骺	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于无名指的中间指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009223	Stippling of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指中节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009224	Triangular epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指中节指骨三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the ring finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	无名指中节指骨的骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009225	aplasia of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指近节指骨发育不全	Absence of the proximal phalanx of the little (5th) finger.	没有小（5日）手指的近节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009226	Short proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	第五手指近节指骨短	Absence or underdevelopment (hypoplasia) of the `proximal phalanx of the fifth finger` (FMA:23922).	缺席或第五finger`的`近节指骨不发达（发育不全）（FMA:23922）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009227	Broad proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小指近节指骨变宽	Increased width of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger.	增加的宽度第五手指的近节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009228	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	子弹形的小指近节指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第五手指的近端指骨受到影响。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009229	Curved proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指近节指骨弯曲	Curved appearance of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger.	第五手指的近节指骨弯曲外观。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009230	Osteolytic defects of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	第五手指近节指骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger.	解散或第五手指的近节指骨骨组织的退化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009231	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	第五手指近节指骨斑片状硬化	Patchy increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger.	片状增加第五手指的近端指骨骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009232	Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小指近节指关节粘连	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger with another bone.	小指近端指骨与其他骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009233	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指三角形近节指骨	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 5th (little) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	小手指的近节指骨呈三角形。三角形或所谓的三角形状的方阵是受影响的方阵支架骨骺后的典型结果。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009234	Symphalangism of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger with the 5th metatcarpal	小指近端指骨与第五掌骨指关节粘连	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger with the 5th metacarpal.	小指近端指骨与第5掌骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009236	Rhomboid or triangular shaped 5th finger proximal phalanx	第五手指近节指骨菱形或三角形	Rhomboid or triangular shaped 5th (little) finger proximal phalanx.	菱形或三角形形状的第5（略）指近节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009237	Short 5th finger	第5指发育不全或不发育	Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `fifth finger` (FMA:24949), also known as the little finger.	发育不全（先天性减小大小）的`第五finger`的（FMA:24949），也被称为小指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009238	aplasia of the 5th finger	小手指发育不全	Absent 5th (little) finger.	缺席第5（略）的手指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009239	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指的末节指骨发育不全或发育低下		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009240	Broad distal phalanx of the 5th finger	第五小手指末节指骨变宽	Increased width of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger.	增加的宽度第五手指的末节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009241	Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the 5th finger	子弹形的小指末节指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 5th finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第五手指的远端指骨受到影响。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009242	Osteolytic defects of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	第五手指末节指骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger.	解散或第五手指的末节指骨骨组织的退化。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009244	Distal/middle symphalangism of 5th finger	小指末节/中指关节粘连	Fusion of the terminal/distal and middle phalanges of the 5th finger.	融合第五手指的终端/远端和中间指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009245	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小指三角形末节指骨	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 5th (little) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	小指的末节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是受累指骨骨骺的典型结果。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009246	aplasia of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	小手指的末节指骨发育不全	Absence of the distal phalanx of the little (5th) finger.	没有小（5日）手指的末节指骨。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009249	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指的末节指骨骨骺异常

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009251	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指末节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009252	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指的末节指骨锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the ring finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009270	Stippling of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	无名指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009271	Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	我们指的近节指骨三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the ring finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	无名指的节指骨的骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009272	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 4th finger	无名指发育不全或发育低下	A small/hypoplastic or absent/aplastic 4th (ring) finger.	小/发育不全或缺如/再生障碍性4（圈）的手指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009273	Deviation of the 4th finger	无名指偏离	Displacement of the 4th finger from its normal position.	位移从它的正常位置的第四手指的。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009274	Joint contracture of the 4th finger	无名指关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion in the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 4th finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	关节运动的第四手指的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。的第四手指的术语camptodactyly用于如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009275	Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger	无名指的远端指间关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	的第四手指的远端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009276	Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger	无名指的近端指间关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. That is, the PIP joint of a fourth finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.	的第四手指的近端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。即，第四手指的画中画关节弯曲（挠曲），不能被主动或被动地拉直。它因此是关节运动的慢性损失，由于肌肉的结构变化，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤，防止正常运动。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009277	Contracture of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 4th finger	无名指的掌指关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	的第四手指的掌指关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。

This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	锥形外观手的3手指中节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009335	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指的末节指骨骨骺缺失	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.	中指的末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009336	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指的末节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009337	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指的末节指骨锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	锥形外观手的3手指的末节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009338	Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	位于第三手指的末节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009339	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨骨骺碎裂	Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.	第三个手指的末节指骨骨骺零散出现。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009340	Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨骨骺不规则	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.	中指的末节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009341	Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化症第三手指的末节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009342	Pseudoepiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	第三手指末节指骨假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009343	Small epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨小骨骺	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄依赖性规范，位于中指的末节指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009344	Stippling of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.	中指末节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	中指的末节指骨骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。

The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	锥体形外观手的第三手指的骨骺，产生一个“球在一个插座'的出现。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的前端。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009414	Fragmentation of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger	中指骨骺碎裂	Fragmented appearance of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger.	第三个手指骨骺零散出现。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009415	Irregular epiphyses of the 3rd finger	中指骨骺不规则	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger.	第三个手指骨骺不规则放射透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009416	Ivory epiphyses of the 3rd finger	中指乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化的第三手指的骨骺，导致的射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）在X射线的程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009417	Pseudoepiphyses of the 3rd finger	第3指假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009418	Small epiphyses of the 3rd finger	中指的小骨骺	Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄相关的标准，中指骨骺尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009419	Stippling of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger	中指骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the 3rd finger.	中指骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009420	Triangular epiphyses of the 3rd finger	中指三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger of the hand.	中指的骨骺呈三角形外观。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009421	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指的末节指骨发育不全或发育低下		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009422	Broad distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指末节指骨变宽	Increased width of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.	增加的宽度第三手指的末节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009423	Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	子弹形的中指末节指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第三手指的指骨受到影响。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009424	Osteolytic defects of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	第三手指末节指骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.	解散或第三手指的末节指骨骨组织的退化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009425	Patchy sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	第三手指末节指骨斑片状硬化	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the distal phalanx of the third finger.	不均匀的（不规则）增加第三个手指的末节指骨骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009426	Distal/middle symphalangism of 3rd finger	中指末节/中节指骨粘连	Fusion of the terminal/distal and middle phalanges of the 3rd finger.	融合第三手指的终端/远端和中间指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009427	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 3rd finger	中指三角形末节指骨	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 3rd (middle) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	中指的末节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是受指骨骨骺受累后的典型结果。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009490	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the 2nd finger	食指的锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	锥体形外观手的第二手指的骨骺，产生一个“球在一个插座'的出现。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的前端。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009493	Irregular epiphyses of the 2nd finger	食指骨骺不规则	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.	第二个手指骨骺不规则放射透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009494	Ivory epiphyses of the 2nd finger	食指乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化的第二手指的骨骺，导致的射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）在X射线的程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009495	Pseudoepiphyses of the 2nd finger	第2指假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009496	Small epiphyses of the 2nd finger	食指的小骨骺	Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄相关的标准，食指骨骺尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009497	Stippling of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger	食指骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.	食指骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009498	Triangular epiphyses of the 2nd finger	食指三角骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger of the hand.	食指的骨骺呈三角形外观。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009499	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指的末节指骨骨骺异常		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009500	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指中节指骨骨骺异常		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009501	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食手指近端指骨骨骺异常		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009502	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger de la mano	第二手指的末节指骨骨骺缺失	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	食指的末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009503	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指的末节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009504	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指的末节指骨锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	锥形外观手的第二手指的末节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009505	Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指末节指骨骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	位于第2个手指的末节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009506	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指末节指骨骨骺碎裂	Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	第二个手指的末节指骨骨骺零散出现。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009507	Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指末节指骨骨骺不规则	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	食指的末节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009508	Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指末节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化第二手指的末节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009509	Pseudoepiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	第二手指末节指骨假骺	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009511	Stippling of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指末节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	食指末节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	食指的末节指骨骨骺呈三角形外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。

结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009537	Flexion contracture of the 2nd finger	食指屈曲挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion in the 2nd finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 2nd finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	关节运动的第二手指的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。所述第二手指的术语camptodactyly用于如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009538	Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 2nd finger	食指的远端指间关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 2nd finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	所述第二手指的远端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。

头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0009553	Abnormality of the hairline	发际线异常	The hairline refers to the outline of `hair of the head` (FMA:54241). An abnormality of the hairline can refer to an unusually low or high border between areas of the scalp with and without hair or to abnormal projections of scalp hair.	发际线是指头发的轮廓边界。发际线的异常可以指在头皮长毛发和不长毛发的区域之间的边界不寻常的低或高，也可指头皮毛发异常生长。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0009554	Projection of scalp hair onto lateral cheek	脸颊边头发	An tongue-like extension of hair towards the cheeks.	朝脸颊延伸的舌状毛发部分。

Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第二手指的指骨受到影响。

Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第二手指的中间指骨受到影响。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009573	Patchy sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	第二手指中节指骨斑片状硬化	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the middle phalanx of the second finger.	不均匀的（不规则）增加第二手指的中间指骨骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009574	Symphalangism of middle phalanx of 2nd finger	食指中节指关节粘连	Fusion of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger with another bone.	食指中节指骨与其他骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009575	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指三角形中节指骨	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 2nd finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	食指的中节指骨呈三角形。三角指骨是受累指骨骨骺的典型结果。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009576	Absent middle phalanx of 2nd finger	食指中节指骨缺失	Absence of the middle phalanx of the index (2nd) finger.	缺席的索引（2日）手指中节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009577	Short middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	第2指中节指骨短	Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `middle phalanx of the second finger` (FMA:23933), also known as the index finger.	发育不全（先天性减小大小）第二finger`的`中间指骨（FMA:23933），也被称为食指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009579	Proximal/middle symphalangism of the 2nd finger	第二手指近关节和中关节指关节粘连	Fusion of the proximal and middle phalanges of the 2nd finger.	融合第二手指的近端和中间趾骨的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009580	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指的近节指骨发育不全或发育低下		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009581	Broad proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指近节指骨变宽	Increased width of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	增加的宽度第二手指的近节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009582	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	子弹形的食指近节指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第二手指的近端指骨受到影响。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009583	Curved proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指近节指骨弯曲	Curved appearance of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	第二个手指的近节指骨弯曲外观。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009584	Osteolytic defects of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	第二个手指的近节指骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger.	解散或第二手指的近节指骨骨组织的退化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009585	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	第二个手指的近节指骨斑片状硬化	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the second finger.	不均匀的（不规则）增加第二手指的近端指骨骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009586	Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指的近节指关节粘连	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger with another bone.	食指近端指骨与其他骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009587	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指三角形近节指骨	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	食指近节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是指骨骨骺受累后的典型结果。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;耳朵的异常	HP:0009588	Vestibular Schwannoma	前庭神经鞘瘤	A vestibular Schwannoma (also known as acoustic neuroma, acoustic neurinoma, or acoustic neurilemoma) is a benign, usually slow-growing tumor that develops from the VIIIth cranial nerve supplying the inner ear.	前庭神经鞘瘤（也称为听神经瘤，听神经鞘瘤，或听神经鞘瘤）是良性的，通常是生长缓慢的肿瘤，起源于支配内耳的第八对颅神经。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;耳朵的异常	HP:0009589	Bilateral vestibular Schwannoma	双侧前庭神经鞘瘤	A bilateral vestibular Schwannoma (acoustic neurinoma).	双侧前庭神经鞘瘤（听神经瘤）。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;耳朵的异常	HP:0009590	Unilateral vestibular Schwannoma	单侧前庭神经鞘瘤	A unilateral vestibular Schwannoma (acoustic neurinoma).	单侧的前庭神经鞘瘤（听神经瘤）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0009591	Abnormality of the vestibulocochlear nerve	前庭耳蜗神经异常	Abnormality of the `vestibulocochlear nerve` (FMA:50869), the eighth cranial nerve, which is involved in transmitting sound and equilibrium information from the inner ear to the brain.	`前庭耳蜗神经`（FMA:50869）的异常，此神经是对第八对颅神经，它从内耳传送声音和平衡信息到大脑。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤	HP:0009592	Astrocytoma	星形细胞瘤	Astrocytoma is a neoplasm of the central nervous system derived from astrocytes. Astrocytes are a type of glial cell, and thus astrocytoma is a subtype of `glioma` (HP:0009733).	星形细胞瘤是从星形胶质细胞分化的一种中枢神经系统肿瘤。星形胶质细胞是一种类型的神经胶质细胞，因而星形细胞瘤是`胶质瘤`（HP:0009733）的亚型。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;体壁的异常	HP:0009593	Peripheral Schwannoma	周围神经鞘瘤	The presence of a `peripheral` (PATO:0002107) `schwannoma` (MPATH:438).	一个`peripheral`的存在（PATO:0002107）`schwannoma`（的mpath:438）。
眼睛的异常;肿瘤;头或颈部的异常	HP:0009594	Retinal hamartoma	视网膜错构瘤	A hamartoma (a benign, focal malformation consisting of a disorganized mixture of cells and tissues) of the retina.	视网膜上的错构瘤（良性，局部畸形，包括细胞和组织的混合物）。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;体壁的异常	HP:0009595	Occasional neurofibromas	偶发的神经纤维瘤	Neurofibromas present in a smaller number than usually seen in neurofibromatosis type 1.	发生率较小的神经纤维瘤，多存在于1型神经纤维瘤

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009598	Symphalangism of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger with the 2nd metatcarpal Symphalangism	食指的近端指骨与第二掌骨关节粘连	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger with the 2nd metacarpal.	食指近端指骨与第二掌骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009599	Abnormality of thumb epiphysis	拇指骨骺异常	Abnormality of one or all of the epiphyses of the proximal, and distal phalanges of the thumb and/or the 1st metacarpal.	一个或全部拇指指骨和/或第一掌骨近端和远端指骨的骨骺异常。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009600	Flexion contracture of thumb	拇指屈曲挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion in the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	关节运动拇指慢性损失是由于非骨组织结构变化。术语camptodactyly用于如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009601	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the thumb	拇指发育不全或发育低下	Hypoplastic/small or absent `thumb`(FMA:24938).	发育不全/小或无'thumb`（FMA:24938）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009602	Abnormality of thumb phalanx	拇指指骨异常	A structural anomaly of one or more phalanges of the thumb.	拇指的一个或多个指骨的结构异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009603	Deviation/Displacement of the thumb	拇指偏离/移位	Displacement of the thumb from its normal position.	排量从正常位置的拇指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009606	Complete duplication of distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨的完全重复	Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. On x-ray two separate bones appear side to side.	拇指末节指骨完全重复。 X射线两个独立的骨骼出现一边到另一边。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009608	Complete duplication of proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨的完全重复	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. On x-ray two separate bones appear side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨的完全重复。 X射线两个独立的骨骼出现一边到另一边。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009609	Duplication of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨重复	Partail or complete duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	Partail或`第一掌骨bone`的完全复制（FMA:23899）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009611	Bifid distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨骨裂	Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones.	拇指末节指骨部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）的两个骨头的部分熔合外观变化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009612	Duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨重复	Complete or partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side.	拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）各不相同，这两个骨头的部分熔合外观，或两个单独的骨骼出现一边到另一边。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009613	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨重复	Complete or partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）各不相同，这两个骨头的部分熔合外观，或两个单独的骨骼出现一边到另一边。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009614	Bifid proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨裂	This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is partially duplicated. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	该术语的情况发生在拇指近节指骨部分复制。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）的两个骨头的部分熔合外观变化。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009615	Complete duplication of the first metacarpal	第一掌骨的完全重复	Complete duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	在`第一掌骨bone`的完全复制（FMA:23899）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009616	Bifid first metacarpal	第一掌骨骨裂	Partial duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	在`第一掌骨bone`的部分重复（FMA:23899）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009617	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨异常	Any anomaly of the `distal phalanx of thumb` (FMA:23945).	拇趾的末节的任何异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009618	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨畸形	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	与其他手指的近端趾骨不同，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其它指骨的中间指骨，而第一掌骨来源于胚胎学上的指骨，相当于其他手指的近端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009622	Distally placed thumb	拇指远置	Insertion of thumb at a more distal location than normal.	拇指插入在更末端的位置比正常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009623	Proximal placement of thumb	拇指近置	`Proximal mislocalization` (PATO:0002179) of the `thumb` (FMA:24938).	`近端mislocalization`（PATO:0002179）的`thumb`的（FMA:24938）。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009624	Contractures of the carpometacarpal joint of the thumb	拇指腕掌关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the carpometacarpal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is formed by the first metacarpal and the trapezial bone and is also called Articulatio carpometacarpalis pollicis, carpometacarpal articulation of thumb, carpometacarpal joint of thumb or first carpometacarpal articulation. Seldom referred to as thumb saddle joint.	拇指腕掌关节的关节运动的慢性损失是由于非骨组织结构变化。这一联合由第一掌骨和trapezial骨形成，并且也被称为Articulatio carpometacarpalis拇，拇指的腕掌关节，拇指或第一腕掌关节运动的腕掌关节。很少被称为拇指鞍状关节。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009625	Contractures of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the thumb	拇指掌指关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is also called Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis.	拇指掌指关节的关节运动的慢性损失是由于非骨组织结构变化。这家合资也被称为Articulatio metacarpophalangealis拇。
结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009626	Contractures of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb	拇指指间关节挛缩	Chronic loss of joint motion of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is also called Articulatio interphalangealis pollicis.	拇指指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失是由于非骨组织结构变化。这家合资也被称为Articulatio interphalangealis拇。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009629	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨发育不全或发育低下	This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is either small/hypoplastic or absent. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	该术语的情况发生在拇指近节指骨要么是小/发育不全或缺如。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009630	Broad proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨变宽	Increased width of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	增加的宽度拇指近节指骨。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009631	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb	子弹形的近节拇指指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009632	Curved proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	从拇指近节指骨的正常直线形状的偏差。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009633	Osteolytic defect of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨的溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	解散或拇指近节指骨骨组织的退化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009634	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨的斑片状硬化	An uneven increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	的不均匀增加拇指的近端指骨骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009635	Synostosis of thumb phalanx	拇指指骨骨性连合	Fusion of a phalanx of the thumb with another bone.	拇指的指骨与其他骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009636	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指三角形近节指骨	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨呈三角形。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009637	Absent proximal phalanx of thumb	拇指近节指骨缺如	Absence of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	缺席拇指近节指骨。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009638	Short proximal phalanx of thumb	拇指近节指骨缩短	Hypoplastic (short) `proximal phalanx of the thumb` (FMA:23918). In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	发育不全（短）的thumb`的`近节指骨（FMA:23918）。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009640	Synostosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with the 1st metatcarpal	拇指近节指骨与第一掌骨骨性连合	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with the 1st metacarpal.	拇指近端指骨与第一掌骨融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009641	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨发育不全或发育低下		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009642	Broad distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指远节指骨增宽	Increased width of the `distal phalanx of thumb` (FMA:23945).	增加的宽度thumb`的`末节指骨（FMA:23945）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009643	Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the thumb	子弹形的拇指末节趾骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the thumb is affected.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果拇指的远端指骨受到影响。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009644	Curved distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	从拇指的末节指骨的正常直线形状的偏差。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009645	Osteolytic defect of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	解散或拇指末节指骨骨组织的退化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009646	Patchy sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨斑片状硬化	An uneven increase in bone density of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	的不均匀增加拇指的远端指骨的骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009648	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指三角形末节指骨	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the thumb. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	拇指末节指骨呈三角形。三角指骨是受累指骨骨骺的典型结果。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009649	aplasia of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨发育不全	Absence of the distal/terminal phalanx of the thumb.	缺席拇指远端/终端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009650	Short distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指远节指骨缩短	Hypoplastic (short) `distal phalanx of the thumb` (FMA:23945).	发育不全（短）的thumb`的`远节指骨（FMA:23945）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009652	Bullet-shaped thumb phalanx	子弹形的脚拇指趾骨	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the thumb, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	的拇指的一个或多个趾骨，用短而宽方阵其逐渐变细的远侧形态异常。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009653	Curved thumb phalanx	拇指指骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight shape of a thumb phalanx.	从拇指指骨的正常直线形状的偏差。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009654	Osteolytic defect of thumb phalanx	拇指指骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of one or more phalanges of the thumb.	溶解或拇指的一个或多个指骨骨骼组织的变性。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009655	Patchy sclerosis of thumb phalanx	拇指指骨斑片状硬化	An uneven increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the thumb.	的不均匀增加一个或多个拇指的指骨的骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009656	Symphalangism of the thumb	拇指指关节粘连	Congenital fusion (ankylosis) of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb.	拇指指间关节先天性融合（强直）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009657	Triangular shaped thumb phalanx	拇指三角形指骨	Abnormal shape of one or more phalanges of the thumb such that affected phalanges resemble a triangle.	拇指的一个或多个指骨形状异常，使得受累的指骨类似于一个三角形。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009658	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the thumb	拇指指骨发育不全或发育低下		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009659	Partial absence of thumb	拇指部分缺失	The absence of a phalangeal segment of a thumb.	缺少一个拇指的指骨段。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009660	Short phalanx of the thumb	拇指指骨短	Hypoplastic (short) `thumb phalanx` (FMA:35477).	发育不全（短）`拇指phalanx`（FMA:35477）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009662	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨骨骺异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb. This epiphysis is located on the proximal end of the phalanx.	拇指末节指骨骨骺异常，其骨骺位于指骨的近端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009663	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺异常	This term applies if the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, which is located at the proximal end of the phalanx, does not appear in concordance with gender and age dependant norms as seen on x-rays. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	本术语适用于拇指近节指骨骨骺的X光片上出现的形态异常，它位于指骨的近端，其正常形态与性别和年龄相关。与食指至小指的近端指骨不同，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它中指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他手指的近端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009664	Absent epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺缺失	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。与食指至小指的近端指骨不同，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其它手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他指骨的近端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009665	Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009666	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨的锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	锥形外观手的拇指的中节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009667	Enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	位于拇指近节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009668	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺碎裂	Epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb having multiple bony fragments.	骨骺具有多个骨碎片拇指近节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009669	Irregular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺不规则	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009670	Ivory epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化拇指近节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009671	Pseudoepiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨假骺	A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	一个pseudoepiphysis（这是一个二次骨化中心从正常的骨骺不同）拇指近节指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009672	Small epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺小	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄依赖的骨骺的大小标准，拇指近端指骨的近侧相骨骺异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009673	Stippling of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。与第二至五指的近端指骨不同，在胚胎学上拇指的近端指骨相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨则来源于指骨，相当于其他手指的近端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009674	Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	拇指近节指骨三角形骨骺	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺的呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常是几乎是持平。与第二至五手指的指骨近端趾相比，拇指的近端指骨是在胚胎学上相当于其它指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨来源于胚胎学的指骨，因此相当于其他手指的近端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009675	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨骨骺缺失	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009676	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨支架样骨骺	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009677	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	锥形外观手的拇指末节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009681	Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化拇指末节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009684	Stippling of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	拇指末节指骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.	拇指末节指骨的骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009686	Absent epiphyses of the thumb	拇指骨骺缺失	Absence of one or more epiphyses of the thumb.	拇指的一个或多个指骨骨骺缺失。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009687	Bracket epiphyses of the thumb	拇指支架样骨骺	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	托架骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有托架状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009688	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the thumb	拇指锥形骨骺	pearance of the epiphyses of the thumb, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	锥形外观拇指的骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的前端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009689	Enlarged thumb epiphysis	拇指骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.	拇指骨骺异常大尺寸相对于年龄相关的规范。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009690	Fragmentation of thumb epiphysis	拇指骨骺碎裂	Epiphysis of the thumb having multiple bony fragments.	骨骺具有多个骨碎片拇指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009691	Irregular thumb epiphysis	拇指骨骺不规则	Uneven radiographic opacity of the one or more epiphyses of the thumb.	拇指的一个或多个骨骺不均匀影像学不透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009692	Ivory epiphysis of the thumb	拇指骨乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of one or more of the epiphyses of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化一个拇指的骨骺或更多，导致射线不透性（白色或者象牙色的外观）的X射线的程度增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009693	Pseudoepiphysis of the thumb	拇指假骺	A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of one or more phalanges of the thumb.	甲pseudoepiphysis（它是仲骨化中心不同于正常骨骺）的拇指的一个或多个指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009694	Small thumb epiphysis	拇指骨骺小	Abnormally small size of one or more of the epiphyses of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄依赖的骨骺的大小，拇指的一个或数个指骨骨骺异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009695	Stippling of thumb epiphysis	拇指骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in one or more of the epiphyses of the thumb.	拇指一个或多个指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009699	Osteolytic defects of the hand bones	手部骨骼的溶骨性缺陷		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009700	Synostosis involving bones of the fingers	累及手指骨头的骨性连合	An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the fingers. The synonymous term "symphalangism of the hand" may be translated as fusions of bones of varying digree, that involve at least one phalangeal bone of the hand. If bony fusions are revered to as "Symphalangism" the fusion occurs in a proximo-distal axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a radio-ulnar axis are refered to as "bony" Syndactyly.	手指的骨骼或部分骨骼之间的不正常连合。同义词“手关节粘连”可被翻译为不同程度的骨性融合，至少要累及手的一个指骨。如果要将骨性融合叫作“关节粘连”，融合应该发生在近-远轴。发生在桡-尺轴的手指骨头融合称为“骨性”并指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009701	Metacarpal synostosis	掌骨骨性联合	Fusion involving two or more metacarpal bones (A synostosis of the first metacarpal and the proximal phalanx of the thumb can also be observed, note that the first metacarpal bone corresponds to a proximal phalanx).	融合涉及两个或两个以上掌骨（第一掌骨的骨性愈合和拇指近节指骨，还可以观察，注意，第一掌骨相当于近节指骨）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009702	Carpal synostosis	腕骨骨性融合	Synostosis (bony fusion) involving one or more bones of the carpus (scaphoid, lunate, triquetrum, trapezium, trapezoid, capitate, hamate, pisiform).	骨性愈合（骨性融合）涉及的腕骨（舟骨，月骨，三角骨，梯形，梯形，花序，钩骨，豌豆）的一个或多个骨骼。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009703	Synostosis involving the 1st metacarpal	累及第一掌骨的骨性连合	Fusion of the 1st metacarpal with another bone. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2 to 5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨与其他骨连合。与第二至五手指的近端指骨不同，拇指的近端指骨是在胚胎学上相当于其它手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学的指骨，因此相当于其他手指的近端指骨。
神经系统的异常	HP:0009704	Chronic CSF lymphocytosis	慢性脑脊髓液淋巴细胞增多	Chronic cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) lymphocytosis is defined as the finding, in at least two serial CSF examinations, of more than 5 cells per cubic millimeter.	慢性脑脊髓液（CSF）淋巴细胞增多被定义为在至少两个连续的脑脊液检查中，每立方毫米细胞数多于5个。

神经系统的异常;眼睛的异常;肿瘤;头或颈部的异常;心血管系统的异常	HP:0009711	Retinal hemangioblastoma	视网膜血管母细胞瘤	Retinal hemangioblastoma is a benign vascular tumor of the retina without any neoplastic characteristics. They have been called "retinal angiomas" and "retinal hemangiomas" but hemangioblastoma is the preferred term since they are histologically identical to lesions found in the CNS.	视网膜血管母细胞瘤是视网膜良性血管瘤，没有任何瘤形成特性。他们被称为“视网膜血管瘤”和“视网膜血管瘤”，但血管母细胞瘤是首选的术语，因为它们在组织学上相同的病变在中枢神经系统中。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤	HP:0009713	Spinal hemangioblastoma	脊髓血管母细胞瘤	A 'hemangioblastoma` (HP:0010797) of the `spinal cord` (FMA:7647).	位于`脊髓的（FMA:7647）:血管母细胞瘤（0010797 HP）。

神经系统的异常;肿瘤	HP:0009716	Subependymal nodules	室管膜下结节	Small nodular masses which originate in the subependymal region of the lateral ventricles and protrude into the ventricular cavity. They may represent subependymal hamartomas of tuberous sclerosis or nodular heterotopia of grey matter.	小结节性肿物发源于侧脑室室管膜下区并突入脑室腔。它们可能代表结节性硬化症的室管膜下错构瘤或灰质的结节样异位。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤	HP:0009717	Cortical tubers	皮质结节	Cortical tubers in the brain are hamartomatous lesions typically located at the gray-white matter interface, commonly in the frontal and parietal lobes. Cortical tubers are composed of abnormal glial and neural cells, and the size, number, and location vary among patients.	大脑皮质结节是错构瘤性病变，典型病灶位于灰白质交界区，通常位于额叶和顶叶。皮质结节由异常的神经胶质和神经细胞组成，不同患者中皮质结节的大小，数量，和位置差异很大。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤	HP:0009718	Subependymal giant-cell astrocytoma	室管膜下巨细胞星形细胞瘤	A demarcated, largely intraventricular tumor in the region of the foramen of Monro composed of spindle to large plump or ganglion-like cells with eosinophilic to amphophilic cytoplasm and somewhat pleomorphic nuclei with occasional prominent nucleoli. These tumors are almost always associated with tuberous sclerosis.	界限清楚的、主要位于脑室内Moron孔区的肿瘤，主要由纺锤形、大而饱满或神经节细胞样嗜酸性或嗜两性细胞质并且有少许多形核，偶见显著的核仁。这些肿瘤几乎总是与结节性硬化相关。
体壁的异常	HP:0009719	Hypomelanotic macules	色素脱失斑	Hypomelanotic macules ("ash leaf spots") are white or lighter patches of skin that may appear anywhere on the body and are caused by a lack of melanin. White ash leaf-shaped macules are considered to be characteristic of tuberous sclerosis.	色素脱失斑（”灰叶斑”）是因皮肤色素减退或脱失造成的白色、浅色的斑片，可发生于全身任何部位。灰白树叶形色素脱失斑是结节性硬化症的皮损特征。
