结缔组织的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0009721	Shagreen patch	鲛鱼皮斑	A plaque representing a connective-tissue nevus. Connective tissue naevi are uncommon skin lesions that occur when the deeper layers of the skin do not develop correctly or the components of these layers occur in the wrong proportion. Shagreen patches are oval-shaped and nevoid, skin-colored or occasionally pigmented, smooth or crinkled, The word shagreen refers to a type of roughened untanned leather.	结缔组织痣的特征性斑块。结缔组织痣是一种罕见皮损，由深层皮肤的不正常发育或者错误比例的皮层构成所致。鲛鱼皮斑呈椭圆形痣样，可表现为正常肤色或偶见色素沉着，表面光滑或有皱纹，鲛鱼皮一词指一种粗糙未经加工的皮革。

The fracture is rarely present at birth but commonly develops during the first 18 months of life.	胫骨的“假关节”是胫骨发育进程的障碍，自发骨折后发生纤维状骨不连的结果。骨折在出生时很少见，但在出生后18个月内发生。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009771	Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the hand	指骨溶骨缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the phalanges of the hand.	溶解或手的指骨骨骼组织的变性。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009772	Patchy sclerosis of finger phalanx	手指指骨斑片状硬化	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the hand.	不均匀的（不规则）增加一个或多个手的指骨的骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009773	Symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand	手指的指关节粘连	Fusion of two or more phalangeal bones of the hand.	手指的两个或更多的指骨的融合。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009774	Triangular shaped phalanges of the hand	手指三角形指骨		
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0009775	Amniotic constriction ring	羊膜带狭窄环	Annular constrictions around the digits, limbs, or trunk, occurring congenitally (sometimes causing intrauterine autoamputation) and also associated with a wide variety of disorders. Constrictive amniotic bands are the result of primary amniotic rupture, which can lead to entanglement of fetal tissue (especially limbs) in fibrous amniotic strands.	缩窄的羊膜缠绕胎儿手指/脚趾、四肢或躯干，造成先天性缺陷（如宫内截肢）并与多种疾病相关。羊膜束带由部分羊膜脱落，纤维性羊膜带缠绕胎儿组织（尤其是四肢）造成。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009776	Adactyly	先天性无指	The absence of all phalanges of all the digits of a limb and the associated soft tissues.	如果没有一个肢体的所有数字和相关软组织的所有指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009777	Absent thumb	拇指缺失	Absent  `thumb`(FMA:24938), i.e., the absence of both phalanges of a thumb and the associated soft tissues.	缺席`thumb`（FMA:24938），即，不存在一个拇指的两个指骨和相关的软组织。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009778	Short thumb	短拇指	Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `thumb` (FMA:24938).	发育不全（先天性尺寸缩小）的`thumb`的（FMA:24938）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009779	3-4 toe syndactyly	第三、四脚趾并趾	3-4 toe syndactyly means the fusion of third and fouth toe.	第三、四脚趾融合型并趾。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009780	Iliac horns	髂骨角	Horn-like malformations of the iliac crests with symmetrical bilateral central posterior iliac processes. A characteristic finding in the Nail-Patella syndrome. Iliac horns are visible on X-ray and may be palpable, but are asymptomatic.	在髂嵴对称双侧中央后髂流程喇叭状畸形。一个特点发现在指甲髌骨综合症。髂骨角是在X线可见，可能是显而易见的，但无症状。
眼睛的异常	HP:0009781	Lester's sign	Lester的标志	A zone of darker pigmentation around the central part of the `iris` (FMA:58235) with a roughly cloverleaf or flower shape.	呈三叶草或花朵形状:围绕'iris`（58235 FMA）的中心部分黑暗的色素沉着的区域。
四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0009782	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the biceps	肱二头肌发育不全或发育低下	Absence or underdevelopment of the biceps muscle.	缺席或肱二头肌的不发达。
四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0009783	Biceps aplasia	肱二头肌发育不全	Absence of the biceps muscle.	缺席的肱二头肌。
四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0009784	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the triceps	肱三头肌发育不全或发育低下	Absence or underdevelopment of the triceps muscle.	缺席或三头肌不发达。

四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0009787	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the quadriceps	股四头肌发育不全或发育低下	Absence or underdevelopment of the quadriceps muscle.	缺席或四头肌不发达。
四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0009788	Quadriceps aplasia	股四头肌发育缺陷	Absence of the quadriceps muscle.	缺席股四头肌肌肉。
免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0009789	Perianal abscess	肛周脓肿	The presence of an abscess located around the anus.	位于肛门周围的脓肿。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009790	Hemisacrum (S2-S5)	半骶骨（S2-S5）	A hemisacral defect involving the sacral vertebrae S2 to S5.	一个hemisacral缺陷累及骶椎S2到S5。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009791	Bifid sacrum	骶骨裂	Presence of a `bifid` (PATO:0001572) `sacral bone` (FMA:16202).	存在`bifid`的（PATO:0001572）`骶bone`（FMA:16202）。
肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0009792	Teratoma	畸胎瘤	The presence of a `teratoma` (MPATH:322).	出现畸胎瘤。
肿瘤;骨骼系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0009793	Presacral teratoma	骶前畸胎瘤	Presence of a teratoma anterior to the sacrum.	骶骨前部形成畸胎瘤。
头或颈部的异常	HP:0009794	Branchial anomaly	鳃异常	Congenital developmental defect arising from the primitive branchial apparatus.	源于原始鳃器的先天性发育缺陷。
头或颈部的异常	HP:0009795	Branchial fistula	鳃裂瘘管	A congenital fistula in the neck resulting from incomplete closure of a branchial cleft.	由鳃裂闭合不完全引起的颈部先天性瘘管。
头或颈部的异常	HP:0009796	Branchial cyst	鳃裂囊肿	A branchial cyst is a remnant of embryonic development resulting from a failure of obliteration of a branchial cleft and consists of a subcutaneous cystic mass. Cysts are located anterior or posterior to the ear or in the submandibular region.	鳃裂囊肿是由鳃裂闭合不成导致的胚胎发育残余，包括皮下囊性包块。囊肿位于耳朵或颌下区的前后。
肿瘤;耳朵的异常	HP:0009797	Cholesteatoma	胆脂瘤	Cholesteatoma is a benign but potentially destructive growth consisting of keratinizing epithelium located in the middle ear and/or mastoid process. In cholesteatoma, a skin cyst grows into the middle ear and mastoid. The cyst is not cancerous but can erode tissue and cause destruction of the ear.	胆脂瘤是一种位于中耳和/或乳突区含有角化上皮的良性但又有潜在破坏性生长的疾病。在胆脂瘤中，皮肤呈囊肿样长入中耳和乳突。囊肿不具有癌性，但能侵蚀组织，引起耳朵的破坏。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0009798	Euthyroid goiter	甲状腺功能正常的甲状腺肿	A `goiter` (HP:0000853) that is not associated with functional thyroid abnormalities.	不伴甲状腺功能异常的甲状腺肿大(HP:0000853)。
免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0009799	Supernumerary spleens	多脾	The presence of two or more accessory spleens.	两个或两个以上副脾的存在。
胎儿发育或出生异常;内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0009800	Maternal diabetes	母体糖尿病	Maternal diabetes can either be a gestational, mostly type 2 diabetes, or a type 1 diabetes. Essential is the resulting maternal hyperglycemia as a non-specific teratogen, imposing the same risk of congenital malformations to pregnant women with both type 1 and type2 diabetes.	母体糖尿病是妊娠期的1型或2型糖尿病，2型最常见。本质是母体高血糖症是一种非特异性的致畸因素，对于孕妇来说不管是1型还是2型糖尿病都产生同样的先天性畸形的风险。

头或颈部的异常	HP:0009804	Reduced number of teeth	牙齿数量减少	The presence of a `reduced number` (PATO:0001997) of `teeth` (FMA:12516) as in `Hypodontia` (HP:0000668) or as in `Anodontia` (HP:0000674).	牙齿数量的减少，如缺齿或无齿。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0009805	Low-output congestive heart failure	低输出量充血性心力衰竭	A form of heart failure characterized by reduced cardiac output. This may be seen in patients with heart failure owing to ischemic heart disease, hypertension, cardiomyopathy, and other causes.	一种心输出量减少的心力衰竭形式。可以看出，患者的心力衰竭可能是由于缺血性心脏疾病，高血压，心肌病以及其他原因。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0009806	Nephrogenic diabetes insipidus	肾性尿崩症	A form of diabetes insipidus caused by failure of the kidneys to respond to vasopressin (AVP).	尿崩症的一种形式，由于肾脏无法对血管加压素（AVP）作出回应导致。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009812	Amelia involving the upper limbs	上肢缺肢	`Amelia` (HP:0009827) of one or both upper limbs.	`Amelia`（HP:0009827）的一个或两个上肢。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009813	Upper limb phocomelia	上肢短肢畸形	Missing or malformed long bones of the upper limbs with the distal parts (the hands) connected to the variably shortened or even absent upper extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the whole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).	上肢的长骨缺失或畸形，手连接到缩短甚至阙如的手臂残端，外观似海豹的鳍，这与其他形式的肢体畸形不同，那些畸形要么整个肢体缺失（无肢），或一肢远端部分缺如（四肢不全）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009814	Upper limb peromelia	上肢不全	`Peromelia` (HP:0009828) affecting only the upper limbs. That is, the distal parts of the arm are missing leading to stump formation.	只影响上肢的肢体发育不全。即臂的远端部分丢失形成残桩。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009816	Lower limb undergrowth	下肢发育不全	Leg shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the lower extremity.	腿缩短，因为下肢的一个或多个骨骼不发达。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009828	Peromelia	四肢不全	The distal parts of the limbs are missing leading to a stump formation.	四肢的前端部分丢失导致残端形成。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009829	Phocomelia	短肢畸形	Missing or malformed long bones of the extremities with the distal parts (such as hands and/or feet) connected to the variably shortened or even absent extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the hole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).	误或缺失长骨与远侧部分（如手和/或脚），连接到所述可变地缩短或甚至不存在末端四肢，导致脚蹼状外观，相对于其他形式的肢畸形的要么所述孔肢缺失（如阿梅利亚），或一肢的前端部分不存在（peromelia）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0009830	Peripheral neuropathy	周围神经病	Peripheral neuropathy is a general term for any disorder of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903). The main clinical features used to classify peripheral neuropathy are distribution, type (mainly demyelinating versus mainly axonal), duration, and course.	周围神经病是外周神经系统疾病的总称，主要根据其临床特征包括分布、分型（主要累及髓鞘还是轴索）、持续时间、病程而分类的。
神经系统的异常	HP:0009831	Mononeuropathy	单神经病	A focal lesion of a single peripheral nerve. Damage to a sensory nerve is accompanied by sensory impairment of all modalities in the affected anatomic distribution.	单一周围神经的局灶病变。损坏感觉神经则伴随受累解剖分布区域所有形式的感觉障碍。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009832	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of finger	手指末节指骨异常	Any anomaly of `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	手指末节指骨的任何异常。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009845	Bullet-shaped middle phalanges of the hand	子弹形的手指中节指骨	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009880	Broad distal phalanges of all fingers	远端指骨变宽	Abnormally wide (broad) `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) of all fingers.	异常宽（宽）`远端finger`的指骨（FMA:75818）所有的手指。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009881	aplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand	手的末节指骨的发育不全		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009882	Short distal phalanx of finger	手指短末节指骨	Short distance from the end of the finger to the most distal interphalangeal crease or the distal interphalangeal joint flexion point. That is, hypoplasia of one or more of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	从手指的前端到最远端指间折痕或远端指间关节屈曲点短的距离。也就是说，一个或多个finger`的`远节指骨（FMA:75818）的发育不全。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009883	Duplication of the distal phalanx of hand	手的末节指骨重复	This term applies if one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	该术语适用于如果一个手的远端指骨的或更多的或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009884	Tapered distal phalanges of finger	手指的远端指骨呈锥形	A reduction in diameter of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) towards the distal end.	手指末节指骨的直径向尖端逐渐减小。
体壁的异常	HP:0009886	Trichorrhexis nodosa	结节性脆发症	Trichorrhexis nodosa is the formation of nodes along the hair shaft through which breakage readily occurs. It is thus a focal defect in the hair fiber that is characterized by thickening or weak points (nodes) that cause the hair to break off easily. The result is defective, abnormally fragile hair.	结节性脆发症是指沿着发干形成的容易断裂的节点。因此它是一种毛发纤维性疾病，主要表现为因毛发脆性增加而出现的某些增厚或者薄弱的结节部位较为容易折断。
体壁的异常	HP:0009887	Abnormality of hair pigmentation	毛发着色异常	An abnormality of hair pigmentation (color).	毛发色素颜色的异常。
体壁的异常	HP:0009888	Abnormality of secondary sexual hair	第二性征毛发异常	Abnormality of the growth of secondary sexual hair, which normally ensues during puberty. In males, secondary sexual hair usually comprises body hair, including underarm, abdominal, chest, and pubic hair. In females, secondary sexual hair usually comprises a lesser degree of body hair, most prominently underarm and pubic hair.	第二性征毛发的异常生长，通常在青春期出现。男性第二性征毛发通常指体毛，包括腋下，腹部，胸部，和阴毛。而女性，第二性征的毛发体毛的程度较轻，最显着的是腋下和阴毛。
体壁的异常	HP:0009889	Localized hirsutism	局部多毛症	Abnormally increased hair growth with a localized distribution.	局部毛发异常增多。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0009890	High anterior hairline	前发际高	Distance between the hairline (trichion) and the glabella (the most prominent point on the frontal bone above the root of the nose), in the midline, more than two SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased distance between the hairline and the glabella.	在中线处，发际线和眉间（上额骨上方鼻根的最突出点）之间的距离比平均值高两个标准偏差。或，发际线和眉间之间的距离显得增加。

When affected eyes are adducted (moved inwards towards the nose), the eyeball retracts and the palpebral fissure narrows.	杜安异常是一种遗传性眼球运动障碍，表现为眼球内收限制。当患者的眼睛内收时（向内走向鼻子），眼球后退及睑裂变窄。
眼睛的异常	HP:0009922	Persistence of the hyaloid artery	玻璃体动脉永存症	Persistence of the hyaloid artery, which is the embryonic artery that runs from the optic disk to the posterior lens capsule may persist; the site of attachment may form an opacity. The hyaloid artery is a branch of the ophthalmic artery, and usually regresses completely before birth.	玻璃体动脉，这是胚胎期一个从视盘至晶状体后囊的动脉，该动脉是眼动脉的分支，通常出生前完全消退。出生后该动脉若存在，连接位可以形成的不透明度。

头或颈部的异常	HP:0009941	Asymmetry of the mouth	嘴不对称	The presence of an `asymmetric` (PATO:0000616) `mouth` (FMA:49184).	有一个不对称的嘴
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009942	Duplication of thumb phalanx	脚拇趾趾骨重复	Complete or partial duplication of the phalanges of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones (bifid), two separate bones appearing side to side, or completely duplicated phalanges (proximal and distal phalanx of the thumb and/or 1st metacarpal). In contrast to the phalanges of the digits 2-5 (proximal, middle and distal), the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨变化（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合），这两个骨头（双歧）的部分熔合外观，两个单独的骨骼出现一边到另一边，或完全复制趾骨（近端和拇指和/或第1掌骨远端指骨）。相反的数字2-5（近端，中间和远端）趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此等效到的其他数字近端指骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009943	Complete duplication of thumb phalanx	拇指指骨的完全重复	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	一个完整的复制影响一个拇指指骨或以上。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致的accesory骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见按照条款）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009944	Partial duplication of thumb phalanx	拇指指骨部分重叠	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	的部分重叠，视病情轻重，导致广泛或双歧美观，影响一个拇指指骨或以上。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009945	Duplication of phalanx of 2nd finger	食指指骨重复	This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	该术语适用于如果一个第二手指的指骨或多个或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009946	Polydactyly affecting the 2nd finger	多趾影响第二手指

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009949	Duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指中节指骨重复	Partial or complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).	指数finger`（:23933 FMA）的'中节指骨部分或全部重复。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009950	Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指的末节指骨的完全重复	Complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).	指数finger`（:23946 FMA）的`末节指骨完全重复。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009951	Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	第2指末节指骨部分重复	Partial duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	，看到X光片是一个广泛的和/或双歧节骨:指数finger`（23946 FMA）的`末节指骨部分重复。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009952	Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指中节指骨的完全重复	Complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).	指数finger`（:23933 FMA）的'中节指骨的完全重复。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009953	Partial duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	第二手指中节指骨部分重复	Partial duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	，看到X光片是一个广泛的和/或双歧节骨:指数finger`（23933 FMA）的'中节指骨部分重复。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009954	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	食指近节指骨的完全重复	Complete duplication of the `Second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919).	hand`的'第二次近节指骨的完全复制（FMA:23919）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009955	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	第二手指的近节指骨部分重复	Partial duplication of the `Second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	hand`的'第二次近节指骨（FMA:23919）的部分重复，看到X光片是一个广泛的和/或双歧方阵。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009956	Partial duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	第二手指的指骨部分重复	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个第二手指的指骨或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009957	Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	食指的指骨完全重复	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, is a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	一个完整的复制影响一个所述第二手指的指骨或更多。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。甲复制导致一个accesory骨中出现上的X射线的PROXIMO - 远侧轴，是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见，根据计）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009958	Polydactyly affecting the 3rd finger	多趾影响第三手指		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009959	Duplication of phalanx of 3rd finger	中指指骨重复	This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	该术语适用于如果一个第三手指的指骨或多个或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009960	Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 3rd finger	中指的指骨的完全重复	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	一个完整的复制影响一个第三手指的指骨或以上。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致的accesory骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见按照条款）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0009961	Partial duplication of the phalanges of the 3rd finger	第三个手指指骨部分重复	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个第三手指的指骨或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。

As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010001	Complete duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand	手的末节指骨的完全重复	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand.	一个完整的复制影响一个手的远端指骨的或更多。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010002	Complete duplication of the middle phalanges of the hand	手的中节指骨的完全重复	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accessory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a pseudoepiphysis (see corresponding terms) sometimes also referred to as hyperphalangism.	一个完整的复制影响一个手的中间指骨或更多。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致附件骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为pseudoepiphysis（参阅相关条款），有时也被称为hyperphalangism。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010003	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanges of the hand	手近节指骨部分重复	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个手的近端指骨或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010004	Partial duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand	手末节指骨部分重复	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个手的远端指骨的或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010005	Partial duplication of the middle phalanges of the hand	手中节指骨部分重复	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个手的中间指骨或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010006	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of hand	近节指骨的重复	This term applies if one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	该术语适用于如果一个手的近端指骨或多个或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010008	Duplication of the middle phalanx of hand	中节指骨重复	This term applies if one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	该术语适用于如果一个手的中间指骨或多个或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010009	Abnormality of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨异常	A structural anomaly of the first metacarpal.	第一掌骨的结构异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010010	Abnormality of the 2nd metacarpal	第二掌骨异常	Any abnormal structure or form of the second metacarpal bone.	第二掌骨的任何异常结构或形态。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010011	Abnormality of the 3rd metacarpal	第三掌骨异常	This term means any abnormal structure or form of the third metacarpal bone.	第三掌骨的任何异常结构或形态。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010012	Abnormality of the 4th metacarpal	第四掌骨异常	Any abnormal structure or form of the fourth metacarpal bone.	第四掌骨任何异常结构或形态。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010013	Abnormality of the 5th metacarpal	第五掌骨异常	Any abnormal structure or form of the firth metacarpal bone.	第五掌骨的任何异常结构或形态。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010014	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨骨骺异常	In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits). The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end (as seen in the proximal phalanges of the other digits), whereas the epiphyses of the other metacarpal bones are located at the distal end. This term applies if the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal is in any way abnormal, referring to age and gender depending norms, as seen on x-rays.	与第二至五掌骨不同，第一掌骨来源于胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨） 。第一掌骨骨骺位于掌骨近端（如同其它手指的近端指骨所见），而其他掌骨的骨骺位于远端。本术语适用于X光片上第一掌骨骨骺的任何形态异常，其形态标准因年龄和性别不同而异。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010015	Absent epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨骨骺缺失		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010016	Bracket epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨支架样骨骺	An epiphysis that curves around from its transverse orientation to a longitudinal one from proximal to distal along one side of the phalanx, thus resembling the letter 'C' and forming a bracket around the diaphysis. This results in a so called delta phalanx characterized by a triangular or trapezoidal shaped bone with a C-shaped epiphyseal plate.	一个骨骺周围曲线从其横向取向从近端纵向1沿着方阵的一侧向远端，从而类似字母“C”和形成围绕骨干一个支架。这导致了所谓的增量方阵特征在于三角形或梯形形状的骨与C形骺板。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010017	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance.	锥形外观第一掌骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010018	Enlarged epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨骨骺膨大	Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.	第1掌骨骨骺异常大尺寸相对于年龄相关的规范。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010019	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨骨骺碎裂	Epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal having multiple bony fragments.	骨骺具有多个骨碎片第一掌骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010020	Irregular epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨骨骺不规则	Uneven radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal.	第1掌骨骨骺不均匀影像学不透明度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010021	Ivory epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨乳白色骨骺	The epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.	第1掌骨骨骺是硬而致密的象牙。这样的骨骺具有均匀密集的出现在X光片。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010022	Pseudoepiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨假骺	The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone although an accessory epiphysis may be located at the distal end of the metacarpal.	第一掌骨骨骺被定位在掌骨的近端虽然附件骨骺可位于掌骨的远端。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010023	Small epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨小骨骺	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.	相对于年龄相关的标准，第一掌骨骨骺尺寸异常小。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010024	Epiphyseal stippling of the first metacarpal	第一掌骨骨骺点状钙化	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	点状异常（有斑点，斑点等）钙化在`第一掌骨bone`（:23899 FMA）的骨骺的存在。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010025	Triangular epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨三角形骨骺		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010026	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨发育不全或发育低下	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 1st metacarpal. In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits).	发育或发育不全影响第一掌骨。与此相反的掌骨2-5，第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于数字2-5近端趾骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它位中间指骨） 。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010027	Broad 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨变宽	Increased width of the 1st metacarapal. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	增加的宽度第一metacarapal的。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010028	Bullet-shaped 1st metacarpal	子弹形的第一掌骨	The presence of short and wide 1st metacarpal which tapers distally ("bullet shaped").	短而宽第一掌骨的存在渐缩远端（“子弹形”）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010029	Curved 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the first metacarpal.	从第一掌骨正常直线形状的偏差。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010030	Osteolytic defects of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the 1st metacarpal.	解散或第一掌骨骨组织的退化。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010031	Patchy sclerosis of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨斑片状硬化	Uneven increase in bone density within the 1st metacarpal.	在第一掌骨内不均匀增加骨密度。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010033	Triangular shaped 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨呈三角形	This term applies to a triangular shaped 1st metacarpal.	本术语系指第一掌骨呈三角形。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010034	Short 1st metacarpal	第1掌骨短	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010035	aplasia of the 1st metacarpal	第一掌骨发育不全	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010036	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 2nd metacarpal	第二掌骨发育不全或发育低下	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 2nd metacarpal.	发育或发育不全影响第二掌骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010037	aplasia of the 2nd metacarpal	第二掌骨发育不全

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010039	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 3rd metacarpal	第三掌骨发育不全或发育低下	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 3rd metacarpal.	发育或发育不全影响第三掌骨。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010049	Short metacarpal	短掌	Diminished length of one or more metacarpal bones in relation to the others of the same hand or to the contralateral metacarpal.	减少的一个或多个掌骨长度相对于同一只手的人或对对侧掌骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010051	Deviation/Displacement of the hallux	脚拇脚偏离/移位	Displacement of the `big toe` (FMA:25047) from its normal position.	位移的'大toe`（FMA:25047），从正常位置。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010052	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	脚拇趾近节趾骨畸形	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the big toe is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	与第二至五趾骨的近端趾骨不同，大脚趾的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其它趾骨的中间趾骨，而第一跖骨来源于胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他脚趾的近端趾骨。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010053	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the hallux	脚拇趾末节趾骨异常		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010054	Abnormality of the first metatarsal	第一跖骨异常	An anomaly of the `first metatarsal bone`(FMA:24502).	第一跖骨的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010055	Broad hallux	脚拇趾变宽	Visible increase in width of the hallux without an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension.	可见增加宽度拇趾的而不增加的背腹尺寸。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010056	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the hallux	脚拇趾骨骺异常

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010059	Broad hallux phalanx	脚拇趾趾骨变宽	An increase in width in one or more phalanges of the big toe.	在宽度在大脚趾的一个或多个指骨的增加。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010060	Bullet-shaped hallux phalanx	子弹形的脚拇趾趾骨	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the big toe, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	大脚趾的一个或多个指骨，具有短而宽的方阵逐渐变细的远端形态异常。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010061	Curved hallux phalanx	脚拇趾趾骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more phalanges of the big toe.	从大脚趾的一个或多个指骨正常的直线形式的偏差。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010062	Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the hallux	脚拇趾骨溶骨性缺陷		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010063	Patchy sclerosis of hallux phalanx	脚拇趾趾骨斑片状硬化	Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more phalanges of the big toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	片状（不规则）增加的大脚趾的一个或多个指骨骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010064	Symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hallux	脚拇趾的趾关节粘连

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010067	aplasia/hypoplasia of the 1st metatarsal	第一跖骨发育不全或发育低下	Absence or underdevelopment of the `first metatarsal bone` (FMAID:24502).	缺席或'第一跖骨bone`不发达（FMAID:24502）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010068	Broad first metatarsal	第一跖骨粗大	Increased side-to-side width of the `first metatarsal bone` (FMA:24502).	增加侧到另一侧的宽度`第一跖骨bone`的（FMA:24502）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010069	Bullet-shaped 1st metatarsal	子弹形的第一跖骨	An abnormal morphology of the firstmetatarsal bone, which is short and wide and tapers distally, and lacks the normal diaphyseal constriction.	所述firstmetatarsal骨的形态异常，这是短而宽和渐缩远端，并且缺乏正常骨干收缩。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010070	Curved 1st metatarsal	第一跖骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight shape of a proximal phalanx of the 1st metatarsal bone.	从第1跖骨近端指骨的正常直线形状的偏差。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010071	Osteolytic defects of the 1st metatarsal	第一跖骨的溶骨性缺陷	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the first metatarsal.	溶解或第一跖骨的骨组织的变性。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010072	Patchy sclerosis of the 1st metatarsal	第一跖骨的斑片状硬化		
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010073	Synostosis involving the 1st metatarsal	累及第一跖骨的骨性连合

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010076	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the hallux	脚拇趾末节趾骨发育不全或发育低下

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010078	Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the hallux	子弹形的脚拇趾末节趾骨	An abnormal morphology of the distal phalanx of the big toe, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	大脚趾的末节指骨的形态异常，具有短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010125	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	第一跖骨骨骺异常	In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities of the epiphysis of the first metatarsal bone.	与其他跖骨不同，第一跖骨来源于胚胎学的趾骨，相当于第二至五脚趾的近端趾骨，而大脚趾的近端指骨相当于其它脚趾的中间趾骨。本术语适用于第一跖骨的骨骺发育异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010126	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	脚母趾近节趾骨骨骺异常	In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities affecting the proximal phalanx of the hallux.	与其他跖骨不同，第一跖骨来源于胚胎学的趾骨，相当于第二至五脚趾的近端趾骨，而大脚趾的近端指骨相当于其它脚趾的中间指骨。本术语适用于影响拇趾的近节指骨异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010127	Absent epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	脚母趾近节趾骨骨骺缺失	Failure to form (agenesis) of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux.	脚拇趾的近节趾骨骨骺未能形成（发育不全）。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010175	Bullet-shaped toe phalanx	子弹形的脚趾趾骨	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the toes, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	的脚趾的一个或多个趾骨，用短而宽方阵其逐渐变细的远侧形态异常。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010176	Curved toe phalanx	脚趾趾骨弯曲	A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more toe phalanges.	从一个或多个脚趾趾骨正常的直线形式的偏差。

The tarsometatarsal joints of the feet are also called Lisfranc's joints.	关节运动的拇趾的跖跗关节的慢性损失是由于非骨组织结构变化。有脚的跗跖关节也叫跖跗关节的关节。

四肢异常	HP:0010219	Structural foot deformity	结构性足部畸形	A foot deformity resulting due to an abnormality affecting the bones of the foot (as well as muscle and soft tissue). In contrast if only the muscle and soft tissue are affected the term positional foot deformity applies.	足部变畸形源自于某种影响了足的骨骼（以及肌肉和软组织）的异常。与此相反，如果仅仅是肌肉和软组织受影响，则使用足的位置性变形这个术语描述。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010229	Bracket epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	手指骨支架样骨骺	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	托架骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有托架状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010230	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	手的指骨锥形骨骺	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the fingers of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	锥体形外观手的手指的骨骺，产生一个“球在一个插座'的出现。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的前端。

心血管系统的异常	HP:0010438	Abnormality of the ventricular septum	室间隔异常	An abnormality of the `interventricular septum` (FMA:7133).	心脏室间隔的异常（FMA:7133）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010440	Ectopic accesory toe-like appendage	异位性额外脚趾样附属物	In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely 'normal' digit) is either located postaxial (on the fibular side of the foot, next top the little toe), preaxial (on the tibial side of the foot, next to the big toe) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between big and little toe), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).	在对比趾的形式，其中所述额外数字（这可以是一个基本的或完全“正常”位）要么位于postaxial（在脚的腓骨侧，下一顶小趾），preaxial（在胫骨侧脚，旁边的大脚趾）或mesoaxial（地方中心，大和小脚趾之间），一个编外的数字也可以异位放置，这意味着其他地方，除了后，孔或preaxial。在文献中，这是有时被作为Disorganisation样综合征（OMIM223200）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010441	Ectopic accesory finger-like appendage	异位性额外手指样附属物	In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely 'normal' digit) is either located postaxial (on the ulnar side of the hand, next to the little finger), preaxial (on the radial side of the hand, next to the thumb) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between thumb and little finger), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).	相反，多趾的形式，其中编外位（这可以是一个基本的或完全“正常”的数字），要么是位于postaxial（在手的尺侧，旁边的小手指），preaxial（在径向一边的手，旁边的拇指）或mesoaxial（某处中央，拇指和小指之间），一个编外的数字也可以异位放置，这意味着其他地方，除了后，孔或preaxial。在文献中，这是有时被作为Disorganisation样综合征（OMIM223200）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010442	Polydactyly	多指（趾）畸形	A congenital anomaly characterized by the presence of supernumerary fingers or toes.	先天性异常特征的编外手指或脚趾的存在。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010443	Bifid femur	股骨骨裂	A bifid or bifurcated appearance of the `femur` (FMA:9611) as seen on x-rays, possible appearing as a more or less severe bowing of the upper leg. Might be associated with hip dysplasia on the affected side.	在`femur`的裂或分叉外观（FMA:9611），为看到的X射线，可能出现作为上腿的或多或少严重弯曲。可能与患侧髋关节发育不良有关。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0010444	Pulmonary insufficiency	肺动脉瓣关闭不全	Backflow of blood from the pulmonary artery into the right ventricle,owing to imperfect functioning of the pulmonary valve.	由于肺动脉瓣功能不全使得在心脏舒张期间血流逆行通过肺动脉瓣进入右心室。

泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0010458	Female pseudohermaphroditism	女性假两性畸形	Hermaphroditism refers to a discrepancy between the morphology of the gonads and that of the external genitalia. In female pseudohermaphroditism, the genotype is female (XX) and the gonads are ovaries, but the external genitalia are virilized.	两性畸形是指性腺和外生殖器之间不吻合。女性假两性畸形指基因型是雌性（XX）和性腺是卵巢，但外生殖器男性化。

Affected persons have ambiguous genitalia and may have 46,XX or 46,XY karyotypes or 46,XX/XY mosaicism.	在个体的同一侧或相对侧性腺里存在卵巢和睾丸组织。受累个体外生殖器不能辨别性别，染色体核型可能为46,XX、46,XY或46,XX/XY嵌合体。

Heme is composed of ferrous iron and protoporphyrin IX and is an essential molecule as the prosthetic group of hemeproteins such as hemoglobin, myoglobin, mitochondrial and microsomal cytochromes.	血红素的合成或降解的异常。血红素是由亚铁和原卟啉IX组成的,作为血红素蛋白,例如血红蛋白，肌红蛋白，线粒体和微粒体细胞色素的辅基成分,是一个重要的组分分子。

Patellar subluxation refers to an unstable kneecap that does not slide centrally within its groove, i.e., a partial dislocation of the patella.	通常位于在凹槽内膝盖骨称为滑车上股骨远端，并且可以上下滑动在它。髌骨半脱位是指不集中其凹槽，即，髌骨的局部错位内滑动不稳定膝盖骨。

This can occur in conditions in which deficiency in the target organ leads to decreased hormonal feedback, or as a primary condition most usually in connection with a pituitary adenoma.	一种或多种垂体激素分泌过多。这可能由于靶器官缺陷导致激素反馈减少，或者是由垂体腺瘤引起的垂体原发性病症。
内分泌系统的异常;免疫系统的异常	HP:0010515	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the thymus	胸腺发育缺陷/不全	Absence or underdevelopment of the `thymus` (FMA:9607).	缺席或'胸腺`发育缺陷或不全（FMA:9607）。
内分泌系统的异常;免疫系统的异常	HP:0010516	Thymus hyperplasia	胸腺瘤	Enlargement of the `thymus` (FMA:9607).	胸腺的增生肿大（FMA:9607）。
内分泌系统的异常;免疫系统的异常	HP:0010517	Ectopic thymus tissue	异位胸腺组织	The presence of ectopic `thymus` (FMA:9607) tissue. Normally, cells of the ventral bud of the third pharyngeal pouch detach and migrate in the eighth gestational week caudally and medially towards the location of the mature thyroid. They migrate further retrosternally into the superior mediastinum. There are two main ways ectopic thymus tissue can develop. Either cells detach along the descensus path and proliferate, thereby forming accessory thymus tissue, or the entire gland fails to descend.	组织:异位`胸腺`（9607 FMA）。正常情况下，在第八孕周末第三咽囊的腹侧胚芽细胞分离并迁移，其内侧朝向成熟甲状腺的位置。他们进一步从胸骨后迁移到上纵隔。主要有两种途径形成异位胸腺组织。每一细胞沿下行路径分离和增殖，从而形成副胸腺组织，或整个腺体无法下降。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0010518	Thyroglossal cyst	甲状舌管囊肿	An `abnormality of the thyroid gland` (HP:0000820) owing to the presence of a fibrous `cyst` (MPATH:62) resulting from the persistence of the `thyroglossal duct` (FMA:77274).	一种甲状腺（HP:0000820）的异常，是由于甲状舌管不闭合所导致的囊肿引起的。

神经系统的异常	HP:0010522	Dyslexia	失读症	A learning disorder characterized primarily by difficulties in learning to read and spell. Dyslectic children also exhibit a tendency to read words from right to left and to confuse letters such as b and d whose orientation is important for their identification. Children with dyslexia appear to be impaired in phonemic skills (the ability to associate visual symbols with the sounds they represent).	学习障碍的一种类型，主要表现为阅读和拼写困难。失读症的儿童还存在从右向左阅读单词的倾向，比如b和d的正确识别取决于阅读方向。并且可能存在音位能力受损（将视觉符号和其所代表的声音联系起来的能力）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010523	Alexia	失读症	An acquired type of sensory aphasia where damage to the brain leads to the loss of the ability to read.	获得性的感觉性失语的一种类型，由于大脑的损伤导致了阅读能力的丧失。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010524	Agnosia	失认	Inability to recognize objects not because of sensory deficit but because of the inability to combine components of sensory impressions into a complete pattern. Thus, agnosia is a neurological condition which results in an inability to know, to name, to identify, and to extract meaning from visual, auditory, or tactile impressions.	没有认识物体、对象的能力，这种能力缺乏不是由于感觉障碍，而是因为无法把感官印象的组件组合成一个完整的模式。因此，失认是一种神经源性的没有能力理解、命名、识别、以及从视觉、听觉或触觉印象提取其意义的状态。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010525	Finger agnosia	手指失认	An inability or difficulty differentiating among the fingers of either hand as well as the hands of others.	对自己或他人的手指辨别不能或困难。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010526	Dysgraphia	书写困难	A writing disability in the absence of motor or sensory deficits of the upper extremities, resulting in an impairment in the ability to write regardless of the ability to read and not due to intellectual impairment.	双上肢无运动或感觉障碍时，存在的与阅读能力不匹配的书写困难，且与智力无关。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010527	Astereognosia	实体觉缺失	Inability to recognize the form of objects by touch without visual input. That is, an impairment in the recognition of objects based only on based on the texture, size, weight and three-dimensional form of the object in the absence of any major somatosensory deficit.	在没有视觉输入的情况下不能通过触摸识别物体的形式。也就是说，在没有任何主要的体感缺陷情况下，仅基于物体的纹理、尺寸、重量和三维形状对物体的识别能力的损害。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010528	Prosopagnosia	面孔失认症	Inability to recognize faces of familair persons.	不能识别家人的面孔
神经系统的异常	HP:0010529	Echolalia	模仿性言语	The tendency to repeat vocalizations made by another person.	有重复他人发声的倾向。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010530	Palatal myoclonus	腭肌阵挛	Palatal myoclonus is characterized by myoclonic (rhythmic involuntary jerky) movements of the soft palate.	腭肌阵挛的特点是软腭的肌阵挛（节奏不自主跳动）动作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010531	Spinal myoclonus	脊髓性肌阵挛	Spinal myoclonus is generally due to a tumor, infection, injury, or degenerative process of the spinal cord, and is characterized by involuntary rhythmic muscle contractions, usually at a rate of more than one per second. Myoclonus occurs synchronously in several muscles and can be increased in severity and frequency by fatigue or stress, but is usually unaffected by sensory stimuli. Spinal myoclonus ceases during sleep or anesthesia.	脊肌阵挛通常是由于一个肿瘤，感染，损伤，或脊髓变性过程，其特征是节律不自主的肌肉收缩，通常在一个以上的每秒的速率。同步发生肌阵挛在几个肌肉和所用的严重程度和频率由疲劳或应力增加，但通常是不受感官刺激。睡眠或麻醉期间脊髓性肌阵挛停止。
耳朵的异常	HP:0010532	Paroxysmal vertigo	发作性眩晕	Paroxysmal episodes of vertigo.	阵发性眩晕发作。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010533	Spasmus nutans	点头状痉挛	The combination of pendular nystagmus, head nodding, and torticollis.	摆动眼球震颤，点头和斜颈的组合。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010534	Transient global amnesia	短暂性全面性遗忘症	A paroxysmal, transient loss of memory function with preservation of immediate recall and remote memory but with a severe impairment of memory for recent events and ability to retain new information.	一种阵发性、短暂性记忆功能丧失，即时回忆和远期记忆保存，但是近事记忆和储存新信息的能力严重受损。
神经系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0010535	Sleep apnea	睡眠呼吸暂停	An intermittent cessation of airflow at the mouth and nose during sleep. Apneas of at least 10 seconds are considered important, but persons with sleep apnea may have apneas of 20 seconds to up to 2 or 3 minutes. Patients may have up to 15 events per hour of sleep.	睡眠时口鼻气流间歇性停止。呼吸暂停10秒以上的被认为是重要的，但睡眠呼吸暂停的人呼吸暂停可以有20秒以上甚至达到2或3分钟。患者每小时睡眠可能有高达15次呼吸暂停事件。
神经系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0010536	Central sleep apnea	中枢性睡眠呼吸暂停	Sleep apnea resulting from a transient abolition of the central drive to the ventilatory muscles.	是由于控制呼吸通气肌肉的大脑中枢短暂功能失调导致的睡眠呼吸暂停。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010537	Wide cranial sutures	颅缝增宽	An abnormally increased width of the cranial sutures for age-related norms (generally resulting from delayed closure).	颅缝的距离增大，考虑到年龄-相关等因素（通常由颅缝延迟闭合所引起）。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010538	Small sella turcica	小蝶鞍	An abnormally small sella turcica.	异常小的蝶鞍。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010539	Thin calvarium	颅骨过薄	The presence of an abnormally thin calvarium.	颅骨异常的薄。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010540	Advanced pneumatization of cranial sinuses	颅窦过度气化	A degree of pneumatization that is increased compared to age-related norms.	气化程度比同龄正常值增加。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010541	Cutis gyrata of scalp	头皮表皮旋纹	The presence of convoluted folds and furrows formed from thickened skin of the `scalp` (FMA:46494), resembling cerebriform pattern. The scalp has convoluted and elevated folds, 1 to 2 cm in thickness. The convolutions generally cannot be flattened by traction.	由于头皮增厚而形成的类似大脑沟回的复杂褶皱和回纹。头皮有复杂和升高的折叠，厚度为1?2厘米。复杂折叠通常不能由牵引拉平。
神经系统的异常;眼睛的异常	HP:0010542	Vestibular nystagmus	前庭眼球震颤	Nystagmus due to disturbance of the vestibular system; eye movements are rhythmic, with slow and fast components.	眼球震颤由于前庭系统的干扰;眼球运动的节奏，用慢速和快速的组件。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010543	Opsoclonus	斜视眼阵挛	Spontaneous, non-rhythmic, multi-directional, chaotic movements of the eyes, giving the appearance of agitation. There may be bursts of conjugate movement of the eyes in varying directions and of varying amplitude.	自发的，无节奏的，多方位的，混乱的眼神动作，呈现躁动的外观。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010544	Vertical nystagmus	垂直眼球震颤	Vertical nystagmus may present with either up-beating or down-beating eye movements or both. When present in the straight-ahead position of gaze it is referred to as upbeat nystagmus or downbeat nystagmus.	垂直眼球震颤可出现或上跳动或向下跳动的眼球运动或两者兼而有之。当存在于凝视的正前方位置它被称为向上震颤或向下眼球震颤。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010545	Downbeat nystagmus	下击型眼球震颤	Downbeat nystagmus is a type of fixation nystagmus with the fast phase beating in a downward direction. It generally increases when looking to the side and down and when lying prone.	下击型眼球震颤是指向下方向的快相跳动的眼球震颤。向侧看、下看或躺下时加重。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010546	Muscle fibrillation	肌纤维颤动	Fine, rapid twitching of individual muscle fibers with little or no movement of the muscle as a whole. If a motor neuron or its axon is destroyed, the muscle fibers it innervates undergo denervation atrophy. This leads to hypersensitivity of individual muscle fibers to acetyl choline so that they may contract spontaneously. Isolated activity of individual muscle fibers is generally so fine it cannot be seen through the intact skin, although it can be recorded as a short-duration spike in the EMG.	不会引起肌肉动作的单个肌纤维精细的、快速的抽动。如果一个运动神经元或轴突被损害，则它支配的肌纤维会出现去神经萎缩。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0010547	Muscle flaccidity	肌萎缩	A type of paralysis in which a muscle becomes soft and yields to passive stretching, which results from loss of all or practically all peripheral motor nerves that innervated the muscle. Muscle tone is reduced and the affected muscles undergo extreme atrophy within months of the loss of innervation.	一种肌肉麻痹，表现为肌肉柔软松弛无法被动伸展，是因部分或全部的支配肌肉的外周运动神经丧失功能所致。肌张力减退数月内，所在神经分布的受累肌肉将会出现末端肌萎缩。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0010548	Percussion myotonia	打击乐肌强直	A localized myotonic contraction in a muscle in reaction to percussion (tapping with the examiner's finger, a rubber percussion hammer, or a similar object).	本地化强直性收缩反应敲击肌肉（攻与考官的手指，橡胶锤敲击，或类似的对象）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010549	Weakness due to upper motor neuron dysfunction	上运动神经元功能障碍造成的虚弱	Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Paralysis due to lesions of the principle motor tracts is related to a lesion in the corticospinal, corticobulbar or brainstem descending (subcorticospinal) neurons.	
神经系统的异常	HP:0010550	Paraplegia	截瘫	Severe or complete weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities.	双下肢严重或完全瘫痪，上肢保留
神经系统的异常	HP:0010551	Paraplegia/paraparesis	截瘫/轻瘫	Weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities. Paraplegia refers to a severe or complete loss of strength, whereas paraparesis refers to a relatively mild loss of strength.	上肢保留的双下肢严重或完全瘫痪为截瘫而力量相对保留的为轻瘫。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010553	Oculogyric crisis	动眼神经危象	An acute dystonic reaction with blepharospasm, periorbital twitches, and protracted fixed staring episodes. There may be a maximal upward deviation of the eyes in the sustained fashion. Oculogyric crisis can be triggered by a number of factors including neuroleptic medications.	眼睑痉挛，眶周抽搐，和长期固定注视的一种急性肌张力障碍，可能伴有持续的眼球最大向上运动的偏差。动眼神经危象可被很多种因素包括镇静药物所诱发。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010554	Cutaneous finger syndactyly	手指皮性并指	A soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that extends distally to at least the level of the proximal interphalangeal joints, or a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that lies significantly distal to the flexion crease that overlies the metacarpophalangeal joint of the adjacent fingers.	两个手指之间的A /轴线P在软组织连续性远侧到近侧指间关节的至少一级，或两个手指之间的A /轴线P在软组织连续性延伸摆在显著远端的屈曲折缝，其覆盖在相邻的手指的掌指关节。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010557	Overlapping fingers	指交叠	A finger resting on the dorsal surface of an adjacent digit when the hand is at rest.	在相邻位的背侧面手指搁当手处于静止。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010558	Abnormality of the clivus	斜坡异常	An abnormality of the clivus, which is the inclined bony region of the posterior cranial fossa located between the sella turcica and the foramen magnum.	斜坡的异常。斜坡指位于蝶鞍和枕骨大孔的后颅窝的倾斜骨区域。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010559	Vertical clivus	颅脑斜坡垂直	An abnormal vertical orientation of the clivus (which normally forms a kind of slope from the sella turcica down to the region of the foramen magnum).	斜坡（通常从蝶鞍倾斜至枕骨大孔区）异常垂直。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010560	Undulate clavicles	波浪形锁骨	An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the clavicles.	锁骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010561	Undulate ribs	波浪状肋骨	An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the ribs.	肋骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
结缔组织的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010562	Keloids	瘢痕疙瘩	Presence of one or more keloids. A keloid is a sharply elevated, irregularly shaped, progressively enlarging scar resulting from formation of excessive amounts of collagen in the dermis during connective tissue repair.	瘢痕疙瘩可单发或多发，具有高出皮面、形状不规则、持续增生等特点，是皮肤在结缔组织修复过程中，真皮层胶原蛋白过度合成所致。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010564	Bifid epiglottis	会厌分叉	A midline anterior-posterior cleft of the `epiglottis` (FMA:55130) that involves at least two-thirds of the epiglottic leaf. It is a useful feature for clinical diagnosis because it appears to be very rare in syndromes other than Pallister-Hall-Syndrome and is also rare as an isolated malformation.	`会厌`（55130 FMA）沿中线前后裂开累及至少前三分之二的会厌叶，这对于临床诊断非常有帮助，因为它似乎在比帕里斯特 - 霍尔综合征中非常罕见，同时即使是作为一个孤立的畸形也非常罕见。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010565	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the Epiglottis	会厌的发育缺陷/不全	This term applies if the Epiglottis is absent or hypoplastic.	本术语指会厌缺失或发育不全。
肿瘤	HP:0010566	Hamartoma	错构瘤	A disordered proliferation of mature tissues that is native to the site of origin - eg, exostoses, nevi and soft tissue hamartomas. Although most hamartomas are benign, some histologic subtypes - eg, neuromuscular hamartoma, may proliferate aggressively such as mesenchymal cystic hamartoma, Sclerosing epithelial hamartoma, Sclerosing metanephric hamartoma.	错构瘤是'起源于器官的正常成熟组织的无序增殖，例如，外生骨疣，痣和软组织错构瘤。虽然大多数错构瘤是良性的，但一些组织学亚型-如神经肌肉的错构瘤，可产生侵袭性增殖，如间充质囊性错构瘤、硬化性上皮错构瘤、硬化性肾错构瘤。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010567	Y-shaped metatarsals	Y形跖骨	Y-shaped metatarsals are the result of a partial fusion of two metatarsal bones, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Y-shaped metatarsals may be seen in combination with polydactyly.	Y形跖骨是两个跖骨近端部分融合的结果，Y的两臂指向远端方。 见到Y形跖骨与多趾伴随出现。
眼睛的异常;肿瘤;头或颈部的异常	HP:0010568	Hamartoma of the eye	眼睛的错构瘤	A hamartoma (disordered proliferation of mature tissues) which can originate from any tissue of the eye.	错构瘤（成熟组织的无序增殖），它可以从眼睛中的任何组织起源。

骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010579	Cone-shaped epiphysis	锥形骨骺	Cone-shaped epiphyses (also known as coned epiphyses) are epiphyses that invaginate into cupped metaphyses. That is, the epiphysis has a cone-shaped distal extension resulting from increased growth of the central portion of the epiphysis relative to its periphery.	锥形骨骺（也称为锥形骨骺）是内陷成杯状干骺端骨骺。即，骨骺具有锥形远端延伸，从相对于其周边骨骺的中心部分的增加的生长产生。

骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010583	Ivory epiphyses	乳白色骨骺	Sclerosis of the epiphyses, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	硬化骨骺，导致的射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）在X射线的程度增加。

肿瘤;头或颈部的异常	HP:0010603	Keratocystic odontogenic tumor	角化囊性牙源肿瘤	A benign uni- or multicystic, intraosseous tumor of odontogenic origin, with a characteristic lining of parakeratinized stratified squamous epithelium and potential for aggressive, infiltrative behaviour.	良性的单或多囊性的牙源骨内肿瘤，其特征为有类角化的复层鳞状上皮作衬里，且具有攻击性浸润性举动的潜力。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010604	Cyst of the eyelid	眼睑囊肿		
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010605	Chalazion	霰粒肿	A chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland. A chalazion or meibomian cyst appears as a painless tuberous swelling in the upper lid without loss of eyelashes.	由睑板腺堵塞发炎引起的慢性睑板腺上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症。霰粒肿或睑板囊肿表现为上眼睑无痛性结节肿胀而睫毛不脱落。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010606	Hordeolum	麦粒肿	An acute purulent infection of the sebaceous glands of Zeis at the base of the eyelashes, of the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or the meibomian sebacious glands often caused by staphylococcus infections. Hordeola can either occur as Hordeola externa affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or as Hordeola interna affecting the meibomian sebacious glands. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.	在睫毛根部的蔡斯氏皮脂腺、莫尔氏大汗腺或睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。麦粒肿既可能是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的外麦粒肿，也可能是影响睑板皮脂腺的内麦粒肿。相对于霰粒腫而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛并可造成极度局部肿胀。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010607	Hordeolum externum	外麦粒肿	Hordeola externa are acute purulent infections affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.	外麦粒肿是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒腫而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛并可造成极度局部肿胀。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010608	Hordeolum internum	内麦粒肿	Hordeola interna are acute purulent infections affecting the meibomian sebacious glands, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia (chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland), hordeola are extremely painfull and can cause extreme local swelling.	内麦粒肿是影响睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒腫（引起堵塞睑板腺发炎的睑板腺慢性上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症）而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛并可造成极度局部肿胀。
体壁的异常	HP:0010609	Skin tags	皮赘	Cutaneous skin tags also known as acrochorda or fibroepithelial polyps are small benign tumours that may either form secondarily over time primarily in areas where the skin forms creases, such as the neck, armpit or groin or may also be present at birth, in which case they usually occur in the periauricular region.	皮赘也被称为软垂疣或纤维上皮息肉，是较小的良性肿瘤，可继发于颈部、腋窝或腹股沟等易形成褶皱的部位，也可于出生就存在，通常发生于耳廓周围。
四肢异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010610	Palmar pits	掌点凹		
四肢异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010612	Plantar pits	跖部凹点	The presence of multiple pits (small, pinpoint-large indentations on the surface of the skin) located on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).	存在于足底皮肤的许多凹点（位于皮肤表面、针尖样大小的凹点）。
肿瘤	HP:0010614	Fibroma	纤维瘤	Benign tumors that are composed of fibrous or connective tissue. They can grow in all organs, arising from mesenchyme tissue. The term "fibroblastic" or "fibromatous" is used to describe tumors of the fibrous connective tissue. When the term fibroma is used without modifier, it is usually considered benign, with the term fibrosarcoma reserved for malignant tumors.	由纤维或结缔组织构成的良性肿瘤。它们是间质组织来源，可发生于机体的任何器官，术语“成纤维细胞”或“纤维瘤”用来描述纤维结缔组织肿瘤。通常 纤维瘤 一词指良性肿瘤，而纤维肉瘤一词是指恶性肿瘤。
肿瘤	HP:0010615	Angiofibromas	血管纤维瘤	Angiofibroma consist of many often dilated vessels.	血管纤维瘤由许多扩张的血管组成。
肿瘤;呼吸系统异常	HP:0010616	Lung fibroma	肺纤维瘤	The presence of a lung fibroma, a benign neoplasm that can present as a mass causing airway obstruction, cough, and hemoptysis, or present without symptoms as a solitary pulmonary nodule.	肺纤维瘤为一种良性的肿瘤，可表现为大块病变引起气道阻塞、咳嗽、咯血或没有症状的孤立性肺结节。

This can either be present in unilateral or bilateral form.	面部神经麻痹是第VII颅神经（面神经）的机能障碍，其结果是无法控制患病一侧的面部肌肉，而且控制面部表情与眼睛闭合的肌肉无力。可以出现在单侧或双侧。

骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010657	Patchy reduction of bone mineral density	骨密度片状降低	Patchy (irregular) reduction in bone density. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	片状（不规则）降低骨质密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010658	Patchy changes of bone mineral density	骨密度斑块样改变	Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density. These changes can either be patchy reduction or increase of mineral density as seen on x-rays. Depending on the pathomechanism and the underlying disease, these changes can either appear solely as reduction or increase or as a combination of both (patches of bone showing an increased density while others are affected by reduction of mineral density).	片状（不规则）的变化骨密度。这些变化可以是片状减少或矿物质密度的增加上看到的X射线。根据不同的病理机制和潜在的疾病，这些变化可以出现仅作为减少或增加或两者（骨表现出增加的密度，而其他受还原矿物密度的补丁）的组合。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010659	Patchy variation in bone mineral density	骨密度异常	Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density with patches of bone showing an increased density side to side with patches that are affected by reduction of mineral density. This is sometimes referred to as a moth-eaten appearance on x-rays.	骨密度与骨补丁表现出增加的密度侧片状（不定期）改变到另一边与受降低骨密度的补丁。这有时被称为虫蛀外观上的X射线。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010689	Mirror image polydactyly	镜像多趾	A hand or foot with more than five digits that has a recognizable A/P axis of symmetry. The axis can lie within a normally formed or partially duplicated digit resembling a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe, or hallux. Alternatively, the axis can be in an interdigital space with a flanking pair of digits that resemble a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe or hallux. The most lateral digits on each side of the hand typically resemble fifth fingers/toes.	一只手或脚有五位数以上，有对称识别的A /轴线P。轴可以躺在内形成正常或部分重复的数字类似于中指，食指，拇指，脚趾，或外翻。或者，所述轴能够与一侧翼的一对类似于一个中指，食指，拇指，脚趾或拇数字叉指的空间。在手上的每一侧的最外侧的数字通常类似于第五手指/脚趾。

骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010734	Fibrous dysplasia of the bones	纤维性骨发育不良	Tumor-like growths that consist of replacement of the medullary bone with fibrous tissue, causing the expansion and weakening of the areas of bone involved. Especially when involving the skull or facial bones, the lesions can cause externally visible deformities. The skull is often, but not necessarily, affected, and any other bone or bones may be involved. Fibrous dysplasia can either effect isolated bones (Monostotic fibrous dysplasia) or also generalized all bones of the body (Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia).	瘤样生长即包括更换髓骨纤维组织，造成骨所涉及的领域的扩大和弱化。特别是涉及颅骨或面部骨骼时，病变可引起外部可见的畸形。颅骨通常，但不一定，受影响的，和任何其它的骨或骨骼可能参与。纤维异常增殖症可以影响孤立的骨骼（Monostotic纤维结构不良），或者也广义的身体（多骨纤维性发育异常）的所有骨骼。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010735	Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia	多骨纤维异常增殖症	`Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in many bones throughout of the body. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia is a cardinal feature of McCune-Albright syndrome.	`的bones`（HP:0010734）的纤维异常增殖症是病变整个身体的局部，在许多骨头。多骨纤维异常增殖症是麦 - Albright综合征的一个重要特征。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010736	Monostotic fibrous dysplasia	单骨性骨纤维异常增殖症	`Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in only one bone.	`的bones`（HP:0010734）的纤维异常增殖症是病变局限在只有一个骨。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010739	Osteopoikilosis	骨斑点症	Osteopoikilosis is a benign, asymptomatic sclerotic dysplasia of the bones. It affects both male and female and may be seen at any age. Radiographically sclerotic circular or ovoid lesions are usually symmetrically distributed in a periarticular location. Lesions can increase or decrease in size and number in serial radiographs or even disappear and do not have increased bone radiotracer uptake.	骨斑点症是骨良性，无症状硬化发育不良。它影响男性和女性，并且可以看出，在任何年龄。 X线片硬化圆形或卵圆形病灶，通常对称地分布在关节周围的位置。病变可以增加或减少在尺寸和数量中的串行X光片或甚至消失，没有增加的骨放射性摄取。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010740	Osteopathia striata	纹状骨病	A lamellar pattern visible on radiographs and mainly localized at the metaphyses of the long tubular bones. Pathologic-anatomical studies revealed that these benign signs on x-rays are the result of a juvenile metaphyseal bone necrosis. Calcifications in the necrotic marrow lead to this lamellar or lattice-like appearance.	层状模式的X光片可见，主要定位于长管状骨的干骺端。病理解剖的研究显示，在X射线这些良性迹象少年干骺端骨坏死的结果。钙化在坏死骨髓导致此层状或格子状的外观。
四肢异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010741	Edema of the lower limbs	下肢水肿	An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the legs.	流体的腿的皮肤下的异常积累。
四肢异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010742	Edema of the upper limbs	上肢水肿	An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the arms.	流体的手臂皮肤之下的异常堆积。

头或颈部的异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010749	Blepharochalasis	眼皮松弛	Blepharochalasis is characterized by recurrent, non-painful, nonerythematous episodes of eyelid edema. It has been divided into hypertrophic and atrophic forms. In the hypertrophic form recurrent edema results in orbital fat herniation through a weakened orbital septum. Most patients who have blepharochalasis present in an atrophic condition with atrophy of redundant eyelid skin and superior nasal fat pads.	眼皮松弛的特征是复发性、非疼痛、非红肿的眼睑水肿发作。它被分成肥厚型和萎缩型。肥厚型反复水肿导致眼眶脂肪疝压迫穿透弱化的眶隔。大多数萎缩型眼皮松弛患者有萎缩的冗余眼睑皮肤和上鼻脂肪垫。

体壁的异常	HP:0010814	Abnormal position of hair whorl	毛发螺纹的位置异常	Hair growth from a single point on the scalp in any location other than lateral to the midline and close to the vertex of the skull.	毛发从头皮的任意一个部位生长，而不仅仅是从头皮中线和颅骨顶点的附近。
体壁的异常	HP:0010815	Nevus sebaceous	皮脂腺痣	A congenital, hairless plaque consisting of overgrown epidermis, sebaceous glands, hair follicles, apocrine glands and connective tissue. They are a variant of epidermal naevi. Sebaceous naevi most often appear on the scalp, but they may also arise on the face, neck or forehead. At birth, a sevaceous nevus typically appears as a solitary, smooth, yellow-orange hairless patch. Sebaceous naevi become more pronounced around adolescence, often appearing bumpy, warty or scaly.	皮脂腺痣是先天性的表面光滑无毛发的隆起皮损，由增生的表皮、皮脂腺、毛囊、汗腺腺体和结缔组织构成，是表皮痣的一个变种，常发生在头皮、面、颈部及前额。出生时，多为孤立光滑、无毛发的橙黄色斑点。在青春期，皮损更加明显，呈乳头瘤样、疣状或鳞片状。
体壁的异常	HP:0010816	Epidermal nevus	单侧痣、线状表皮痣、疣状表皮痣	Epidermal naevi are due to an overgrowth of the epidermis and may be present at birth (50%) or develop during childhood.	表皮痣是因表皮过度增生所致，可在出生时即有（50%）或在幼儿期出现。
体壁的异常	HP:0010817	Linear nevus sebaceous	线状皮脂腺痣	A type of `nevus sebaceous` (HP:0010815) with a linear form, raised borders and yellowish color.	皮脂腺痣的一种，呈线型，外观淡黄色，边缘隆起。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010818	Generalized tonic seizures	全面性强直发作	Generalized seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction lasting a few seconds to minutes.	全身性发作，肌肉收缩持续增强持续几秒钟到几分钟。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010819	Atonic seizures	失张力癫痫发作	Seizures characterized by a sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone, which may be fragmentary, confined to a segment (limb, jaw, head), or massive, leading to a slumping to the ground .	一种癫痫发作，其特征在于突然丧失肌肉张力，可以是局部的张力减低，局限在一个节段（肢，颚，头），或块状，导致患者下滑到地面。

眼睛的异常	HP:0010822	Scintillating scotoma	闪烁的暗点	A scintillating scotoma is a common visual aura that can preced a migraine, whereby a spot of flickering light near the center of the visual fields occurs. The spot prevents vision, and is thus termed scotoma. The scotoma can extend into one or more shimmering arcs of white or colored flashing lights.	一个闪烁的暗点是一种常见的视觉先兆，可以是偏头痛的先兆，其中闪烁的灯光附近的视野中心的点出现。盲点可延伸进入白色或有色闪灯一个或多个波光弧。

神经系统的异常	HP:0010828	Hemifacial spasm	偏侧面肌痉挛	A segmental myoclonus of muscles innervated by the facial nerve.	面神经支配肌肉的节段性肌阵挛。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010829	Impaired temperature sensation	温度觉障碍	A reduced ability to discriminate between different temperatures.	辨别不同温度的能力下降。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010830	Impaired tactile sensation	触觉障碍	A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation). This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel's hair brush, by asking patients to say 'now' each time they feel the stimulus.	触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010831	Impaired proprioception	本体感觉障碍	A loss or impairment of the sensation of the relative position of parts of the body and joint position.	身体相应的位置和关节位置感觉的损害或缺失。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010832	Abnormality of pain sensation	痛觉异常	Pain is an unpleasant sensation that can range from mild, localized discomfort to agony, whereby the physical part of pain results from nerve stimulation and is often accompanied by an emotional component. This term groups abnormalities in pain sensation presumed to result from abnormalities related to the specific nerve fibers that carry the pain impulses to the brain.	疼痛是一种不愉快的感觉，其程度从轻微、局部的不适感、到痛苦，由此物理性的疼痛来源于神经刺激，并经常伴随情绪性因素。痛觉异常，推测是由于的向大脑传递痛觉冲动的特定神经纤维异常所导致的。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010833	Spontaneous pain sensation	自发性疼痛感	Spontaneous pain is a kind of neuropathic pain which occurs without an identifiable trigger.	自发痛是一种神经性疼痛其发生没有明确的诱发因素。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010834	Trophic changes related to pain	与疼痛相关的营养改变	Trophic changes is a term used to describe abnormalities in the area of pain that include primarily wasting away of the skin, tissues, or muscle, thinning of the bones, and changes in how the hair or nails grow, including thickening or thinning of hair or brittle nails.	营养改变是用于描述疼痛区域的异常包括主要消瘦的皮肤、组织或肌肉，变薄的骨头，头发或指甲生长方式的改变，包括增稠或头发稀疏或指甲变脆。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010835	Dissociated sensory loss	分离性感觉缺失	A pattern of sensory loss with selective loss of touch sensation and proprioception without loss of pain and temperature, or vice-versa.	一种感觉障碍，特点是选择性的触觉和本体感觉缺失，而痛温觉正常，反之亦然。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010836	Abnormality of copper homeostasis	铜稳态平衡异常	An `abnormal` ( PATO:0000460) `concentration` (PATO:0000033) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694).	`异常`（PATO:0000460）的`铜`（CHEBI:28694）`浓度`（0000033 PATO）。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010837	Decreased serum ceruloplasmin	血清铜蓝蛋白降低	A kind of `Abnormality of copper homeostasis` (HP:0010836) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	一种'铜homeostasis`异常（HP:0010836）中的`blood`（FMA:9670）:对`ceruloplasmin`（000005794 PR）相关的`下降concentration`（0001163 PATO）。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010838	High nonceruloplasmin-bound serum copper	高浓度非铜蓝蛋白结合型血清铜离子	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of non `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) bound `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	非`ceruloplasmin`（PR:000005794）的约束`copper`（CHEBI:28694）在`blood`（FMA:9670）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010839	Increased urinary copper concentration	尿液铜浓度增高	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	的`copper`（CHEBI:28694）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）在`urine`（FMA:12274）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010841	Multifocal epileptiform discharges	多灶性痫样放电	A abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG) and being identified at multiple locations (foci).	由脑电图记录到的多灶的大脑异常放电活动
神经系统的异常	HP:0010843	EEG with focal slow activity	脑电图局灶性慢活动	Focal (localized) slow activity reflects focal dysfunction, not diffuse dysfunction (i.e., encephalopathy).	局灶（局部）慢活动反映局灶脑功能障碍，而不是弥散脑功能障碍（即脑病）。

神经系统的异常	HP:0010847	EEG with spike-wave complexes (<2.5 Hz)	脑电图，（慢）棘慢复合波（<2.5赫兹）	The presence of complexes of slow spikes and slow waves (<2.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（<2.5赫兹）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010848	EEG with spike-wave complexes (2.5-3.5 Hz)	脑电图，棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）	The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (2.5-3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（2.5?3.5赫兹）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010849	EEG with spike-wave complexes (>3.5 Hz)	脑电图，（快）棘慢复合波（> 3.5赫兹）	The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (>3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（> 3.5赫兹）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010850	EEG with spike-wave complexes	脑电图，棘慢复合波	Complexes of spikes (<70 ms) and sharp waves (70-200 ms), which are sharp transient waves that have a strong association with epilepsy, in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动:棘波（<70毫秒）和尖波（70-200毫秒）的复合波，这是与癫痫密切相关的短暂尖波。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010851	EEG with burst suppression	EEG伴暴发抑制	The burst suppression pattern in electroencephalography refers to a characteristic periodic pattern of low voltage (<10 microvolts) suppressed background and a relatively shorter pattern of higher amplitude slow, sharp, and spiking complexes.	在脑电图中爆发抑制模式指的是低电压（<10微伏）抑制背景和相对较短模式的较高波幅慢波，尖波，和棘波交替反复出现的波形。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010852	EEG with photoparoxysmal response	脑电图，光阵发性反应	EEG abnormalities (epileptiform discharges) evoked by flashing lights or black and white striped patterns.	脑电图异常（癫痫样放电）由闪光刺激或黑色和白色条纹的图案诱发。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010853	EEG with periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges	脑电图，周期性一侧性癫痫样放电	Periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges (PLEDs)are periodic, lateralized, and epileptiform. PLEDs show a relatively constant interval between discharges (0.5 to 3 seconds).	周期性一侧性癫痫样放电（PLEDs）是指癫痫样波在单侧周期性出现 PLEDs显示放电以相对恒定的时间间隔（0.5至3秒）出现。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010854	EEG with generalized low amplitude activity	脑电图，广泛性低波幅活动	An abnormal generalized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动，波幅普遍异常降低。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010855	EEG with localized low amplitude activity	脑电图，局部低波幅活动	An abnormal localized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的局部异常波幅降低脑电活动。

神经系统的异常	HP:0010858	EEG with hyperventilation-induced epileptiform discharges	脑电图，过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电	Epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0010859	Frank breech presentation	Frank臀先露	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are extended.	“臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿双髋关节屈曲,双膝关节直伸。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0010860	Complete breech presentation	完全臀先露	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are flexed.	“臀先露”的一种（HP:0001623），胎儿髋关节及膝关节均屈曲。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0010861	Incomplete breech presentation	不完全臀先露	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which one or both hips are extended and one or both of the fetus' feet are pointing down and entering the birth canal.	“臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿单侧或双侧髋关节直伸，胎儿一足或双足向下先进入产道。

神经系统的异常	HP:0010864	Intellectual disability, severe	重度智力残疾	Severe mental retardation is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) in the range of 20-34.	重度精神发育迟滞定义为智商（IQ）在20-34的范围内。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010865	Oppositional defiant disorder	对立违抗性障碍	An enduring pattern of uncooperative, defiant, and hostile behavior toward authority figures that does not involve major antisocial violations, is not accounted for by the child's developmental stage, and results in significant functional impairment. A certain level of oppositional behavior is common in children and adolescents.	一种不合作，挑衅和敌对权威人物的持久的模式，但不包括严重的反社会行为。此行为不能被儿童的发育阶段所解释，可导致严重的功能受损。但在儿童和青少年中一定程度的反抗行为是正常。

神经系统的异常	HP:0010867	Dyssynergia	协同失调	A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed. With dyssynergia, a voluntary movement appears broken down into its component parts.	`共济失调`(HP:0001251)的一种，表现为按照适当的顺序和速度进行的随意运动能力受损。协调失调时，随意运动表现为它的组成部分的分解动作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010868	Ocular dyssynergia	眼协同失调	A type of `dyssynergia` (HP:0010867) affecting eye movements and characterized by the inability to smoothly follow a visual target across the visual field.	一种影响眼球运动的以无法流畅的在视野中追踪物体为特征的眼协同失调
神经系统的异常	HP:0010869	Asynergia	协调不能	A type of `dyssynergy` (HP:0010867) characterized by the lack of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed.	一种类型的`协调障碍`（HP:0010867），特点是缺乏以适当的顺序和速度平稳进行随意运动的能力。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010871	Sensory ataxia	感觉性共济失调	Incoordination of movement caused by a deficit in the sensory nervous system. Sensory ataxia can be distinguished from cerebellar ataxia by asking the patient to close his or her eyes. Persons with cerebellar ataxia show only a minimal worsening of symptoms, whereas persons with sensory ataxia show a marked worsening of symptoms.	由于感觉神经系统功能障碍导致的运动不协调。可以通过让患者闭眼区分感觉性共济失调和小脑性共济失调。小脑性共济失调的人只显示轻微的症状恶化，而感觉性共济失调的人显示出显著的症状恶化。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0010872	EKG: T-wave inversion	心电图:T波倒置	An inversion of the T-wave (which is normally positive).	T波的倒置（通常是正的）。

骨骼系统的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0010874	Tendon xanthomatosis	腱黄脂瘤病	The presence of xanthomas (intra-and extra-cellular accumulations of cholesterol) extensor tendons (typically over knuckles, Achilles tendon, knee, and elbows).	在伸肌腱（通常在指关节、跟腱、膝和肘关节处皮肤）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010875	Chaddock reflex	查多克反射	A diagnostic reflex elicited by stimulation of the skin over the surface of the lateral malleolus of the foot. The Chaddock reflex is present if there is extension of one or more or all of the toes with or without fanning of them when the external inframalleolar skin is stimulated. The Chaddock sign, similar to the Babinski sign, is taken to be an indication of disease of the spinocortical (pyramidal) tract.	刺激外踝下方足背外缘的皮肤引出的一种诊断性反射。如果刺激下踝外侧皮肤时出现一个、多个或所有脚趾背伸（伴或不伴扇形展开）为查多克反射阳性。查多克征与巴宾斯基征类似，被视为皮质脊髓（锥体）束受损的体征。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010876	Abnormality of circulating protein level	循环系统内的蛋白水平异常	An abnormal level of a circulating `protein` (CHEBI:16541) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	`血液 `（FMA:9670）中循环`蛋白`(CHEBI:16541)的水平异常。

胎儿发育或出生异常;头或颈部的异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0010878	Fetal cystic hygroma	胎儿囊状水瘤	The presence during the prenatal period of a cystic mass with multiple septa with multiple, asymmetric, thin-walled cysts near the posterior aspect of the neck. Fetal cystic hygroma can be defined as nuchal translucency with or without septations measuring greater than 3.0 mm.	产前期间出现，颈部后方附近的囊性包块，由多个隔片及多个不对称的薄壁包囊组成。胎囊状水瘤可以被定义为有或没有分隔的长度大于3毫米的颈部半透明物。

四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010884	Acromelia	肢端短缩	Shortening of the extremities affecting primarily the distal parts of the limbs (hands and feet) in relation to the other segments of the limbs.	缩短影响四肢（手和脚）与四肢的其他分部主要是末梢部位四肢。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010885	Aseptic necrosis	无菌性骨坏死	A disease where there is cellular death (necrosis) of bone components due to interruption of the blood supply.	疾病哪里有骨部件的细胞死亡（坏死）由于血液供应中断。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010886	Osteochondrosis dissecans	骨软骨炎	A joint disorder caused by blood deprivation in the subchondral bone causing the subchondral bone to die in a process called avascular necrosis. The bone is then reabsorbed by the body, leaving the articular cartilage it supported prone to damage. The result is fragmentation (dissection) of both cartilage and bone, and the free movement of these osteochondral fragments within the joint space, causing pain and further damage.	联合障碍软骨下骨致气血匮乏引起软骨下骨死在一个称为股骨头缺血性坏死的过程。骨然后由身体再吸收，而使关节软骨它支持容易损坏。其结果是既软骨和骨，且这些骨软骨碎片的关节间隙内的自由运动，引起疼痛和进一步的损害的碎片（夹层）。
四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0010888	Morbus Koehler	克勒病	Morbus Koehler is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os naviculare pedis.	Morbus克勒是一个'少年无菌necrosis`（HP:0100323）影响O的舟骨足癣。

眼睛的异常	HP:0010920	Zonular cataract	板层状白内障	Zonular cataracts are defined to be cataracts that affect specific regions of the lens.	板层白内障被定义为晶状体特定区域的白内障。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010921	Coralliform cataract	珊瑚状白内障	A 'coral-like' pattern of opacity in the lens of the eye. That is, a cataract with an irregular, stellate form.	晶状体上“珊瑚状”的浑浊。即，具有不规则，星状形式白内障。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010922	Membranous cataract	膜性白内障	A form of cataract in which the lens substance has shrunk, leaving a collapsed, flattened capsule with little or no cortex or epithelium on the lens.	一种特殊类型白内障，晶体物质缩小，压平囊膜，晶体上很少或没有皮质或上皮细胞。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010923	Anterior subcapsular cataract	前囊下白内障	A type of cataract affecting the `Anterior pole of lens` (FMA:58897) immediately adjacent to ('beneath') the `Lens capsule` (FMA:58881).	白内障影响晶状体的前极（FMA:58897），紧邻晶状体前囊膜`（FMA:58881）。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010924	Posterior cortical cataract	后皮质型白内障	A `cataract` (HP:0000518) that affects the posterior part of the `cortex of the lens` (FMA:58970).	此型白内障主要累及晶体后方的皮质。
眼睛的异常	HP:0010925	Nuclear punctate cataract	核性点状白内障	Nuclear punctate cataract， one type of cataract	白内障的一种，核性点状白内障
眼睛的异常	HP:0010926	Aculeiform cataract	Aculeiform 白内障	A kind of nuclear cataract characterized by fiberglasslike or needlelike crystals projecting in different directions, through or close to the axial region of the lens.	一种核性白内障的特征在于玻璃纤维状或针状晶体突起呈放射状排列，主要位于晶体的瞳孔区。

胎儿发育或出生异常;心血管系统的异常	HP:0010942	Echogenic intracardiac focus	心室强光点	A finding of a focus of increased echogenicity upon prenatal ultrasound examination of the fetus. The foci may be present in one or both ventricles. Echogenic intracardiac focus (EICF) is defined as a focus of echogenicity comparable to bone, in the region of the papillary muscle in either or both ventricles of the fetal heart.	心室强光点是因产前超声检查关注于胎儿超声回声增强而发现的。强光点可出现在一个或两个心室内。心室强光点是指胎儿心室内的、与邻近肋骨回声相似的超声现象，这种回声光点一般出现于一个或两个心室的乳突肌内。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0010943	Echogenic fetal bowel	胎儿肠管回声增强	Echogenic bowel is defined as fetal bowel with homogenous areas of echogenicity that are equal to or greater than that of surrounding bone.	肠管回声增强是指胎儿肠管回声强度接近或高于其周围骨骼回声的强度。
泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0010944	Abnormality of the renal pelvis	肾盂异常	An abnormality of the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).	肾盂的异常。
胎儿发育或出生异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0010945	Fetal pyelectasis	胎儿肾盂扩张	Mild pyelectasis is defined as a hypoechoic spherical or elliptical space within the renal pelvis that measures at least 5mm and not more than 10 mm. The measurement is taken on a transverse section through the fetal renal pelvis using the maximum anterior-to-posterior measurement.	轻度肾盂扩张被定义为超声检查时低回声球形或椭圆形的肾盂扩大，起码是5毫米以上但不超过10毫米。测量时取横截面，通过胎儿肾盂，采集最大前后径。
泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0010946	Dilatation of the renal pelvis	肾盂扩张	The presence of `dilatation` (MPATH:66) of the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).	肾盂呈扩张状态。

神经系统的异常;胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0010952	Mild fetal ventriculomegaly	轻度胎儿脑室扩大	A kind of `ventriculomegaly` (HP:0002119) occurring in the fetal period and usually diagnosed by prenatal ultrasound. Cerebral ventriculomegaly is defined by atrial measurements 10 mm or more. Mild ventriculomegaly (MVM) is defined as measurements between 10 and 15 mm. Measurements are obtained from an axial plane at the level of the thalamic nuclei just below the standard image to measure the BPD (pmid:16100637).	发生于胎儿期的脑室扩大（HP:0002119）的一种类型，通常利用产前超声诊断。脑室扩大定义为是体径10mm以上。轻度脑室扩大（MVM）定义为10至15毫米之间。从丘脑核团水平的轴位完成测量，刚好低于测量BPD（PMID:16100637）的标准图像。
神经系统的异常	HP:0010953	Noncommunicating hydrocephalus	非交通性脑积水	A form of `hydrocephalus` (HP:0000238) in which the flow of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) within the cerebral ventricular system or in the outlets of the CSF to the arachnoid space is obstructed.	引流脑脊液的脑室系统或蛛网膜下腔阻塞后导致的一种脑积水
