泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0010957	Congenital posterior urethral valve	先天性后尿道瓣膜	A developmental defect resulting in an obstructing membrane in the posterior male urethra.	一种发育异常，导致男性后尿道发生瓣膜状阻塞。
泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0010958	Bilateral renal agenesis	双侧肾发育不全	A `bilateral` (PATO:0000618) form of `agenesis` (MPATH:57) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	双肾发育不全。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010959	Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of the lung	先天性肺囊性腺瘤样畸形	Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation (CCAM) can be diagnosed prenatally if ultrasound shows a cystic or solid lung tumor. A CCAM does not have systemic arterial blood supply (in contrast to bronchopulmonary sequenstration). It is a cystic area within the lung that originates from abnormal embryogenesis.	先天性囊性腺瘤样畸形（CCAM）可以在产前诊断，超声可显示囊性或实性肺癌。CCAM不具有全身动脉血液供应（与支气管肺隔离症相反），它是源自胚胎发育畸形的肺内的囊性区域。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010960	Bronchopulmonary sequestration	支气管肺隔离症	The presence of microscopic cystic masses of nonfunctioning pulmonary tissue that lack an obvious communication with the tracheobronchial tree.	无功能肺组织的囊性肿块（显微镜下改变），与气管支气管树不相通。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010961	Intralobar sequestration	叶内型肺隔离症	A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is incorporated into the normal surrounding lung.	与周围正常肺成为一体的一种支气管肺隔离症。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010962	Extralobar sequestration	叶外型肺隔离症	A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is completely discrete from the normal lung and is surrounded by separate pleura.	支气管肺隔离症一种，它是与正常的肺完全不连续，并被独立的胸膜包围。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0010963	Absence of stomach bubble on fetal sonography	胎儿超声下胃泡缺如	By the 14th week of gestation it is nearly always possible to visualized the fluid-filled fetal stomach bubble on prenatal sonography. This term refers to the absence of a normal fetal stomach bubble on fetal ultrasonography performed at around 16 to 20 weeks' gestation.	孕14周产前超声可见充盈的胎儿胃泡。这个术语指的是孕16~20周超声下胎儿胃泡未显示。

免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常	HP:0010975	Abnormality of B cell number	B细胞数量异常	A deviation from the normal count of `B cells` (CL:0000236), i.e., the cells that are formed in the bone marrow, migrate to the peripheral lymphatic system, and mature into plasma cells or memory cells.	B细胞（CL:0000236）的数量异常。B细胞在骨髓成熟后迁移到外周血淋巴系统，并分化为浆细胞或记忆细胞。

遗传模式	HP:0010982	Polygenic inheritance	多基因遗传	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of many (more than three) gene loci.	
遗传模式	HP:0010983	Oligogenic inheritance	寡基因遗传	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of a few gene loci. It is recommended this term be used for traits governed by three loci, although it is noted that usage of this term in the literature is not uniform.	
遗传模式	HP:0010984	Digenic inheritance	双基因遗传	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of two gene loci.	
遗传模式	HP:0010985	Gonosomal inheritance	性连锁遗传	A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on the sex chromosomes.

神经系统的异常	HP:0011098	Speech apraxia	失读症	A type of apraxia that is characterized by difficulty or inability to execute speech movements because of problems with coordination and motor problems, leading to incorrect articulation. An increase of errors with increasing word and phrase length may occur.	是一种失用的，其特征因为协调和运动问题导致执行语言运动困难或不能，从而导致不正确发音。随着单词和短语的长度的增加发生的错误的可能性也会增加。

消化系统的异常	HP:0011128	Acute esophageal necrosis	急性食管坏死	A condition characterized by necrosis of the mucosal and submucosal layers of the esophagus not related to ingestion of caustic or other injurious agents. Endoscopically, there is a dark lesion ('black esophagus') distributed in a circumferential manner in the distal one-third of the esophagus with or without exudates. There is involvement of the distal esophagus ending sharply at the gastroesophageal junction.	其特征在于食管粘膜或粘膜下层坏死，这种坏死与腐蚀剂或其他有害物质的摄入无关。内窥镜观察会发现有黑色病灶（“黑食管”），环绕食管远端1/3分布，有或无渗出液。涉及食管下端，止于胃食管交界处。

体壁的异常	HP:0011138	Abnormality of skin adnexa	皮肤附属器的异常	An abnormality of the skin adnexa (skin appendages), which are specialized skin structures located within the dermis and focally within the subcutaneous fatty tissue, comprising three histologically distinct structures: (1) the pilosebaceous unit (hair follicle and sebaceous glands); (2) the eccrine sweat glands; and (3) the apocrine glands.	皮肤附属器（皮肤附件），是位于真皮和皮下脂肪组织灶性内的特殊皮肤结构，其异常包括三个不同的组织学结构的异常:（1）毛皮脂单位（毛囊和皮脂腺）; （2）小汗腺; （3）大汗腺。

神经系统的异常	HP:0011145	Symptomatic seizures	症状性发作	A seizure that occurs in the context of a brain insult (systemic, toxic, or metabolic) and may not recur when the underlying cause has been removed or the acute phase has elapsed.	在脑损伤（全身，有毒，或代谢）的基础上发生的癫痫发作，当去除潜在的病因或急性期过去后可能不会再发。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011146	Dialeptic seizures	呆滞性癫痫发作	Seizures characterized by impaired consciousness.	以意识障碍为特征的癫痫发作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011147	Typical absence seizures	典型的失神发作	Typical absences are brief for seconds generalized epileptic seizures of abrupt onset and abrupt termination with impairment of consciousness.	典型的失神是短至数秒的全面性癫痫发作，突发突止并伴意识受损。

神经系统的异常	HP:0011150	Myoclonic absences	肌阵挛性失神	Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by rhythmic bilateral myoclonias of the arms and shoulders synchronous with EEG discharges, with additional tonic components of the arms.	具有双侧手臂和肩膀节律性肌阵挛可在脑电图记录到异常放电的失神发作，同时可伴有手臂强直发作
神经系统的异常	HP:0011151	Obtundation status	迟钝状态	Atypical absence lasting for more than 30 minutes.	不典型失神持续超过30分钟。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011152	Early onset absence seizures	早发性失神发作	Typical absence seizures starting before the age of 4 years.	4岁之前开始的典型失神发作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011153	Focal motor seizures	局灶性运动性癫痫发作	Focal seizures involving musculature in any form.	任何形式累及肌肉组织的局灶性癫痫发作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011154	Focal autonomic seizures	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作	Focal seizures with an objectively documented and distinct alteration of autonomic nervous system function involving cardiovascular, pupillary, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregularity functions.	涉及心脑血管，瞳孔，胃肠道，泌汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能等自主神经系统功能特定改变的客观可记录到的局灶性发作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011155	Focal autonomic seizures with altered responsiveness	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作伴反应改变	An autonomic seizure with altered responsiveness.	自主神经发作伴反应的改变。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011156	Focal autonomic seizures without altered responsiveness	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作不伴反应改变	An autonomic seizure without altered responsiveness.	植物神经发作不伴反应的改变。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011157	Auras	先兆	Subjective ictal phenomena that, in a given patient, may precede observable seizures; if alone, constitute a if alone, constitute a simple partial seizure.	主观突发现象，在有些特定患者中，可能出现于可观察到的癫痫发作之前;如果单独出现，构成单纯部分性发作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011158	Auditory auras	听觉先兆	Auras with sensations of buzzing, drumming sounds or single tones.	听到耳朵里有嗡嗡声、击鼓声或单一响声的感觉。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011159	Epigastric auras	上腹先兆	Auras with abdominal discomfort including nausea, emptiness, tightness, churning, butterflies, malaise, pain, and hunger; sensation may rise to chest or throat. Some phenomena may reflect ictal autonomic dysfunction.	腹部不适的先兆，包括恶心、空虚、发紧、翻腾、翻动、不舒服、疼痛和饥饿；感觉可能上升到胸部或喉部。可能反应了发作性自主神经功能障碍的一些现象。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011160	Gustatory auras	味觉先兆	Auras with taste sensations including acidic, bitter, salty , sweet or metallic tastes.	味觉的先兆，包括酸，苦，咸，甜或金属的味道。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011161	Olfactory Auras	嗅觉先兆	Auras with sensation of odor, usually disagreeable.	伴有异常气味的、不愉快的先兆
神经系统的异常	HP:0011162	Psychic auras	通灵先兆	Auras with affective, mnemonic or composite perceptual phenomena including illusory or composite hallucinatory events.	与情感，记忆或复合知觉现象，包括虚幻的或复合幻觉事件相关的先兆
神经系统的异常	HP:0011163	Somatosensory auras	躯体感觉先兆	Auras with sensation of tingling, numbness, electric shock sensations, pain, sense of movement, or desire to move.	先兆伴随刺痛感，麻木，触电的感觉，疼痛，运动感，或想要活动。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011164	Vegetative auras	植物神经性癫痫	A sensation consistent with involvement of the autonomic nervous system, including cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregulatory functions.	一种与自主神经系统受累相一致的感觉，包括心血管，胃肠，排汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011165	Visual auras	视觉先兆	Auras with sensation of flashing or flickering lights, spots, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis.	先兆伴有与闪烁感或闪烁的灯光、点、单一相、暗点、或黑蒙。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011166	Focal myoclonic seizures	局灶肌阵挛发作		
神经系统的异常	HP:0011167	Focal tonic seizures	局灶性强直发作	Seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction in parts of the body lasting a few seconds to minutes.	癫痫发作，身体局部肌肉收缩持续增强，持续几秒钟到几分钟。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011168	Eyelid myoclonias	眼睑肌阵挛	Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.	表现为眼睑肌阵挛的局灶性癫痫发作，不是失神发作情况下的眼睑肌阵挛。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011169	Generalized clonic seizures	全面性阵挛性发作	Seizures with regularly repetitive myoclonus, involving the same muscle groups, at a frequency of about 2-3 c/sec.	癫痫发作，表现为累及同一肌群的规律重复的肌阵挛，频率约为2-3次/秒。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011170	Myoclonic atonic seizures	肌阵挛失张力发作	Seizures with sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone with a preceding myoclonic or tonic event lasting one to two seconds or more, involving head, trunk, jaw or limb musculature.	癫痫发作突然丢失或肌张力的缩小与前面的肌阵挛或强直性事件一至两秒以上，涉及头部，躯干，下颌或肢体肌肉组织。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011171	Simple febrile seizures	单纯型热性惊厥	Febrile seizures with generalized tonic-clonic semiology, duration less than 15 minutes, and without recurrence within the next 24 hours.	热性惊厥表现为全身强直 - 阵挛症状，持续时间不超过15分钟，且接下来的24小时之内无复发。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011172	Complex febrile seizures	复杂性高热惊厥	Febrile seizures with focal semiology, duration of more than 15 minutes, or occurring in a cluster of 2 or more convulsions within 24 hours.	有局灶性症状的高热惊厥，持续时间超过15分钟，或在24小时内连续惊厥发作2次以上。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011173	Hypokinetic seizures	少动型癫痫发作	Seizures with a decrease in amplitude and/or rate or arrest of ongoing motor activity.	伴随正进行地活动停止和/或幅度减低的癫痫发作。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011174	Hyperkinetic seizures	多动性发作	Seizures with increase in rate of ongoing movements or inappropriately rapid performance of a movement involving predominantly proximal limb or axial muscles producing irregular sequential ballistic movements, such as pedaling, pelvic thrashing, rocking movements.	持续的运动或不适当的快速运动加重的一种癫痫发作，主要累及近端肢体或中轴的肌肉产生不规则的序列的投射样运动，如蹬踏，骨盆抖动，摇摆样运动。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011175	Versive seizures	旋转性癫痫	Tonic seizures with a sustained, forced conjugate ocular, cephalic and/or truncal rotation or lateral deviation from the midline.	强直性发作伴持续的、强迫性眼部共轭运动，头部和/或躯干旋转或向一侧歪斜。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011176	EEG with constitutional variants	脑电图固有变异	An EEG with constitutional variants contains waves that are rare or unusual but not generally pathologic.	脑电图固有变异指包含一些罕见或不寻常的波形，但通常不是病理性的。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011177	EEG with 4-5/second background activity	4-5次 /秒的脑电图背景活动	EEG background activity at 4-5/second.	脑电图背景活动为4-5次 /秒。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011178	Alpha-EEG	阿尔法脑波	EEG dominated by diffuse alpha-waves (8-13Hz).	脑电图占主导地位的脑波，alpha波（8-13Hz）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011179	Beta-EEG	β型脑电图	EEG dominated by diffuse beta-waves (>13 Hz).	弥漫性β波（> 13赫兹）为主导的脑电图。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011180	Partial beta-EEG	部分 β-脑电图	EEG dominated by diffuse beta waves (>13 Hz) with occipitally localized alpha waves (8-13 Hz).	脑电图占主导地位的弥漫性β波（> 13赫兹）与occipitally本地化的α波（8-13赫兹）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011181	Low voltage EEG	低波幅脑电图	Set definition of ID:0000013 to "EEG with an amplitude less than 30 microvolts without observable occipital alpha rhythm (8-13 Hz).	定义为:脑电图波幅低于30微伏且没有明显的枕区阿尔法节律（8-13赫兹）。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011182	Epileptiform EEG discharges	癫痫样放电脑电图	Electroencephalographic patterns that resemble epileptogenic abnormalities.	显示癫痫源异常的脑电图模式。

神经系统的异常	HP:0011185	EEG with focal epileptiform discharges	脑电图局灶性癫痫样放电	EEG discharges recorded in particular areas of the A localized (focal) abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动中，在一个局部（局灶）特定区域异的EEG放电。

神经系统的异常	HP:0011187	Focal EEG discharges with propagation to ipsilateral hemisphere	脑电图局灶性放电，传播到同侧半球	Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to the hemisphere on the same side of the brain.	局灶性癫痫样放电0011186，扩散到同一侧大脑半球。

耳朵的异常	HP:0011235	Additional crus of antihelix	对耳轮脚多余	Supernumerary ridge or crus of the ear arising from the antihelix.	对轮脚延伸出多余的脊或凸起。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011236	Angulated antihelix	对耳轮棱型	Antihelical ridge that forms an acute angle between the antitragus and its bifurcation (stem) instead of a gently curving arc.	对耳轮脊形成对耳屏及其分叉（干）之间的锐角，而不是一个平缓弯曲的弧线。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011237	Broad inferior crus of antihelix	对耳轮下脚宽	Increased width of the inferred cross-section of the inferior crus.	下角横截面导致的宽度增加。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011238	Prominent inferior crus of antihelix	对耳轮下脚突出	Increased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.	与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出增加。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011239	Underdeveloped inferior crus of antihelix	对耳轮下脚发育不良	Decreased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.	与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出减少。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011240	Prominent stem of antihelix	对耳轮干突出	Increased protrusion of the antihelical ridge, proximal to its bifurcation, relative to the prominence of the helix.	与耳轮的突出相比，接近分叉处的对耳轮脊的突出增加。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011241	Serpiginous stem of antihelix	匐行性对耳轮干	Posterior curving of the antihelix from its origin at the antitragus, traveling initially almost perpendicular to the descending helix and obscuring some of the concha.	后路从它的起源对耳轮的弯曲的耳屏，最初旅行几乎垂直的下降螺旋和模糊一些外耳的。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011242	Underdeveloped stem of antihelix	对耳轮干发育不良	Decreased protrusion of the antihelical ridge, proximal to its bifurcation, relative to the prominence of a normal helix.	与正常耳轮的突出相比，接近分叉处的对耳轮脊的突出减少。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011243	Abnormality of inferior crus of antihelix	对耳轮下脚异常	An abnormality of the inferior crus of the antihelix is the lower cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.	对耳轮下脚异常是对耳轮脚螺旋上升至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚，在此皱襞下方软骨脊的产生。。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011244	Abnormality of stem of antihelix	对耳轮干异常	An abnormality of the stem of the antihelix, which is the part below the bifurcation of the antihelix into the inferior and superior crura.	对耳轮干异常，指对耳轮分叉为上、下脚的叉口下方的干部异常。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011245	Abnormality of superior crus of antihelix	对耳轮上脚异常	An abnormality of the superior crus of the antihelix is the upper cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.	对耳轮上脚异常是对耳轮脚螺旋上升至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚，在此皱襞上方软骨脊的产生。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011246	Underdeveloped superior crus of antihelix	对耳轮上脚发育不良	Decreased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.	与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出减少。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011247	Prominent superior crus of antihelix	对耳轮上脚突出	Increased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.	与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出增加。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011248	Everted antitragus	对耳屏外翻	Positioning of the antitragus at an angle perpendicular to the plane of the ear (oriented away from the plane of the ear).	对耳屏在垂直于耳的平面的角度定位（从耳的平面取向的距离）。对耳屏与耳朵平面垂直成角（方向是远离耳朵平面）
耳朵的异常	HP:0011249	Absent antitragus	耳屏缺失	Absence of the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.	切迹的底部和对耳轮的内缘之间的区域的前上突出的缺失。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011250	Bifid antitragus	对耳屏裂	Double rather than single peak of the antitragus.	对耳屏双峰，而不是单峰。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011251	Underdeveloped antitragus	对耳屏发育不良	Reduction in the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.	切迹底部和对耳轮内缘之间区域的前上部分突出减少。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011252	Cryptotia	隐耳	Invagination of the superior part of the auricle under a fold of temporal skin.	耳廓软骨上端隐入颞部头皮的皮下。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011253	Type I cryptotia	Ⅰ型隐耳	A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and superior crus.	与对耳轮和其上脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011254	Type II cryptotia	Ⅱ型隐耳	A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and inferior crus that are affected.	与对耳轮和其下脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。
骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常	HP:0011255	Absent crus of helix	耳轮脚缺失	Continuum between the tragus and ascending helix, without any evidence of a posterior extension (crus) towards the concha.	耳屏和上升耳轮之间连续，没有一个后伸（小腿）朝向外耳的任何证据。
骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常	HP:0011256	Crus of helix connected to antihelix	耳轮脚与对耳轮粘连	Extension of the ridge of the crus helix across the ear and connection of the crus to the antihelix.	穿过耳和对耳轮脚连接处的耳轮脚脊的延伸。
骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常	HP:0011257	Serpiginous crus of helix	匐行性耳轮脚	Curving course of the crus of the helix, approaching or joining the antitragus.	耳轮脚卷曲过程中接近或结合到对耳屏。
骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常	HP:0011258	Tragal bridge of crus of helix	耳前切迹	The anterior origin of the crus encompasses the superior margin of the tragus, the crus overrides the upper portion of the conchal cavum and ends at the antihelix.	小腿的前原点涵盖耳屏的上缘，所述小腿覆盖孔查空腔的上部和结束于对耳轮。
骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常	HP:0011259	Expanded terminal portion of crus of helix	耳轮脚末端扩大	Widening, rather than tapering, of the crus at its posterior border near the antihelix.	靠近对耳轮处的耳轮脚后缘渐增宽，而非渐变细。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011260	Darwin notch of helix	耳轮达尔文缺口	Small defect of the helical fold that lies at the junction of the superior and descending portions of the helix.	位于耳轮后上部交接处的耳轮结节性小缺损。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011261	Darwin tubercle of helix	耳轮达尔文结节	Small expansion of the helical fold at the junction of the superior and descending portions of the helix.	位于耳轮后上部交接处的耳轮结节性小膨大。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011262	Crimped helix	耳轮卷曲	Linear, circumferential indentation in the convexity of the outer surface of the helix.	耳轮外表面凸面的线性环状切记。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011263	Forward facing earlobe	前向耳垂	Positioning of the anterior surface of the ear lobe in a more coronal plane than the remainder of the ear.	耳垂的前表面比耳朵的其它部分更近于冠状平面。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011264	Discontinuous ascending root of helix	耳轮根部上升段不连续		
耳朵的异常	HP:0011265	Cleft earlobe	耳垂裂	Discontinuity in the convexity of the inferior margin of the lobe.	耳垂下缘在凸起出中断不连续。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011266	Microtia, first degree	小耳畸形，1级	Presence of all the normal ear components and the median longitudinal length more than two standard deviations below the mean.	耳廓包含所有正常耳组分，平均纵向长度低于平均值的两个以上的标准偏差。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011267	Microtia, third degree	小耳畸形，3级	Presence of some auricular structures, but none of these structures conform to recognized ear components.	存在一些耳廓的结构，但这些结构与公认的耳廓正常标志不符。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011268	Absent tragus	耳屏缺失	Lack of convexity or prominence of the contour of the ridge between the bottom of the incisura and the confluence of the ascending helix and crus helix.	上升的耳轮与耳轮脚汇合处和切迹底部之间没有凸起或者耳轮廓脊凸。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011269	Bifid tragus	耳屏裂	Increased height of the tragal ridge with a shallow indentation at the apex, giving the appearance of a double peak.	在顶端的浅凹槽使耳屏脊的高度增加，给人一种双峰的外观。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011270	Duplicated tragus	双耳屏	A complete or partial duplication of the tragus; expected to lie anterior to the normal tragus.	耳屏完全或者部分的重复，一般位于正常耳屏的前方。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011271	Prominent tragus	耳屏突出	Increase posterolateral protrusion of the tragus.	耳屏后外侧突起增加。
耳朵的异常	HP:0011272	Underdeveloped tragus	耳屏发育不良	Decreased posterolateral protrusion of the tragus.	耳屏后外侧突起的减少。

胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011416	Placental infarction	胎盘梗死	Placental infarcts are macroscopically-evident focal parenchymal lesions in which microscopy shows necrosis and approximation of villi. The pathogenesis are that the infarctions are to be attributed to spastic or organic obliteration of the spiral arteries. Placental infarctions are significantly associated with fetal mortality, dysmaturity, and fetal distress.	胎盘梗死是肉眼可见的局灶性损伤，显微镜下表现为绒毛膜坏死样病变，病因为绒毛膜螺旋动脉痉挛或物理性梗阻。胎盘梗死与死胎。胎儿窘迫和成熟障碍有明确关系。

胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011418	Abnormal insertion of umbilical cord	脐带插入点异常		
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011419	Placental abruption	胎盘早剥	Placental abruption is a serious condition in which the separation of the placenta from its site of implatation after 20 weeks of gestain or during the delivery before birth	胎盘早剥是指妊娠20周后或分娩期，正常位置的胎盘在胎儿娩出前从子宫壁剥离，是一种妊娠期重症。
死亡/衰老	HP:0011420	Age of death	死亡年龄	The age group when the cessation of life happens.	
死亡/衰老	HP:0011421	Death in adolescence	青春期死亡	Death during adolescence, the period between childhood and adulthood (roughly between the ages of 10 and 19 years).	
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011422	Abnormality of chloride homeostasis	氯稳态平衡异常	An abnormality of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996 homeostasis or concentration in the body.	体内`氯`(CHEBI:17996) 平衡稳态或或浓度的异常。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011423	Hyperchloremia	高氯血症	An abnormally increased `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) concentration in the blood.	异常增加`chloride`（CHEBI:17996）的浓度在血液中。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011424	Increased serum zinc	血清锌含量增高	An increased consentration of zinc in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	锌在`blood`增加consentration（FMA:9670）。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011425	Fetal ultrasound soft marker	胎儿超声软指标	An finding upon obstetric ultrasound examination performed at around 16 to 20 weeks of gestation that is abnormal but not clearly identifiable as a  fetal anatomic malformation or growth restriction. Such findings are known as soft markers since they are associated with increased risk for fetal aneuploidy or other disorders.	在大约16?20周妊娠是不正常的，但不能清楚地标识为胎儿解剖畸形或发育迟缓的表现后，产科超声检查的发现。这些发现被称为软标记物，因为它们是与风险为胎儿非整倍或其他病症的增加有关。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011426	Fetal choroid plexus cysts	胎儿脉络丛囊肿	Fetal choroid plexus cysts (CPCs) are sonographically discrete, small cysts (3 mm or more) found in the choroid plexus within the lateral cerebral ventricles of the developing fetus at 14 to 24 weeks gestation. Imaging of the choroid plexus is performed in the transverse plane of the fetal head at the same level that the lateral cerebral ventricle is evaluated. The choroid plexus should be inspected bilaterally for the presence of cysts. The size of CPCs is not of clinical relevance (pmid:16100637).	胎脉络丛囊肿（每次点击成本）是超声离散的，小囊肿（3mm以上）的脉络丛中发现的发育中的胎儿的侧脑室内，在14至24周妊娠。在胎头的横向平面，该侧脑室被评估相同的水平进行的脉络丛的成像。脉络丛应双边检查是否包囊的存在。每次点击费用的大小是临床相关（PMID:16100637）不。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011427	Enlarged fetal cisterna magna	胎儿小脑延髓池扩大	The cisterna magna is measured on a transaxial view of the fetal head angled 15 degrees caudal to the canthomeatal line. The anterior/posterior diameter is taken between the inferior/posterior surface of the vemis of the cerebellum to the inner surface of the cranium. An enlarged cisternal magna is defined by an anterior/posterior diameter of 10 mm or more (pmid:16100637).	小脑延髓池测量胎头角度15度尾椎canthomeatal线的横断视图。的前/后直径取小脑vemis的劣/后表面之间的颅骨的内表面上。的放大脑池蚤是由10mm以上（:16100637 PMID）前/后面直径限定。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011428	Short fetal femur length	胎儿股骨短小	A short femur length is defined as either a measurement below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or a measurement that is less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The femur should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).	胎儿股骨短小定义为股骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时股骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011429	Short fetal humerus length	胎儿肱骨短小	A short humerus length is defined as a length below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or as a measurement less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The humerus should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).	胎儿肱骨短小定义为肱骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时肱骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011430	Hypoplasia of fetal nasal bone	胎儿鼻骨发育不良	On prenatal ultrasound, the nasal bone is a thin echogenic line within the bridge of the fetal nose. The fetus is imaged facing the transducer with the fetal face strictly in the midline. The angle of insonation is 90 degrees, with the longitudinal axis of the nasal bone as the reference line. Calibres are placed at each end of the nasal bone. Absence of the nasal bone or measurements below 2.5th percentile are considered significant (pmid:16100637).	产前超声，鼻骨是胎儿鼻梁内的薄回声带。胎儿面部面对探头，成像面在颜面部正中矢状切面，超声声束与鼻骨长轴成90°，测量两端鼻骨边界的距离。鼻骨缺失，或其长度小于同孕周正常值的第2.5百分位数是有显著差异的。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011431	Fetal fifth finger clinodactyly	胎儿第五指屈指畸形	Fifth finger clinodactyly is defined by a hypoplastic or absent mid-phalanx of the fifth digit. Ultrasound identification of the fetal hand must first be undertaken and then appropriate magnification accomplished. The evaluation requires stretching of the 5 fingers. The diagnosis is established when the middle phalanx of the fifth finger is markedly smaller than normal or absent, which often causes the finger to be curved inward  (pmid:16100637).	第五手指五指由发育不全或不存在中间指骨的第五位的定义。超声波鉴定胎儿的手必须首先进行，然后适当的放大倍率来实现。这种评价需要伸缩5个手指的。 （:16100637 PMID）当第五手指的中间指骨明显高于正常或不存在，这往往使手指被向内弯曲越小诊断确立。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011432	High maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein	母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度增高	An abnormally high concentration of serum alpha-fetoprotein as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011433	High maternal serum chorionic gonadotropin	母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度增高	An abnormally high concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011434	Low maternal serum chorionic gonadotropin	母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度降低	An abnormally low concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011435	Low maternal serum PAPP-A	母体血清PAPP-A浓度降低	An abnormally low concentration of serum PAPP-A (pregnancy associated plasma protein A), as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清PAPP-A浓度（妊娠相关血浆蛋白A）。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011436	Abnormal maternal serum screening	母血清筛查异常	An abnormally elevated or decreased level of a maternal serum marker analytes used in screening for aneuploidy.	非整倍体筛查中，母体血清学标记物水平异常增高或降低。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011437	Maternal autoimmune disease	母体自身免疫性疾病	Maternal autoimmune diseases are associated with increased rates of fetal wastage.The most common maternal autoimmune diseases are systemic lupus erythematosus(SLE),rheumatoid arthritis,and a host of vasculitis syndromes and so on.	孕妇自身免疫性疾病与胎儿流产及胎死宫内相关。常见的病种包括系统性红斑狼疮，类风湿关节炎，以及血管炎综合征等。
胎儿发育或出生异常	HP:0011438	Maternal teratogenic exposure	孕期致畸暴露	Matenal has been exposured  to  teratogenic substance for example drugs、 chemicals、 source of infection and other physical factors,during pregnancy,which  may cause fetal morphological abnormalities、neurological abnormalities or death.	孕期母体接触过可能对胎儿发育有影响的药物、化学制剂、感染源、物理因子等,可能会导致胎儿形体和/或神经系统发育异常，甚至死亡。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0011439	Anesthetic-induced rhabdomylosis	麻醉诱导的横纹肌溶解	`Rhabdomyolysis` (HP:0003201) induced by anesthesia.	麻醉诱导的“横纹肌溶解”。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0011440	Alcohol-induced rhabdomyolysis	酒精性横纹肌溶解症	`Rhabdomyolysis` (HP:0003201) induced by intake of alcohol.	酒精摄入诱导的“横纹肌溶解”。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011441	Abnormality of the medulla oblongata	延髓异常	An abnormality of the `medulla oblongata` (FMA:62004), the lower half of the brainstem.	在`延髓`的异常（FMA:62004），延髓是脑干的下半部。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011442	Abnormality of central motor function	中央运动功能异常	An anomaly of the control or production of movement in the central nervous system.	在中枢神经系统中运动的控制或生产的异常。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011443	Abnormality of coordination	协调异常		
神经系统的异常	HP:0011444	Decorticate rigidity	去皮层强直	A type of rigidity in which the arms are in flexion and adduction and the legs are extended. This signifies a lesion in the cerebral white matter, internal capsules, or thalamus.	上肢屈曲内收、下肢伸直的一种强直类型。这标志着脑白质，内囊，或丘脑病变。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011445	Athetoid cerebral palsy	手足徐动型脑瘫	A type of cerebral palsy characterized by slow, involuntary muscle movement and mixed muscle tone.	一种类型的脑瘫，其特点是缓慢的、不自主的肌肉运动和肌张力忽高忽低。

神经系统的异常;四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0011448	Ankle clonus	踝阵挛	Clonus is an involuntary tendon reflex that causes repeated flexion and extension of the foot. Ankle clonus is tested by rapidly flexing the foot upward.	踝阵挛是引起足部反复屈伸运动的无意识腱反射。踝阵挛通过快速向上弯曲足部检查。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011449	Knee clonus	膝阵挛	Clonus is an involuntary tendon reflex that causes repeated flexion and extension of the foot. Knee clonus can be tested by rapidly pushing the patella towards the toes.	阵挛是一种不自主腱反射，导致反复地屈伸脚。膝阵挛可通过朝向足趾快速推髌骨进行检查。

眼睛的异常	HP:0011477	Upbeat nystagmus	上跳性眼球震颤	In primary position the Upbeat nystagmus beats upward. The associated oscillopsias are often very irritating, but the symptoms are usually transient.	此型眼球震颤呈眼球跳动上升。相关症状通常是短暂的。
