眼睛的异常	HP:0011493	Central opacification of the cornea	角膜的中央混浊	Reduced transparency of the central portion of the corneal stroma.	角膜中央基质层的透明度下降。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011494	Generalized opacification of the cornea	角膜混浊	Generalized reduced transparency of the stroma of the cornea.	角膜基质的透明度降低。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011495	Abnormality of corneal epithelium	角膜上皮异常	Abnormality of the `corneal epithelium` (FMA:58263), that is of the epithelial tissue that covers the front of the cornea.	角膜上皮异常（FMA:58263），角膜上皮是指覆盖在角膜的前部的上皮组织。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011496	Corneal neovascularization	角膜新生血管	Ingrowth of new blood vessels into the cornea.	向内生长的新生血管进入角膜。
眼睛的异常;心血管系统的异常	HP:0011497	Iris neovascularization	虹膜新生血管	New growth of vessels on the surface of the iris.	虹膜表面的新生血管。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011498	Partial aniridia	部分无虹膜	Sectoral aplasia of the iris.	虹膜部分发育不全。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011499	Mydriasis	瞳孔散大	Abnormal dilatation of the iris.	虹膜的异常扩张。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011500	Polycoria	多瞳症	Multiple pupils.	多个瞳孔。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011501	Anterior lenticonus	前圆锥形晶状体	A conical projection of the anterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.	晶状体前表面的锥形突起异常，是一种发育异常。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011502	Posterior lenticonus	后圆锥形晶状体	A conical projection of the posterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.	锥形突起的晶状体的后表面的，存在的一个的发育异常。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011503	aplasia of the fovea	黄斑中心凹的发育缺陷	Congenital absence of the fovea.	先天性无黄斑中心凹。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011504	Bull's eye maculopathy	牛眼黄斑病变	Progressive maculopathy characterized by concentric regions of hyper- and hypo-pigmentation.	渐进性黄斑病变，特点是黄斑区高荧光和低荧光呈同心圆样。
眼睛的异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011505	Cystoid macular edema	囊样黄斑水肿	Cystoid macular edema (CME) is any type of macular edema that involves cyst formation.	黄斑囊样水肿（CME）是任何类型的黄斑水肿，涉及囊肿形成。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011506	Choroidal neovascularization of the macula	黄斑脉络膜新生血管	Choroidal neovascularization (CNV) is the creation of new blood vessels in the choroid layer of the eye.	脉络膜新生血管（CNV）为脉络膜生出的新生血管。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011507	Macular flecks	黄斑斑点	Pale often indistinct lesions of the macula.	黄斑区灰色病变，常常没有明确的界限。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011508	Macular hole	黄斑裂孔	A macular hole is a small break in the macula, located in the center of the retina.	黄斑裂孔是黄斑区小的孔。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011509	Macular hyperpigmentation	黄斑色素沉着	Increased amount of pigmentation in the `macula lutea` (FMA:58637).	增加了`黄斑中心凹（FMA:58637）色素量。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011510	Drusen	玻璃膜疣	Drusen (singular, 'druse') are tiny yellow or white accumulations of extracellular material (lipofuscin) that build up in Bruch's membrane of the eye.	玻璃膜疣是细胞外物质（脂褐素），在眼Bruch膜上聚集形成的细小黄色或白色物质。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011511	Macular schisis	黄斑劈裂	Splitting of the retina in the macular region.	黄斑区视网膜劈裂。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011512	Hyperpigmentation of the fundus	眼底的色素沉着	Increased amount of pigmentation of the retina.	视网膜色素沉着的数量增加。
眼睛的异常;心血管系统的异常	HP:0011513	Retinal cavernous angioma	视网膜海绵状血管瘤	A benign tumor of the retina that appears as a grouping of blood-filled saccules within the inner retinal layers or on the surface of the optic disc. Retinal cavernous angioma are described as having a 'cluster of grapes' appearance.	显示为血液填充的视网膜内层内或视盘的表面上的一种视网膜良性肿瘤。视网膜海绵状血管瘤被描述为具有“葡萄串状”外观。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011514	Abnormality of binocular vision	双眼单视功能异常	An abnormality of binocular vision, that is of the ability to synthesize the visual inputs from both eyes to a single image with perception of depth.	双眼视觉是指双眼观察的景物输入到一个单一的图像，并能感知深度的能力。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011515	Abnormal stereopsis	立体视觉异常	Inability to make fine depth discriminations from parallax provided by the two eyes' different positions on the head.	立体视觉是指双眼观察景物能分别物体远近形态的感觉。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011516	Rod monochromacy	全色盲	A condition where the retina contains no functional cone cells, so that in addition to the absence of color discrimination, vision in lights of normal intensity is difficult.	视网膜包含无功能的视锥细胞，所以，除了没有颜色辨别的，正常光照下视力很差。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011517	Cone monochromacy	锥细胞单色视	The condition of having both rods and cones, but only a single kind of cone.  Affected individuals have good pattern vision in daylight, but cannot distinguish between colors.	具有视杆和视锥，但只有单一种类的视锥。患者在明光处有好的视力，但颜色无法区分。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011518	Dichromacy	双色盲	Individuals affected by dichromacy possess only two types of cones, instead of three.	受累个体只有两种类型的视锥细胞，而不是通常的三种。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011519	Anomalous trichromacy	三色视异常	Individuals with anomalous trichromacy possess three types of cones, but one of the three types of cones has an abnormal spectral sensitivity compared to normal cones.	个体异常三色视具有三种类型的锥体，但三种视锥细胞中的一个相对于正常锥体具有异常的光谱灵敏度。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011520	Deuteranomoly	绿色弱	A type of anomalous trichromacy associated with abnormal M photopigment, such that the absorption spectrum is shifted toward L wavelengths. Affected individuals have difficulties distinguishing between red and green.	异常三色视的一种，中波长感光色素异常，使得吸收光谱移向长波长，患者红绿色觉异常。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011521	Deuteranopia	绿色盲	Complete lack of the M photopigment, which is replaced with the L photopigment.  Affected individuals tend to confuse red and green.	完全缺乏M波长感光色素，由L感光色素替代。患者分辨不出红色和绿色。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011522	Protanopia	红色盲	Blue and green cones only; no functional red cones.	只有蓝色和绿色锥体;无功能性红锥。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011523	Iris cyst	虹膜囊肿	An iris cyst is composed of a single cell layer of epithelium and is filled with fluid.	虹膜囊肿是由上皮细胞的单细胞层，并充满流体。
眼睛的异常;肿瘤	HP:0011524	Iris melanoma	虹膜黑色素瘤	Malignant tumor of melanocytes affecting the iris.	虹膜黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011525	Iris nevus	虹膜痣	A benign brown pigmented area over the iris representing proliferation of melanocyte cells in the stromal layer of the iris. An iris nevus can be flat or occasionally slightly elevated.	虹膜上良性的褐色色素沉着，由虹膜的基质层黑素细胞增殖形成。虹膜痣可以是平的或偶有轻度升高。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011526	Abnormality of lens shape	晶状体形状异常	An abnormal shape of the `lens` (FMA:58241).	晶状体的形态异常（FMA:58241）。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011527	Lentiglobus	球形晶状体	Exaggerated curvature of the lens of the eye, producing an anterior or posterior spherical bulging.	晶状体的曲率增大，产生的前或后球形膨出。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011528	Single isolated congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium	视网膜色素上皮孤立性先天性肥厚	Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital found in around 3-5% of the population and of no functional significance.	RPE细胞上出现的明显分界的色素沉着过度，是先天性，发生于3-5％的人口，没有功能障碍。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011529	Multiple bilateral congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium	视网膜色素上皮多重双边先天性肥厚	Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital.	明显分界的色素沉着，先天性的。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011530	Retinal hole	视网膜裂孔	A small break in the retina.	视网膜内的裂孔。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011531	Vitreitis	玻璃体炎	Inflammation of the vitreous body.	炎症的玻璃体。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011532	Subretinal exudate	视网膜下渗出	A type of retinal exudate located in the subretinal space between the sensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.	位于在神经视网膜和视网膜色素上皮细胞之间的视网膜下腔内的视网膜渗出。
眼睛的异常	HP:0011533	Snowflake retinal degeneration	雪花状视网膜变性	The appearance of yellow/white crystalline-like (hence the name) spots in the retina and thickening of the peripheral part of the vitreous.	玻璃体和视网膜的周边部的黄/白色结晶状（因此而得名）斑点的变性。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011534	Abnormal spatial orientation of the cardiac segments	心脏节段的空间排布异常	An abnormality of the cardiac segments locations in space.	心脏不同节段在空间位置上的排布异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011535	Abnormal atrial arrangement	心房排布异常	Abnormality of the spatial relationship of the atria to other components of the heart.	心房与心脏其它部位间空间关系的异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011536	Right atrial isomerism	右心房异构	Right atrial isomerism is characterized by bilateral triangular, morphologically right atrial, appendages, both joining the atrial chamber along a broad front with internal terminal crest.	右心房异构的特征是有双三角瓣，右心房样形态，有附属物，连接心房腔前部和顶部终端。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011537	Left atrial isomerism	左心房异构	In left atrial isomerism there is a bilateral small finger-shaped morphologically left atrial appendage joining the atrial chamber along a narrow front without an internal terminal crest.	两侧心房均为形态学左心房的先天性心脏异常，常伴多脾征，双侧肺均为两叶。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011538	Atrial situs inversus	心房左右转位	Mirror image atrial arrangement, with morphologic right atrium on the left hand side and morphologic left atrium on the right hand side.	形态学右心房在左手边，形态学左心房在右手边的镜像心房排列。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011539	Atrial situs ambiguous	心房不定位	Common atrium without defining morphologic features.	没有固定形态学特征的心房。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011540	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries	先天性矫正型大动脉转位	The essence of the lesion is the combination of discordant atrioventricular and ventriculo-arterial connections. Thus, the morphologically right atrium is connected to a morphologically left ventricle across the mitral valve, with the left ventricle then connected to the pulmonary trunk. The morphologically left atrium is connected to the morphologically right ventricle across the tricuspid valve, with the morphologically right ventricle connected to the aorta.	病变的本质为房室以及房室动脉的连接不协调。因此，形态学右心房跨二尖瓣连接到形态左心室，然后左心室连接到肺动脉。形态学左心房跨三尖瓣连接到形态右心室，形态右心室连接到主动脉。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011541	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves	十字形房室瓣	Crossing of the inflow streams of the two ventricles, due to an apparent twisting of the heart about its long axis.	由于心脏长轴的明显扭曲，导致双心室的流入流的交叉。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011542	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves with superior-inferior ventricles	十字形房室瓣伴上下排列心室	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves occurs with superior-inferior ventricles.	伴随上下心室排列的十字型房室瓣。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011543	Superior-inferior ventricles without criss-cross atrioventricular valves	无十字房室瓣型上下排列心室	A type of superior-inferior ventricles which presents no criss-cross atrioventricular valves.	一种心室呈上下排列样疾病，但无十字型房室瓣。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011544	L-looping of the right ventricle	右心室左袢	The right ventricle is abnormally positioned on the left side of the left ventricle.	右心室异常地位于左心室的左侧，即右心室左袢。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011545	Abnormal connection of the cardiac segments	心脏节段连接异常	Abnormal connection between the cardiac segments，leading to abnormal  myocardial movement.	心脏节段间连接异常，导致心肌运动异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011546	Abnormal atrioventricular connection	异常房室连接	An abnormality of the circulatory connection between atria and ventricles.	心房与心室之间循环连接的异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011547	Absent left sided atrioventricular connection	左侧房室接连缺失	Absence of left sided atrioventricular connection.	左侧房室连接的缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011548	Absent right sided atrioventricular connection	右侧房室连接缺失	Absence of right sided atrioventricular connection.	右侧房室连接的缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011549	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection	左房室连接缺失导致的单心室心脏	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection.	左房室连接缺失导致的单心室心脏
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011550	Biventricular heart with straddling right sided atrioventricular valve and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	双心室心脏伴右房室瓣骑跨及左房室连接缺如	A heart with two ventricles while the tension apparatus of its right sided atrioventricular valve is attached to both sides of the ventricular septum, and the left sided atrioventricular valve is absent.	心脏有双心室但右侧房室瓣膜的张力部位与室间隔的左右两侧均相连，同时左侧房室瓣缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011551	Right sided atrium to left ventricle and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	右侧新房与左室连接及左侧房室连接缺失。		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011552	Ambiguous atrioventricular connection	房室连接不明确	With left or right cardiac isomerism in a biventricular, the atrioventricular connections are perforce ambiguous, in that one of the connections is concordant (e.g., right-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a morphologic right ventricle) and one of the connections is discordant (e.g., left-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a  morphologic left ventricle).	心脏异构形成左或右双心室，房室连接呈现分歧，其中一个的连接是一致的（例如，右侧的形态学右心房连接到形态学右心室）及一个的连接是不一致的（例如，左侧的形态学右心房连接到形态左心室）。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011553	Discordant atrioventricular connection	房室连接不协调	Connection of the right atrium to the left ventricle and of the left atrium to the right ventricle in a biventricular heart.	双心室心脏中右心房连接左心室或左心房连接右心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011554	Double inlet atrioventricular connection	双入口房室连接	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接同一个心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011555	Double inlet left ventricle	双入口左心室	The condition in which both atria are joined to the left ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually there is a hypoplastic right ventricle, which may be on the opposite side of the heart as usual.	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接左心室，通常心脏另一侧的右心室发育不良。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011556	Double inlet right ventricle	双入口右心室	The condition in which both atria are joined to the right ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually, the left ventricle is hypoplastic.	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接右心室，通常心脏另一侧的左心室发育不良。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011557	Double inlet to single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	不确定形态学的双入口单心室	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. The morphology of this ventricle does not allow one to determine if it corresponds to the left or right ventricle.	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室，该心室形态不足以确定是左心室或右心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011558	Double inlet to single ventricle with common atrioventricular orifice	双入口单心室伴共同房室口	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by common atrioventricular orifice.	两个心房通过同一个房室口连接至同一个心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011559	Double inlet to single ventricle with two atrioventricular valves	双入口单心室伴两个房室瓣	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011560	Mitral atresia	二尖瓣闭锁	A congenital defect with failure to open of the mitral valve orifice.	一种先天性缺陷，二尖瓣口不能打开。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011561	Overriding atrioventricular valve	房室瓣骑跨	An atrioventricular valve that empties into both ventricles. The valve overrides the interventricular septum above a ventricular septum defect.	房室瓣汇入到两个心室。瓣膜骑跨于缺损的室间隔上。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011562	Straddling atrioventricular valve	跨界房室瓣	Anomalous insertion of the chordae tendinae or papillary muscles into the contralateral ventricle in the presence of a ventricular septum defect.	腱索和乳头肌异常插入室间隔缺损的对侧心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011563	Abnormal ventriculo-arterial connection	脑室动脉连接异常	Abnormality of the connection of ventriculo and arterial.	脑室与动脉之间的连接出现异常
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011564	Mitral valve arcade	二尖瓣弓形	Anomalous mitral valve arcade is diagnosed b ased on the following features (1) An adequately sized mitral valve orifice; (2) short, thick, and poorly differentiated chordae with direct union of the papillary muscles to the anterior leaflet; (3) narrow or nearly nonexistent spaces between the abnormal chordae; and (4) greater differentiation of the chordae attached to the posterior papillary muscle.	二尖瓣弓形异常诊断基于以下特点（1）足够大的二尖瓣口; （2）短、厚、低分化腱索与乳头肌的前叶直接结合; （3）异常腱索之间的空间狭窄或几乎不存在的空间（4）较大的分化腱索附连到后乳头肌。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011565	Common atrium	共同心房	Complete absence of the interatrial septum with common atrioventricular valve and two atrioventricular connections.	房间隔缺损，同时房室瓣和两个房室连接正常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011566	Cor triatriatum dexter	右侧三房心	A congenital anomaly with partitioning of the right atrium to form a triatrial heart caused by persistence of the right valve of the sinus venosus. Typically, the right atrial partition is due to exaggerated fetal eustachian and thebesian valves, which together form an incomplete septum across the lower part of the atrium. This septum may range from a reticulum to a substantial sheet of tissue.	由于静脉窦右阀持续性存在导致右心房先天性被分隔，形成三个心房。通常，畸形的胎儿咽鼓管和冠状窦瓣在心房下部形成一个不完成的隔膜，引起右心房分区。这种隔膜既有网状组织也有实体组织。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011567	Sinus venosus atrial septal defect	静脉窦房间隔缺损	An interatrial communication caused by a deficiency of the common wall between the superior vena cava (SVC) and the right-sided pulmonary veins. SVASD is commonly associated with anomalous pulmonary venous connection (APVC) of some or all of the pulmonary veins, which produces additional left-to-right shunting.	一个由上腔静脉（SVC）和右肺静脉之间的公共壁的缺陷导致的心房间通讯。静脉窦房间隔缺损通常与一些全部或部分肺静脉异常连接有关，产生额外的左向右分流。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011568	Double orifice mitral valve	双孔二尖瓣	The left atrio-ventricular connection consists of two anatomically distinct orifices separated by accessory fibrous tissue.	左房室连接的部分主要附属纤维组织分开的两个不同的解剖口。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011569	Cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet	二尖瓣前叶裂	Cleft in the anterior mitral valve leaflet not associated with an atrioventricular canal defect.	二尖瓣前叶裂与房室管缺陷无关。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011570	Congenital mitral stenosis	先天性二尖瓣狭窄	Mitral stenosis with congenital onset.	先天性的二尖瓣狭窄。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011571	Parachute mitral valve	降落伞式二尖瓣	Abnormality of the mitral valve apparatus, whereby chordae attach to a single papillary muscle or hypoplastic papillary muscles.	异常的二尖瓣结构，腱索连接到单一的乳头肌或发育不全的乳头肌上。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011572	Supramitral ring	二尖瓣上环	A congenital stenotic mitral valvular anomaly with a ring of tissue above the mitral valve.	一种二尖瓣先天性狭窄，二尖瓣上部有环状组织。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011573	Hypoplastic tricuspid valve	三尖瓣发育不全	Congenital defect characterized by underdevelopment of the tricuspid valve.	三尖瓣先天性发育不全。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011574	Imperforate atrioventricular valve	房室瓣闭锁	An atrioventricular valve that has failed to open (atretic).	房室瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011575	Imperforate tricuspid valve	三尖瓣闭锁	An tricuspid valve that has failed to open (atretic).	三尖瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011576	Intermediate atrioventricular canal defect	中间型房室管缺陷	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and inlet ventricular defect. There is one valve annulus and two valve orifices.	一种心脏缺陷，包括第一房间隔缺损，二尖瓣前叶裂口，心室入口缺损。患者有一个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011577	Partial atrioventricular canal defect	部分房室管畸形	A specific combination of heart defects including a primum atrial septal defect and cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet. There is not an inlet ventricular septal defect present. There are two valve annuluses and two valve orifices.	心脏缺陷的特定组合，包括第一房间隔缺损和二尖瓣前叶裂口。不存在心室入口缺损。患者有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011578	Transitional atrioventricular canal defect	过渡性房室管缺陷	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and an inlet ventricular septal defect. There are two valve annuli and two valve orifices.	一个原发孔房间隔缺损伴随裂二尖瓣前瓣叶和入口室间隔缺损的一种特殊组合的心脏缺陷，有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣膜孔存在。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011579	Unbalanced atrioventricular canal defect	房室管不均一缺损	Anatomic features of unbalanced atrioventricular septal defect (AVSD) include varying amounts of ventricular hypoplasia, as well as malalignment of the atrioventricular junction.	房室管不均一缺损（AVSD）解剖学特征包括不同等级的的心室发育不全，以及房室结的排列不齐。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011580	Short chordae tendineae of the mitral valve	二尖瓣腱索短	Abnormally short `chordae tendineae` (FMA:76527) of the mitral valve.	二尖瓣腱索的异常短小。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011581	Double outlet left ventricle	左心室双出口	A congenital defect of heart development characterized by origin of both pulmonary artery and aorta from the morphological left ventricle.	一种先天性心脏发育缺陷，特点是肺动脉和主动脉均从左心室发出。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011582	Abdominal ectopia cordis	腹型异位心	Displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and into the abdomen.	心脏在胸腔之外，异常地位于腹腔。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011583	Cervical ectopia cordis	颈部心脏异位	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region and withouta defect of the sternum.	一种颈部心脏异位，而无胸骨受损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011584	Thoracocervical ectopia cordis	胸椎心脏异位	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region with a defect of the superior portion of the sternum.	A型的心脏异位，心脏部分位于颈部区域，同时胸骨上部异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011585	Thoracic ectopia cordis	胸腔心脏异位	Congenital malformation of the thoracic wall with partial or total displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity. This feature is associated with sternal cleft or absence of the sternum.	胸腔壁的先天畸形，心脏部分或全部置换到胸腔外。患者伴有胸骨裂或胸骨缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011586	Thoracoabdominal ectopia cordis	胸腹心脏异位	Congenital malformation of the ventral wall with partial or total evisceration of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and displacement partially into the abdominal cavity.	腹壁先天性畸形，心脏的部分或全部胸腔外并部分进入腹腔。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011587	Abnormal branching pattern of the aortic arch	主动脉弓分支异常	A deviance from the norm of the origin or course of the right brachiocephalic artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery or the  proximal vertebral arteries.	右头臂动脉，左颈总动脉，左锁骨下动脉或近端椎动脉的起源异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011588	Cervical aortic arch	颈部主动脉弓	The aortic arch extends into the soft tissues of the neck before turning down into to become the descending aorta.	主动脉弓延伸到颈部软组织内，再转成降主动脉。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011589	Common origin of the right brachiocephalic artery and left common carotid artery	右侧头臂干和左侧颈总动脉的共同起源	The left common carotid artery has a common origin with the innominate artery.	左颈总动脉与无名动脉有一个共同的起源。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011590	Double aortic arch	双主动脉弓	A conenital abnormality of the aortic arch in which the two embryonic aortc arches form a vascular ring that surrounds the trachea or esophagus and then join to form the descending aorta. Double aortic arch can cause symptoms because of compression of the esophagus (dysphagia, cyanosis while eating) or trachea (stridor).	一种先天性的主动脉弓异常，双主动脉弓形成血管环围绕气管或食管形成降主动脉。双主动脉弓由于压迫食管和气管会引起相应症状，包括吞咽困难，紫绀，哮喘。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011591	Left aortic arch with cervical origin of the right subclavian artery	左位主动脉弓伴右锁骨下动脉起源于颈总动脉	The aortic arch crosses the left main bronchus while the right subclavian artery originates abnormally high from the common carotid artery close to the bifurcation of the internal and external carotid arteries.	主动脉弓跨过左主支气管。右锁骨下动脉异常起源于颈总动脉上靠近颈内和颈外动脉分叉处。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011592	Left aortic arch with isolated subclavian artery	左位主动脉弓伴孤立性锁骨下动脉	The subclavian artery arises from ductus arteriosus. While the ductus arteriosus is patent its blood supply comes from the ductus, hence from the pulmonary artery. After it closes, the blood supply is retrogradely from the vertebral artery via the circle of Willis.	锁骨下动脉起源于动脉导管。当动脉导管未闭，血液来自动脉导管，因此也来自肺动脉。当它关闭后，血供应从椎动脉通过Willis循环逆行。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011593	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	左位主动脉弓伴食管后Kommerell憩室	A patent ductus arteriosus or ductal ligament completes the ring.	动脉导管未闭或导管韧带成环。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011594	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	右主动脉弓伴食管后科黙尔憩室	Aortic arch crosses the right mainstem bronchus. The left carotid artery is the first branch,  right carotid artery the second branch and right subclavian artery as the third branch.	主动脉弓跨越右主支气管。左侧颈动脉是第一分支，右颈总动脉第二分支和右锁骨下动脉是第三分支。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011595	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal right subclavian artery	左位主动脉弓伴食管后右锁骨下动脉	Aortic arch crosses the left mainstem bronchus. The first branch is the right carotid artery, the second branch is the left carotid artery, the third branch is the subclavian artery, the fourth branch is the right subclavian artery arising from the posteromedial aspect of the distal aortic arch and continuing posterior to the esophagus to the right hand side of the body.	主动脉弓跨左主支气管。第一分支是右颈动脉，第二分支是左侧颈动脉中，第三分支是锁骨下动脉，第四分支是右锁骨下动脉，起于远侧主动脉弓的后中方位接着经食道到达身体的右手侧。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011596	Left aortic arch with right descending aorta and right ductus arteriosus	左位主动脉弓伴右位降主动脉及右动脉导管未闭	The aortic arch is positioned on the left side of oesophagus and trachea, and continued behind oesophagus to form the descending aorta. The two parts are connected by the ductal ligament and form a ring, which may cause trachea or oesophagus compression symptoms.	主动脉弓位于食管和气管的左侧，绕经食管后方向脊柱右侧延续为降主动脉，经动脉导管连接形成血管环，产生对气管、食管的压迫症状。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011597	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	右位主动脉弓伴左侧降主动脉与左侧动脉导管未闭	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	右位主动脉弓伴左侧降主动脉与左侧动脉导管未闭
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011598	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011599	Mesocardia	中位心	Mesocardia is a abnormal location of the heart in which the heart is in a midline position and the longitudinal axis of the heart lies in the mid-sagittal plane.	中位心是一种心脏位置异常，心脏位于身体中线位置且心脏的纵轴位于正中矢状面。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011600	Abnormal direction of ventricular apex	心室心尖部指向异常	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex. Left sided is normal.	心脏从基部到顶点所指方向的异常。心尖向左是正常的。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011601	Rightward direction of ventricular apex	心脏从基部到尖端的指向朝右。正常应该是朝左侧。		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011602	Midline direction of ventricular apex	心尖朝向中线方向	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex in the midline. Left sided is normal.	从心脏基底部到尖部的指向异常地朝向中线方向。正常应该朝左。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011603	Congenital malformation of the great arteries	先天性大动脉畸形	A developmental malformation of the great arteries with congenital onset.	先天性发病的大动脉畸形。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011604	Aortopulmonary window	主-肺动脉窗	A congenital anomaly with an abnormal connection between the aorta and the main pulmonary artery resulting in an aortopulmonary shunt.	主动脉与主肺动脉之间先天性的异常连接，导致主-肺动脉分流。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011605	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	先天性矫正型大动脉转位合并室间隔缺损	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries occurs with ventricular septal defect.	与室间隔缺损并发的先天性矫正型大动脉转位。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011606	Transposition of the great arteries with intact ventricular septum	室间隔完整性大动脉转位	Transposition of the great arteries without ventricular septal defects	大动脉转位不伴有室间隔缺损
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011607	Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	室间隔缺损性大动脉转位	Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect.	室间隔缺损性大动脉转位。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011608	Type II truncus arteriosus	II型动脉干	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with each pulmonary artery arising separate from each other on the posterior or lateral aspect of the truncus.	II型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉）两支肺动脉与分别从它的前后侧起源。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011609	Type III truncus arteriosus	III型动脉干	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby one of the two pulmonary artery branched does not arise from the common pulmonary trunk, but instead from the ductus arteriosus or directly from the aorta.	III型永存动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），其中的一个个肺动脉分支不是从常见的肺动脉主干发出而是是从动脉管或直接从主动脉发出。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011610	Type IV truncus arteriosus	IV型动脉干	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby the aortic arch is hypoplastic or interrupted, and a large patent ductus arteriosus is present.	IV型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），由此主动脉弓发育不良或被受阻，出现一个大型动脉导管未闭。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011611	Interrupted aortic arch	主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the `arch of aorta`(FMA:3768) with an atretic point or absent segment.	非连续性“动脉弓”（FMA:3768），呈点状或节段性缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011612	Interrupted aortic arch type A	A型主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment at the level of the isthmus.	主动脉弓峡部出现的点状或节段性缺失，引起非连续性“动脉弓”。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011613	Interrupted aortic arch type B	B型主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the left carotid and subclavian arteries.	左侧颈动脉和锁骨下动脉之间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011614	Interrupted aortic arch type C	C型主动脉弓断离	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the innominate and left carotid arteries.	无名动脉和左颈动脉间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011615	Abnormality of pulmonary situs	肺异常	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, which is defined by characteristics such as the number of lobes per lung and the relationship of the pulmonary arteries to their bronchi.	肺异常，例如左右肺的分叶异常，例如每侧肺的分叶数量、及肺动脉与其所属支气管的对应关系异常等。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011616	Pulmonary situs inversus	肺脏位置逆转	Mirror image arrangement of the mainstem bronchi with the right pulmonary artery posterior to the right upper lobe bronchus and the left pulmonary artery anterior to the left upper lobe bronchus.	主气管的镜像位置，右肺动脉位于右上叶支气管后方，左肺动脉位于左侧上叶支气管前方。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011617	Pulmonary situs ambiguus	肺脏定位模糊	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which the morphology of both left and right lungs is the same.	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态是相同的。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011618	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic right lungs	肺脏定位模糊并双侧形态学右肺	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a right lungs.	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为右肺。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011619	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic left lungs	肺脏定位模糊并双侧形态学左肺	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a left lung.	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为左肺。
生长异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0011620	Abnormality of abdominal situs	腹部位置异常	An abnormality of the abdominal situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the abdomin and its organs.	腹部位置的异常，即，腹部及其中脏器的边界异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011621	Gerbode ventricular septal defect	Gerbode室间隔缺损	A type of ventricular septal defect communicating directly between the left ventricle and right atrium. This is anatomically possible because the normal tricuspid valve is more apically displaced than the mitral valve.	一类直接连通左心室和右心房之间的室间隔缺损。这在解剖学上可能是因为正常的三尖瓣比二尖瓣顶部移位更多。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011622	Inlet ventricular septal defect	入口室间隔缺损	A ventricular septal defect that involves the inlet of the right ventricular septum immediately inferior to the AV valve apparatus.	位于房室瓣膜下的右室间隔入口处发生的室间隔缺损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011623	Muscular ventricular septal defect	肌部室间隔缺损	The trabecular septum is the largest part of the interventricular septum. It extends from the membranous septum to the apex and superiorly to the infundibular septum. A defect in the trabecular septum is called muscular VSD if the defect is completely rimmed by muscle.	小梁隔膜是室间隔最大的部分。从膜隔到尖部伸展优于到漏斗隔膜。小梁隔的缺陷如果完全由肌肉镶边被称为肌部室间隔缺损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011624	Apical muscular ventricular septal defect	心尖肌部室间隔缺损	A muscular ventricular septal defect located at the apex of the heart.	一种位于心脏顶端的肌部室间隔缺损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011625	Multiple muscular ventricular septal defects	发个肌部室间隔缺损	The presence of more than one VSD in the muscular septum, with or without other VSD located in the peri-membranous or outlet septum, with or without associated intra-cardiac or extra-cardiac malformations.	室间隔肌部出现多处缺损可伴／不伴有其他部位室间隔缺损或心内／心外畸形。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011626	Scimitar anomaly	弯刀异常	A rare congenital heart defect characterized by partial anomalous pulmonary venous return from the right lung to the inferior vena cava which leads to the creation of a left-to-right shunt.	部分血液从右肺动脉异常回流至下腔静脉从而导致左向右分流的一种罕见先天性心脏缺陷。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011627	Aorto-ventricular tunnel	主动脉-心室隧道	Aorto-ventricular tunnel is a congenital, extracardiac channel which connects the ascending aorta above the sinutubular junction to the cavity of the left, or (less commonly) right ventricle.	主动脉-左室隧道是一种先天性的心外通道，将升主动脉与左心室（少量右心室）腔连接。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011628	Congenital defect of the pericardium	心包先天性缺陷	A developmental defect of the `pericardium` (FMA:9869) with congenital onset.	先天性发病的心包发育缺陷。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011629	Total absence of the pericardium	完全性心包膜缺损	No pericardium around the heart, occurring as a congenital defect, not the result of a surgical pericardectomy.	心脏周围没有心包膜，是先天性缺陷的一种，而不是由心包切除术所致。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011630	Complete diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	膈面心包完全缺失	No pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	隔面心包完全缺失。它是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包在心脏的其他部分正常存在。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011631	Complete right sided absence of pericardium	右侧心包完全缺失	No pericardium is present on the righthand side of the heart. It is a congenital absence of pericardium rather than the result of a pericardectomy.	心脏右侧心包完全缺失，属于先天性无心包而非心包切除术的结果。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011632	Partial right sided absence of pericardium	部分右侧心包缺失	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the righthand side of the heart.	右侧心包部分缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011633	Complete left sided absence of pericardium	左侧心包完全缺失	A congenital anomaly with complete lack of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	心脏左侧心包的先天性完全缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011634	Partial left sided absence of pericardium	部分左侧心包缺失	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	左侧心包部分缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011635	Partial diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	部分膈面心包缺失	Lack of a part of the pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	心脏膈面的部分心包缺失。是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包存在于心脏的其他部分。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011636	Abnormal origin of the coronary arteries	冠状动脉起源异常	Isolated abnormalities of the coronary artery origins. This may be in associated with other structural heart malformations but not the patterns of complex structural heart malformations which result in abnormal course of the coronary arteries.	单纯的冠状动脉起源异常。这可能与其它心脏结构畸形有关，但并不是复杂的心脏结构畸形导致的冠状动脉走行异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011637	Anomalous origin of coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	冠状动脉异常起源于肺动脉	A coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta.	冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011638	Anomalous origin of left coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	左冠状动脉异常起源于肺动脉	Left main coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the left cusp of the aortic valve.	左冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011639	Anomalous origin of right coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	右冠状动脉异常起源于肺动脉	Right coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the right cusp of the aortic valve.	右冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011640		单一冠状动脉起源	The presence of a single coronary artery ostium from which both coronary arteries arise.	两个冠状动脉发出位置只有单个冠状动脉孔的存在。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011641	Coronary artery fistula	冠状动脉瘘	A congenital malformation with abnormal connection between one of the coronary arteries and a heart chamber or another blood vessel.	冠状动脉与心腔或其他血管之间的先天性连接异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011642	Abnormality of the coronary sinus	冠状窦异常	An abnormality of the `coronary sinus` (FMA:4706). The coronary sinus is formed by the union of the great cardiac vein and the left marginal vein and terminates in the right atrium.	冠状窦的异常。冠状窦是由心大静脉和左缘静脉汇合而成并终止在右心房的大血管样结构。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011643	Coronary sinus atrial septal defect	冠状静脉窦型房间隔缺损	An atrial septal defect characterized by a deficiency in the tissue separating the coronary sinus from the left atrium (LA). This results in partial or complete unroofing of the coronary sinus leading to a predominantly left-to-right shunt through the coronary sinus (LA to coronary sinus to right atrium [RA]). The orifice of the ostium is frequently large because of the increased flow. From the RA side, the defect is located at the level of the coronary sinus ostium and may also include some deficiency in atrial tissue around the ostium. From the LA side, the size can be variable depending on the degree of unroofing of the coronary sinus.	伴随冠状静脉窦与左心房连接的组织缺损的房间隔缺损。这将导致冠状窦的部分或全部去顶，引起通过冠状窦的左向右分流（左心房流向冠状动脉窦然后到右心房（RA））。由于血流量增大，窦孔逐渐变大。右心房的缺损主要存在于冠状窦口，也包括窦口周围的心房组织缺损。左心房缺损的大小依赖于冠状窦去顶的程度。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011644	Coronary sinus diverticulum	冠状窦憩室	A venous pouch within the left ventricular wall, with a neck opening into the coronary sinus.	左心室壁内的静脉袋，具有一颈口进入冠状静脉窦。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011645	Sinus of Valsalva aneurysm	Valsalva窦瘤	The dilatation of the aortic wall behind each of the cusps of the aortic valve.	主动脉瓣尖后的主动脉壁扩张。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011646	Juxtaductal coarctation of the aorta	管旁主动脉缩窄	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized at the insertion of the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `juxtaductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3778).	位于动脉导管插入处（如主动脉弓管旁区，FMA:3778）的主动脉缩窄。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011647	Postductal coarctation of the aorta	主动脉缩窄Postductal	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized distal to the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `postductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3776).	狭窄或主动脉局部远端狭窄的动脉导管未闭，即主动脉arch`的`postductal区域（FMA:3776）。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011648	Patent ductus arteriosus after birth at term	足月出生后动脉导管未闭	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus in postnatal life when birth was at 37 completed weeks of gestation or greater.	足月出生（妊娠37周或更长时间）的婴儿，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011649	Patent ductus arteriosus after premature birth	早产儿动脉导管未闭	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus when birth was at less than 37 weeks completed gestation.	婴儿在少于完整的37周妊娠期出生时，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011650	Bilateral ductus arteriosus	双侧动脉导管	The presence of both a left and a right ductus arteriosus.	含有左、右两个动脉导管。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011651	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴靠近两大动脉室中隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴靠近两大动脉室中隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄。靠近两大动脉室间隔缺损（double committed ventricular septal defect）:此型缺损在右心室双出口罕见，约占3%～4%。两大动脉多为并列关系。由于此缺损位于室间隔上方和漏斗隔严重发育不全或缺如，所以缺损则位于两大动脉环的下方。两大动脉瓣环为缺损后上缘，缺损的前下缘为隔缘束的上支，后下缘为隔缘束下支。往往无主动脉下圆锥或仅在室间隔缺损和两大动脉瓣环之间有一窄条肌肉束，可伴有主动脉与二尖瓣或肺动脉与三尖瓣纤维连续。心脏传导束离开缺损边缘较远，很少因手术产生心脏传导阻滞。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011652	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴靠近两大动脉室间隔缺损不伴肺动脉狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴靠近两大动脉室间隔缺损不伴肺动脉狭窄
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011653	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴远离两大动脉室间隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴远离两大动脉室间隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄。远离两大动脉室间隔缺损（noncommitted或remote ventricular septal defect）:此缺损比较少见，在右心室双出口中占5%～8%。两大动脉多呈并列关系，右侧大动脉异位少见。远离两大动脉室间隔缺损合并Rastelli的C型完全性房室隔缺损比较多见，往往有脾脏异常、单心房或内脏异位。不合并完全性房室隔缺损者，两大动脉开口与室间隔缺损之间有3～5个三尖瓣乳头肌及其腱索，缺损位于隔瓣后，属于流入部室间隔缺损，房室结位置正常，希氏束和左束支走行于缺损后上缘室间隔左心室面；缺损位于三尖瓣前瓣和隔瓣之间，属于围膜部缺损，心脏传导束走行于缺损后下缘室间隔左心室面。此型室间隔缺损可有心房反位或合并左心室发育不全
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011654	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴远离两大动脉室间隔缺损不伴肺动脉狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴远离两大动脉室间隔缺损不伴肺动脉狭窄
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011655	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴主动脉下室间隔缺损和肺动脉瓣狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴主动脉下室间隔缺损和肺动脉瓣狭窄
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011656	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴主动脉下室间隔缺损，不伴肺动脉瓣狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴主动脉下室间隔缺损，不伴肺动脉瓣狭窄
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011657	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口肺动脉瓣下室间隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口肺动脉瓣下室间隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄。肺动脉下室间隔缺损（subpulmonary ventricular septal defect）:右心室双出口伴有肺动脉下室间隔缺损又称Taussig-Bing心脏畸形（Taussig-Bing malformation）。右心室双出口中占20%～30%，多为两大动脉并列，占73%。在此心脏畸形中，均有漏斗隔对位异常。室间隔缺损位于室间隔前上方。如有肺动脉下圆锥，圆锥肌肉构成室间隔缺损上缘，其后下缘可延伸至三尖瓣环；如无肺动脉下圆锥，则缺损侧位于肺动脉瓣环下方。根据肺动脉横跨程度，缺损后上缘为肺动脉瓣与二尖瓣或三尖瓣纤维连续或肺动脉瓣环，其后下缘为肌肉室间隔。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011658	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损，不伴肺动脉瓣狭窄	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口，伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损，不伴肺动脉瓣狭窄
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011659	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent pulmonary valve	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣缺失	Features of tetralogy of Fallot with either rudimentary ridges or the complete absence of pulmonic valve tissue.	以脊部发育不全或完全没有肺动脉瓣组织为特点的法洛四联症。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011660	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from the ascending aorta with the contralateral pulmonary artery arising from the right ventricle.	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉，而对侧肺动脉起源于右心室。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011661	Anomalous origin of left pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	The left pulmonary artery originates from the ascending aorta in the presence of a pulmonary valve and main pulmonary artery.	在肺动脉瓣和肺主动脉存在的情况下，左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011662	Tricuspid atresia	三尖瓣闭锁	Failure to develop of the tricuspid valve and thus lack of the normal connection between the right atrium and the right ventricle.	三尖瓣发育障碍导致右心房和右心室之间无法正常连接。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011663	Right ventricular cardiomyopathy	右室心肌病	Right ventricular dysfunction (global or regional) with functional and morphological right ventricular abnormalities, with or without left ventricular disease.	右心功能不全（全部或部分）与功能和形态右心室发育异常，伴或不伴有左心室疾病。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011664	Left ventricular noncompaction cardiomyopathy	左室致密化不全心肌病	Left ventricular non-compaction (LVNC) is characterized by prominent left ventricular trabeculae and deep inter-trabecular recesses. The myocardial wall is often thickened with a thin, compacted epicardial layer and a thickened endocardial layer. In some patients, LVNC is associated with left ventricular dilatation and systolic dysfunction, which can be transient in neonates.	左室致密化不全性心肌病（LVNC）的特征是有显着的左心室小梁和深间小梁壁凹。心肌壁往往增厚，伴随薄且致密的心外膜层和增厚的心内膜层。在一些患者中，LVNC与左心室扩张和收缩功能障碍有关，在新生儿种可能只是瞬时的现象。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011665	Takotsubo cardiomyopathy	应激性心肌病	takotsubo cardiomyopathy is characterized by transient regional systolic dysfunction involving the left ventricular apex and/or mid-ventricle in the absence of obstructive coronary disease on coronary angiography. Patients present with an abrupt onset of angina-like chest pain, and have diffuse T-wave inversion, sometimes preceded by ST-segment elevation.	应激性心肌病的特征是通过血管造影术并未发现冠脉阻滞症状但却出现了涉及左心室心尖和/或中心室的短暂局部收缩功能障碍。患者表现为突发性的胸绞痛和弥漫性T波倒置，有时会有ST段抬高和轻度心肌酶升高。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011666	Absent right superior vena cava	右上腔静脉缺失	Absence of the right superior vena cava (RSVC). An absent RSVC is always associated with a persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC). During normal fetal development, the left-sided anterior venous cardinal system regresses, leaving the coronary sinus (CS) and the ligament of Marshall. Failure of the closure of the left anterior cardinal vein results in PLSVC. In general, PLSVC is associated with the right superior vena cava (RSVC) and drains into the RA via a dilated CS. When developmental arrest occurs at an earlier stage, the CS is absent and the PLSVC drains into the left atrium.	右上腔静脉（RSVC）的缺失。右上腔静脉的缺失常与永存左上腔静脉（PLSVC）有关。胎儿正常发育过程中，左侧前静脉离开冠状窦（CS）和Marshall韧带后，系统性退化。左侧前静脉的关闭不全导致右上腔静脉的缺失。在一般情况下，PLSVC与右上腔静脉（RSVC）连接，通过扩张的CS汇入RA。在较早阶段发育停滞时，CS缺失，PLSVC汇入进入左心房。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011667	Bilateral superior vena cava with bridging vein	双侧上腔静脉伴桥静脉	The presence of bilateral superior vena cava and bridging vein.	双侧上腔静脉与桥静脉同时存在。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011668	Bilateral superior vena cava with no bridging vein	双侧上腔静脉不伴桥静脉	The presence of bilateral superior vena cava without bridging vein.	只存在双侧上腔静脉，不含有桥静脉。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011669	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	左上腔静脉直接引流至左心房	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	左上腔静脉直接将血液输送至左心房，正常应该至右心房。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011670	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	左上腔静脉引流至冠状窦	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	左上腔静脉引流至冠状窦，正常应该至右心房。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011671	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation	下腔静脉中断伴奇静脉延续	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation is the result of connection failure between the right subcardinal vein and the right vitelline vein. Consequently, venous blood from the caudal part of the body reaches the heart via the azygous vein and superior vena cava.	中断下腔静脉伴奇静脉延续是右下主静脉和右卵黄静脉之间的连接失败的结果。因此，从机体的尾部静脉血液经由奇静脉和上腔静脉到达心脏。
肿瘤;心血管系统的异常	HP:0011672	Cardiac myxoma	心脏粘液瘤	A myxoma (tumor of primitive connective tissue) of the heart. Cardiac myxomas consist of stellate to plump, cytologically bland mesenchymal cells set in a myxoid stroma. Cardiac myxomas are of endocardial origina and general project from the endocardium into a cardiac chamber.	心脏的粘液瘤（原生结缔组织肿瘤）。心脏粘液瘤由存在于粘液样基质中的星形、丰满的、表面光滑的细胞构成。心脏粘液瘤是由心内膜起源，由心内膜扩散到心腔。
肿瘤;心血管系统的异常	HP:0011673	Cardiac hemangioma	心脏血管瘤	Abnormal proliferation of blood vessels within the cardiac cavities attached to the endocardium.	连接心腔与心内膜血管的异常增生。
肿瘤;心血管系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0011674	Cardiac teratoma	心脏畸胎瘤	A teratoma within the heart. Most commonly, these tumors are detected in the pericardial cavity attached to the pulmonary artery and aorta. The tumour size within the heart varies from 2 to 9 cm in diameter, and intrapericardial tumors as large as 15 cm have been reported. Intracardiac tumors arise from the atrial or ventricular wall as nodular masses protruding into the cardiac chambers. Cardiac and pericardial teratomas are easily detected in the fetus and neonate by two-dimensional echocardiography as heterogeneous and encapsulated cystic masses. Histologically, cardiac teratomas contain multiple immature elements including epithelium, neuroglial tissue, thyroid, pancreas, smooth and skeletal muscle, cartilage and bone.	在心脏内的畸胎瘤，一般，存在于与肺动脉和主动脉相连的心包腔内，直径大约2至9厘米，已报道的最大肿瘤15cm。心内的肿瘤起源于心房或心室壁的结节状肿块，扩散到心腔。由于其异质性以及包裹性囊性肿块，心脏和心包中的畸胎瘤很容易通过胎儿和新生儿的二维超声心动图检测到。组织学上，心脏畸胎瘤包含多个组分，包括上皮细胞、神经胶质组织、甲状腺、胰腺、平滑肌、横纹肌、软骨和骨。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011675	Arrhythmia	心律失常	Any cardiac rhythm other than the normal sinus rhythm. Such a rhythm may be either of sinus or ectopic origin and either regular or irregular. An arrhythmia may be due to a disturbance in impulse formation or conduction or both.	非正常窦性心律的其他心律。这样的心律可能是窦或异位的起源，有的规律有的不规律。心律失常由心脏搏动的起源或传导紊乱引起。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011676	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent subarterial conus	法洛四联症伴亚动脉锥缺失	A form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by no subarterial conus.	法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为亚动脉锥的缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011677	Tetralogy of Fallot with atrioventricular canal defect	法洛四联症伴房室管缺陷	An form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by defect of atrioventricular canal.	法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为房室管存在缺陷。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011678	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries	法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁和主要肺主动脉侧支动脉	A type of tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia in which all pulmonary blood flow is derived from major aortopulmonary collateral arteries (MAPCA).	法洛四联症合并肺动脉闭锁的一种，患者肺部的血液主要从体肺侧支动脉（MAPCA）流入。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011679	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary stenosis	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄	The commonest form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by pulmonary stenosis, overriding aorta, ventricular septum defect, and right ventricular hypertrophy, without pulmonary atresia, absent pulmonary valve, atrioventricular canal defect or absent subarterial conus.	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄是法洛四联症的一种最常见的形式，主要特征为肺动脉狭窄，主动脉骑跨，室间隔缺损，右心室肥大，无肺动脉闭锁，肺动脉瓣缺如，房室管缺陷或缺失下动脉圆锥。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011680	Single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	不定形单心室	A rare congenital heart defect characterized by one ventricle with indeterminate morphology and receiving both tricuspid and mitral valves or a common AV valve with indeterminate morphology.	一种罕见的先天性心脏畸形，人体只有一个形态不确定的心室，同时具有三尖瓣和二尖瓣，或一个形态不确定的共同房室瓣。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011681	Subarterial ventricular septal defect	动脉下室间隔缺损	A ventricular septal defect that lies beneath the semilunar valve(s) in the conal or outlet septum.	动脉下室间隔缺损是一种在半月瓣之下或隔膜外发生的室间隔缺损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011682	Perimembranous ventricular septal defect	膜周室间隔缺损	A ventricular septal defect that is confluent with and involves the membranous septum and is bordered by an atrioventricular valve, not including the type 3 VSDs.	膜周室间隔缺损是与膜性中隔汇合、涉及膜性中隔、以房室瓣为界、不包括3型房室间隔缺损的一类房室间隔缺损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011683	Restrictive ventricular septal defect	限制性室间隔缺损	Ventricular septal defect (VSD) that is small enough to restrict flow across it such that a pressure gradient exists between the two sides of the VSD.	室间隔缺损（VSD），是室间隔太小使得两侧之间存在压力梯度，限制了通过的血流量。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011684	Non-restrictive ventricular septal defect	非限制性室间隔缺损	Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that does not restrict flow across it sufficiently to generate a pressure gradient between the two sides of the VSD.	不限制血流经过，但足以在室间隔两侧产生压力梯度的室间隔缺损。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011685	Infra-aortic superior vena cava	大动脉下上腔静脉	The superior vena cava passes below the aortic arch.	上腔静脉从主动脉弓下方通过。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011686	Abnormal coronary artery course	冠状动脉走行异常	An abnormal path of a coronary artery.	冠状动脉血管走向的异常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011687	AV nodal tachycardia	房室结性心动过速	A type of supraventricular tachycardia that originates in the atrioventricular node.	一种起源于房室结的室上性心动过速。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011688	Supraventricular tachycardia with an accessory connection mediated pathway	旁路连接介导途径性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011689	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory connection	隐匿旁路连接性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011690	Permanent junctional reciprocating tachycardia	持续性交接处反复性心动过速	It is an abnormal heart rhythm arising from improper electrical activity of the heart that happens reciprocately in the junction of ventricle and atrial.	这是一类心脏非正常电活动引起的异常心脏节律，电波在房室交界处往复传递。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011691	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the left free wall	左侧游离壁隐匿旁路性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011692	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the right free wall	右侧游离壁隐匿旁路性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011693	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the septum	间隔隐匿旁路性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011694	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway	显性旁路性室上性心动过速		
神经系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常	HP:0011695	Cerebellar hemorrhage	小脑出血	`Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) into the parenchyma of the cerebellum.	小脑实质内的出血(MPATH:119)。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011696	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the left free wall	左侧游离壁显性旁路性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011697	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the right free wall	右侧游离壁显性旁路性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011698	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the septum	间隔显性旁路性室上性心动过速		
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011699	Atrial reentry tachycardia	心房折返性心动过速	Atrial tachycardia (IART) is a kind of atrial tachycardia caused by reentry mechanism.	心房折返性心动过速是由于折返机制引起的一种房性心动过速。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011700	Automatic atrial tachycardia	自律性房性心动过速	Automatic atrial tachycardia refers to a kind of tachycardia ，because of the automaticity intensity of ectopic pacemaker in atrial increased，speed up the frequency of excited release.	自律性房性心动过速（AAT）是指心房内异位起搏点自律性强度增高，发放激动的频率加快所引起的房性心动过速。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011701	Multifocal atrial tachycardia	多灶性房性心动过速	A type of tachycardia,which is resulted from alternating impulse origined from multiple ectopic pacemaker in the atrial.	是由于心房内多个异位起搏点交替发放冲动形成的房性心动过速。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011702	Abnormal electrophysiology of sinoatrial node origin	窦房结起源的电生理学异常	An abnormality of the sinoatrial (SA) node in the right atrium. THe SA node acts as the pacemaker of the heart.	位于右心房的窦房结（SA）的异常。窦房结起着心脏起搏器的作用。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011703	Sinus tachycardia	窦性心动过速	A simple tachycardia with origin in the sinus node with gradual onset and termination.	一种单纯的心动过速，起源于窦房结，启动和终止都比较缓慢。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011704	Sick sinus syndrome	病窦综合征	Dysfunction of the sinoatrial node manifested by persistent sinus bradycardia,sinus arrest,sinoatrial exit block,chronic atrial fibrillation and inability of the heart to resume sinus rhythm following cardioversion for atrial fibrillation.	窦房结功能障碍表现为持续性窦性心律过缓，窦性停搏，窦房输出阻滞，慢性房颤和房颤电复律后心动无力。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011705	First degree atrioventricular block	一度房室传导阻滞	Delay of conduction through the atrioventricular node, which is manifested as prolongation of the PR interval in the electrocardiogram (EKG). All atrial impulses reach the ventricles.	通过房室结点的传导迟滞，这表现为在心电图（EKG）中的PR间隔延长。所有的心房冲动到达心室。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011706	Second degree atrioventricular block	二度房室传导阻滞	An intermittent  atrioventricular block with failure of some atrial impulses to conduct to the ventricles, i.e., some but not all atrial impulses are conducted through the atrioventricular node and trigger ventricular contraction.	一种脉冲不能正常的从心房传导至心室的间歇性房室传导阻滞，也就是说，有一些但不是所有的心房冲动能通过房室结传导进而触发心室收缩。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011707	Mobitz I atrioventricular block	默比茨I型房室传导阻滞	Progressive PR interval prolongation with the subsequent occurrence of a single nonconducted P wave that results in a pause. The pause that follows the nonconducted impulse is less than fully compensatory (less than the sum of two normal sinus intervals).	心电图表现为PR间期逐渐延长直至QRS波群脱落（P波不能下传），RR间期逐渐缩短直至一个P波不能下传，包含受阻P波在内的RR间期小于正常窦性PP间期的两倍。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011708	Mobitz II atrioventricular block	默比茨II型房室传导阻滞	A type of second degree atrioventricular (AV) block characterized by sudden failure to conduct an impulse through the AV node without a preceding change in the PR interval.	心电图表现为PR间期固定，每隔一个或数个心动周期出现一个或数个心室漏搏，下传心动周期的PR间期可正常或延长。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011709	Atrioventricular dissociation	房室分离	Atrioventricular (AV) dissociation is present if the atria and the ventricles are under the control of two separate pacemakers.  AV dissociation can occur is the absence of a primary AV conduction disturbance.	房室（AV）分离是指心房和心室分别由两个单独的起搏器的控制，一般由一级房室传导受阻导致。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011710	Bundle branch block	束支传导阻滞	Block of conduction of electrical impulses along the Bundle of His or along one of its bundle branches.	房室束或其分支的电流传导阻滞。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011711	Left anterior fascicular block	左前分支传导阻滞	Conduction block in the anterior division of the left bundle branch of the bundle of His.	在希氏束左束支的前分支传导阻滞。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011712	Right bundle branch block	右束支传导阻滞	A conduction block of the right branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a prolongation of the QRS complex (greater than 0.12 s) with delayed activation of the right ventricle and terminal delay on the EKG.	希氏束的右支的传导阻滞。这表现为QRS波群（大于0.12s）的延长同时伴有右心室激活延迟和EKG的终端延迟。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011713	Left bundle branch block	左束支传导阻滞	A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.	希氏束左支传导阻滞。这表现为心电图上QRS波形态受到广泛干扰。
免疫系统的异常;心血管系统的异常	HP:0011714	Libman-Sacks lesions	利布曼 - 萨克斯病变	Libman-Sacks valvular lesions are sterile fibrofibrinous vegetations that favor the left-sided heart valves and usually form on the ventricular surface of the mitral valve.	利布曼-萨克斯瓣膜病变是非细菌性纤维素赘生物，好发于左侧心脏瓣膜，通常在二尖瓣的心室表面形成。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011715	Trifascicular block	三支传导阻滞	Abnormal conduction in all three divisions of the intraventricular conducting tissue.	心室内传导组织的三个分支全部异常传导。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011716	Junctional ectopic tachycardia	异位性交界性心动过速	A tachycardia arising in the conduction tissues surrounding the atrioventricular node. It usually occurs during myocardial infarction,after heart surgery,or in digitalis intoxication. The rate may range from 140 to 250 beats per minute.	起源于房室结附近传导组织的心动过速。通常发生于心脏手术后或洋地黄中度引起的心肌梗死。心率可能在140-250/分。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011717	AV nodal reentry tachycardia	房室结折返性心动过速	An unusually fast heart rate caused by an extra electrical connection that forms through the AV node	房室结处形成的额外电连接，引起异常的心动过速。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011718	Abnormality of the pulmonary veins	肺静脉异常	An abnormality of the `pulmonary veins` (FMA:70827).	肺静脉的异常（FMA:70827）。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011719	Supracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	心上型完全肺静脉异位连接	Type 1 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	1型完全性肺静脉异位连接。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011720	Cardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	心脏完全性肺静脉异常连接	Type 2 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	2型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011721	Infracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	心下完全性肺静脉异常连接	Type 3 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	3型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常	HP:0011722	Mixed total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	混合型完全性肺静脉异常连接	Type 4 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	4型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011723	Congenital malformation of the right heart	先天性右心畸形	A developmental malformation of the right heart with congenital onset.	先天性发病的右心畸形。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011724	Uhl's anomaly	尤尔畸形	It is a very rare congenital heart disease with a partial or total loss of the myocardial muscle in the right ventricle.	是一类罕见的先天性心脏病，表现为右心室心肌的完全缺失。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011725	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia	紊乱性多源性房性心动过速	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia is a kind of rare and unique atrial arrhythmia.	紊乱性房性心动过速是一种少见的独特的房性心律失常。
心血管系统的异常	HP:0011726	Persistent fetal circulation	持续性胎儿循环	A syndrome of persistent pulmonary hypertension in the newborn infant,without demonstrable cardiac disease. It is characterized by cyanosis and acidosis,severe pulmonary vasoconstriction, hypertrophy of pulmonary arterial muscle,and elevated pulmonary vascular resistance,with resultant right-to-left shunting of blood through a patent ductus arteriosus and at times a patent foramen ovale.	指出生时动脉导管和卵圆孔未闭,当肺动脉压及肺血管阻力升高,导致右向左分流而引起新生儿青紫。
四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0011727	Peroneal muscle weakness	腓骨肌肉无力	Weakness of the peroneal muscles.	虚弱的腓骨肌。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011728	Elbow clonus	肘部阵挛	Clonus at the elbow joint, i.e., an  exaggerated phasic stretch reflex characterized by repetitive, rhythmic contractions at the elbow, generated by rapid passive stretch at the elbow joint.	在肘关节发生的阵挛，例如出现夸张的牵张反射，表现为肘部重复的，有节奏的收缩，通常是快速的被动牵拉肘关节产生的。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0011729	Abnormality of joint mobility	关节活动异常	An abnormality in the range and ease of motion of joints across their normal range.	关节活动范围和灵活度的异常。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011730	Abnormality of central sensory function	中央感觉功能异	An abnormality of cortical sensation. Assuming the primary sensory modalities are intact and the patient is alert and cooperative, the presence of an abnormality of sensory function usually indicates a lesion of a parietal cortex or of the thalamocortical projections to the parietal cortex.	皮质性感觉的异常。假设初级感觉形态完好，且患者处于觉醒和协作状态，感觉功能异常的存在通常表明的丘脑突起到顶叶皮质的病变。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011731	Abnormality of circulating cortisol level	血皮质醇水平异常	An abnormality of the concentration of `cortisol` (CHEBI:17650) in the blood.	血液循环中皮质醇浓度异常。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011732	Abnormality of adrenal morphology	肾上腺形态异常	Any structural anomaly of the `adrenal glands` (FMA:9604).	肾上腺的任何结构异常。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011733	Abnormality of adrenal physiology	肾上腺生理异常	A functional abnormality of the `adrenal glands` (FMA:9604).	肾上腺的功能异常（FMA:9604）。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011734	Central adrenal insufficiency	中枢性肾上腺功能不全	A form of adrenal insufficiency related to a lack of ACTH, which leads to a decrease in the production of cortisol by the adrenal glands. Aldosterone production is not usually affected.	由于促肾上腺皮质激素缺乏, 导致皮质醇产生减少引起的肾上腺功能不全。醛固酮的产生通常不受影响。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011735	Adrenocorticotropin (ACTH) deficient adrenal insufficiency	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）缺乏性肾上腺功能不全	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in ACTH production.	促肾上腺皮质激素的生产缺陷导致的肾上腺功能不全。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011736	Primary hyperaldosteronism	原发性醛固酮增多症	A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by a defect within the adrenal gland.	由于肾上腺缺陷而引起的醛固酮过多症。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011737	Corticotropin-releasing hormone (CRH) deficient adrenal insufficiency	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）缺陷引起的肾上腺功能不全	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in corticotropin-releasing hormone production.	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素产生缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011738	Corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor (CRHR) defect	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体（CRHR）缺陷	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in the corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor.	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011739	Dexamethasone-suppresible primary hyperaldosteronism	地塞米松可抑性原发性醛固酮增多症	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone can be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone.	原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，该病通过使用地塞米松来可以抑制过多的醛固酮产生。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011740	Glucocorticoid-insensitive primary hyperaldosteronism	糖皮质激素不敏感的原发性醛固酮增多症	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone cannot be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone or similar glucocorticoids.	原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，其醛固酮的过量产生无法用地塞米松或类似的糖皮质激素抑制。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011741	Secondary hyperaldosteronism	继发性醛固酮增多症	A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by abnormally increased renin levels.	一种由于肾素异常增加而导致的醛固酮增多症。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011742	Ectopic adrenal gland	异位肾上腺	Abnormal anatomical location of the adrenal gland.	肾上腺的解剖位置异常。
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011743	Adrenal gland agenesis	肾上腺发育缺失	Absent development of the adrenal gland.	肾上腺未发育
内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011744	Secondary hypercorticolism	继发性皮质醇增生症	Hypercortisolemia associated with a overproduction of ACTH (often from a tumor), leading secondarily to overproduction of cortisol.	由于促肾上腺皮质激素过量产生（往往来自肿瘤）而导致的继发性皮质醇的过度生产。
肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011745	Non-secretory adrenocortical adenoma	非分泌性肾上腺皮质腺瘤	An hormonally inactive adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that does not secrete excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.	一个激素不活跃的肾上腺皮质腺瘤，也就是说，不过量分泌肾上腺激素的腺瘤。
肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011746	Secretory adrenocortical adenoma	分泌型肾上腺皮质腺瘤	An hormonally active adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that secretes excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.	一种仍具激素分泌活性的肾上腺皮质腺瘤，这种腺瘤分泌过量的肾上腺皮质激素。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011747	Abnormality of the anterior pituitary	垂体前叶异常	An abnormality of the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.	腺垂体,又被称为垂体前叶的异常
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011748	Adrenocorticotropic hormone deficiency	促肾上腺皮质激素不足	A reduced ability to secrete adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), a hormone that stimulates the adrenal cortex to secrete of glucocorticoids such as cortisol.	分泌促肾上腺皮质激素(ACTH)的能力下降，ACTH是刺激肾上腺皮质分泌糖皮质激素，如皮质醇的一种激素。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011749	Adrenocorticotropic hormone excess	促肾上腺皮质激素过多	Overproduction of adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), which generally leads secondarily to overproduction of cortisol by the adrenal cortex.	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）产生过多，通常导致继发的肾上腺皮质产生过多皮质醇。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011750	Neoplasm of the anterior pituitary	垂体前叶肿瘤	The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.	腺垂体，也被称为脑垂体的前叶的肿瘤。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011751	Abnormality of the posterior pituitary	垂体后叶异常	An abnormality of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628), which is also known as the posterior lobe of the hypophysis.	神经垂体的异常，神经垂体又被称为垂体后叶。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011752	Neoplasm of the posterior pituitary	垂体后叶肿瘤	The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628), which is also known as the posterior lobe of the hypophysis.	神经垂体，也被称为垂体后叶的肿瘤。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011753	Posterior pituitary dysgenesis	垂体后叶发育异常	Abnormal development of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) during embryonic growth and development.	胚胎期时垂体后叶的异常发育。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011754	Pituicytoma	垂体细胞瘤	A solid, low grade, spindle cell, glial neoplasm of adults that originates in the neurohypophysis or infundibulum. Clinical signs and symptoms include visual disturbance, headache and features of hypopituitarism. Pituicytomas are well-circumscribed, solid masses that can measure up to several centimeters. Histologically, they show a compact architecture consisting of elongate, bipolar spindle cells arranged in interlacing fascicles or assuming a storiform pattern.	成人的一种实体性的，低分级的，梭形细胞神经胶质肿瘤，起源于神经垂体或垂体漏斗部。临床症状包括视力障碍，头痛和垂体功能低下的特点。 垂体细胞瘤是边界清楚的实体性肿块，直径可达数厘米。组织学上表现为拉长的双极梭形细胞以交错束状或席纹状图案排列的紧凑结构。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011755	Ectopic posterior pituitary	垂体后叶异位	An abnormal anatomical location of the posterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628). The posterior pituitary is normally present in the dorsal portion of the sella turcica, but when ectopic is usually near the median eminence. This defect is likely to be due to abnormal migration during embryogenesis.	垂体后叶，即神经垂体的解剖位置异常。垂体后叶通常位于蝶鞍背部，但是发生异位时通常接近正中隆起。这种缺陷可能是由于胚胎发育过程中的异常迁移。
神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011756	Posterior pituitary agenesis	垂体后叶缺失	Absence of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) owing to a developmental defect.	由于发育缺陷而导致的缺少垂体后叶。

神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011761	Pituitary null cell adenoma	垂体无特征细胞腺瘤	A type of pituitary adenoma that is of unknown cellular origin and that lacks immunocytochemical or fine structural markers.  Null cell adenomas are not associated with hormone excess.	一种未知细胞来源和缺乏免疫细胞化学或精细结构标记的垂体腺瘤。这种垂体腺瘤不伴随激素的过多分泌。

神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011763	Pituitary carcinoma	垂体腺癌	A pituitary tumor with subarachnoid, brain, or systemic metastasis. The diagnosis of a pituitary carcinoma requires evidence of metastatic disease, either outside the central nervous system (CNS) or as separate noncontiguous foci within the CNS.	一种伴蛛网膜下腔，脑或全身转移的垂体肿瘤。垂体腺癌的诊断需要肿瘤转移的证据，或者是转移到中枢神经系统（CNS）之外，或者是中枢神经系统内的单独的非连续的癌症。
神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011764	Pituitary spindle cell oncocytoma	垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤	A spindled-to-epithelioid, oncocytic, nonendocrine neoplasm of the anterior hypophysis that manifests in adults and follows a benign clinical course. Pituitary spindle cell oncocytomas are firm, fibrous, and adherent to surrounding structures and are highly vascular.	垂体前叶的一种梭形至上皮样的嗜酸性非内分泌肿瘤，发生于成人，临床表现良性。 垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤质地致密，纤维化，并附着到周围的结构且血管富集。

内分泌系统的异常	HP:0011770	Tertiary hyperparathyroidism	三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症	A type of hyperparathyroidism that occurs following kidney transplantation, which is a treatment for secondary hyperparathyroidism. Although kidney transplantation leads to a normalization of serum calcium and parathyroid hormone in most patients. The state of persistent hypercalcemia and hyperparathyroidism is referred to as tertiary hyperparathyroidism.	一种肾脏移植手术后出现的甲状旁腺功能亢进症。肾移植可以缓解继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进，大多数病人的血钙和甲状旁腺激素会趋向正常化，如果仍持续存在高血钙和甲状旁腺功能亢进则称为三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进。

神经系统的异常	HP:0011813	Increased cerebral lipofuscin	脑脂褐素增加	Lipofuscin (age pigment) is a brown-yellow, electron-dense, autofluorescent material that accumulates progressively over time in lysosomes of postmitotic cells, such as neurons and cardiac myocytes.  This term pertains if there is an increase in the accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.	脂褐素（老年斑）是一种棕黄色的，电子致密的，自体荧光材料，随着时间推移逐步沉积于有丝分裂后细胞的溶酶体，如神经元和心肌细胞。此术语适用于脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011814	Increased urinary hypoxanthine	尿次黄嘌呤增高	An increased level of `hypoxanthine` (CHEBI:17368) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	在`urine`（FMA:12274）的`hypoxanthine`水平升高（17368 CHEBI）。
头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0011815	Cephalocele	脑膨出	A congenital defect in the skull, whereby there is a protrusion of part of the cranial contents through a congenital defect in the cranium, usually covered with skin or mucous membrane. The term encephalocele refers to a subclass of these lesions in which brain tissue protrudes through the defect.	部分颅内容物因通过头盖骨先天性畸形而突起的颅骨先天性缺陷，通常有皮肤或粘膜覆盖。该脑膨出术语指这些病变中脑组织通过缺陷而突出的亚类。
神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0011816	Parietal encephalocele	顶叶脑膨出	An encephalocele located between bregma and lambda.	位于前囟和人字缝与矢状缝交界处之间的脑膨出。
神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常	HP:0011817	Basal encephalocele	基底脑膨出	Basal encephalocele is an encephalocele that occurs along the cribriform plate or through the sphenoid bone. The mass may appear in the nasal cavity, nasopharynx, epipharynx, sphenoid sinus, posterior orbit, or pterygopalatine fossa. The important distinction from other types is that no external tumor is visible except in those rare instances of herniations so large that they protrude through the mouth or nares.	基底脑膨出是发生沿筛板或通过蝶骨的膨出。膨出物质可能会出现在鼻腔，鼻咽，鼻旁咽，蝶窦，后眼眶，或翼腭窝。与其他类型的重要区别是没有外部肿瘤可见，除了大膨出压迫至使从嘴巴或鼻孔突出的罕见情况。

Chylopericardium is generally caused by obstruction of or trauma to the thoracic duct.	心包腔内乳糜液（由小肠乳糜管吸收的白色液体，主要由乳状淋巴液和脂肪组成，能够通过胸导管进入静脉）积累。乳糜心包一般由胸导管的阻塞或外伤引起的。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011876	Abnormal platelet volume	血小板体积异常	Anomalous size of platelets. Most normal sized platelets are 1.5 to 3 micrometers in diameter. Large platelets are 4 to 7 micrometers. Giant platelets are larger than 7 micrometers and usually 10 to 20 micrometers.	血小板大小异常。大多数正常大小的血小板的直径是1.5至3微米。大血小板4至7微米。巨血小板大于7微米，通常为10至20微米。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011900	Hypofibrinogenemia	低纤维蛋白原血症	Decreased concentration of fibrinogen in the blood.	血液中纤维蛋白浓度减少。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011901	Dysfibrinogenemia	异常纤维蛋白原血症	Qualitatively abnormal fibrinogen.	纤维蛋白原的定性异常。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011902	Abnormal hemoglobin	血红蛋白异常	Anomaly in the level or the function of hemoglobin, the oxygen-carrying protein of erythrocytes.	红细胞中携氧蛋白——血红蛋白水平或功能异常。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011903	Hemoglobin H	血红蛋白H	Hemoglobin H (HbH) contains four beta-globin chains. It is normally not present at all in blood, but may make up about 1-40 percent of all hemoglobin in HbH disease, a subform of alpha thalassemia.	血红蛋白H（血红蛋白H）包含四个β球蛋白链。正常情况下它不会出现，但在血红蛋白H病可达约1-40％，是α-地中海贫血的一种亚型。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011904	Persistence of hemoglobin F	持续性血红蛋白F	Hemoglobin F (HbF) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin gamma chains. It is the main form of hemoglobin in the fetus during the last seven months of intrauterine  development and in the half year of postnatal life. In adults it normally makes up less than one percent of all hemoglobiin. This term refers to an increase in HbF above this limit. In beta thalassemia major, it may represent over 90 percent of all hemoglobin, and in beta thalassemia minor it may make up between 0.5 to 4 percent.	血红蛋白F（HbF的）含有两条α链球蛋白和两条γ链球蛋白。这是胎儿血红蛋白的主要形式，存在于子宫内发育的最后七个月至出生后的半年。在成人中，通常它少于总血红蛋白的百分之一。此术语是指HbF的增加超过1%的。在重型β地中海贫血，它可能总血红蛋白的超过90％，在轻型地中海贫血，HbF通常在0.5%-4％之间。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011905	Reduced hemoglobin A	还原血红蛋白降低	Hemoglobin A (HbA) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin beta chains. HbA is normally the main adult hemoglobin, representing about 96-98 percent of all hemoglobin. This term represents a decreased in the proportion of HbA below this limit, and can be seen in various forms of thalassemia.	糖化血红蛋白（HBA）包含两条α链珠蛋白和两条β链珠蛋白。糖化血红蛋白通常是成人血红蛋白的主要成分，约占所有血红蛋白的96-98％左右。这个术语表示的HbA的比例低于96%，常见于各种形式地中海贫血。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011906	Reduced beta/alpha synthesis ratio	β/α合成比降低	A reduction in the ratio of production of beta globin to that of alpha globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of beta thalassemia.	β/α球蛋白合成比例减少。这是在各种形式的β地中海的主要异常。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011907	Reduced alpha/beta synthesis ratio	α/β合成比降低	A reduction in the ratio of production of alpha globin to that of beta globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of alpha thalassemia.	α球蛋白的产生少于β球蛋白。这是在各种形式的α地中海贫血的主要异常表型。

骨骼系统的异常	HP:0011912	Abnormality of the glenoid fossa	关节窝异常	An anomaly of the `glenoid fossa` (FMA:23275), also known as the glenoid cavity, which is the articular surface of the scapula that articulates with the head of the humerus.	关节窝（也称关节盂）的异常，它是与肱骨头铰接肩胛骨的关节面。

呼吸系统异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011919	Pleural empyema	脓胸	Accumulation of pus in the `pleural cavity` (FMA:9740).	脓液在胸腔积聚（FMA:9740）。
呼吸系统异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011920	Transudative pleural effusion	漏出性胸腔积液	A type of pleural effusion with a transudate (extravascular fluid with low protein content and a low specific gravity). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	漏出性胸腔积液（具有低蛋白含量和低比重特点）。根据light标准，可将胸腔积液分为漏出液和渗出液，符合以下一项或多项为渗出液:（1）胸水蛋白与血清蛋白的比率大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）与血清LDH比率大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于三分之二的正常血清LDH的上限。
呼吸系统异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011921	Exudative pleural effusion	渗出性胸腔积液	A type of pleural effusion with a exudate (extravascular fluid that has exuded out of a tissue or its capillaries due to injury or inflammation). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	一种具有渗出液的胸膜腔积液，渗出液为组织或其毛细血管因损伤或炎症而渗出的血管外液。胸腔积液分类基于Light标准，依据该标准，渗出液应符合以下至少一条:（1）胸水白蛋白/血清白蛋白的比值大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）/血清LDH比值大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于正常血清LDH上的限三分之二。
代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011922	Abnormal activity of mitochondrial respiratory chain	线粒体呼吸链活性异常	An increased or decreased activity of the `mitochondrial respiratory chain` (GO:0005746).	线粒体呼吸链的活性增高或降低(GO:0005746)。

代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0011925	Decreased activity of mitochondrial ATP synthase complex	线粒体ATP合成酶复合物活性降低	A reduction in the activity of the ` mitochondrial proton-transporting ATP synthase complex` (GO:0005753), which makes ATP via oxidative phosphorylation, and is sometimes described as Complex V of the electron transport chain.	在`线粒体质子转运ATP合酶complex`的活性的降低（GO:0005753），其通过氧化磷酸化使得ATP和有时被描述为电子传递链的复合物V。

神经系统的异常	HP:0011931	Abnormality of the cerebellar peduncle	小脑脚异常	An anomaly of the `cerebellar peduncles` (FMA:77791). The superior, middle, and inferior cerebellar peduncles emerge from the cerebellum. The superior cerebellar penduncles connect the cerebellum to the midbrain, the middle cerebellar peduncles connect the cerebellum to the pons, and the inferior cerebellar peduncle connects the medulla spinalis and medulla oblongata with the cerebellum.	在`小脑脚`的异常（FMA:77791）。脑干与小脑联系的包括上，中，下小脑脚。上小脑脚连接小脑和中脑；中小脑脚连接小脑和桥脑；下小脑脚连接延髓和小脑。

呼吸系统异常	HP:0011945	Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia	闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎	Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia (BOOP) is and interstitial lung abnormalitiy characterized  histopathologically by plugs of granulation tissue lying within small airways, alveolar ducts, and alveoli and by chronic inflammatory cell infiltration in alveolar walls. Patients with BOOP generally present with subacute illness, including shortness of breath, fever, malaise, and weight loss.	闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎（BOOP）是肺间质疾病的一种，组织病理学特征为肉芽组织阻塞小气道、肺泡管、肺泡，同时伴有肺泡壁的慢性炎细胞浸润。BOOP患者一般表现为亚急性起病，包括呼吸急促、发烧、全身乏力、体重减轻等。

消化系统的异常	HP:0011954	Nodular regenerative hyperplasia of liver	肝脏结节性再生性增生	Diffuse benign transformation of the hepatic parenchyma into small regenerative nodules with minimal or no fibrosis.	肝实质向小的再生性结节散在性的良性转化，伴随细微的纤维化或无纤维化。
免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0011955	Hepatic granulomatosis	肝肉芽肿	The presence of multiple granulomas in the liver as based on pathological examination. Granulomas are small 0.5 to 2 mm collections of modified macrophages called epithelioid cells usually surrounded by lymphocytes.	基于病理检测的肝脏中多个肉芽肿的存在。肉芽肿大小为0.5-2毫米，为由淋巴细胞包围的被称为上皮样细胞的改性巨噬细胞的集合。
消化系统的异常	HP:0011956	Intestinal lymphoid nodular  hyperplasia	肠道淋巴结节性增生	A lymphoproliferative abnormality of the intestine characterized by numerous visible mucosal nodules measuring up to, and rarely exceeding, 0.5 cm in diameter Histologically, hyperplastic lymphoid follicles with large germinal centres are seen in the lamina propria and superficial submucosa. There is enlargement of the mucosal B cell follicles caused by hyperplasia of the follicle centres; surrounded by a normal appearing mantle zone. Disease may involve the stomach, the entire small intestine, and the large intestine.	肠淋巴组织异常增生，其特征为大量可见的粘膜结节，直径可达或超过0.5厘米。在组织学上，在固有层和表面粘膜下层可见具有大的生发中心的增生的淋巴滤泡。卵泡中心增生引起粘膜B细胞滤泡肿大，由看似正常的冠状带围绕。该病可涉及胃、整个小肠及大肠。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0011957	Abnormality of the pectoral muscle	胸肌异常	An abnormality of the `pectoral muscle` (FMA:37349), comprising the pectoralis major, a thick, fan-shaped muscle of the anterior chest and the pectoralis minor, a thin, triangular muscle situated underneath the pectoralis major.	胸肌异常，包括胸大肌（前胸部厚且呈扇形的肌肉）和胸小肌（薄且呈三角的肌肉，位于胸大肌的下面）异常。

泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0011961	Non-obstructive azoospermia	非梗阻性无精子症	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from a defect in the production of spermatozoa in the testes. Can be differentiated from obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.	由于睾丸生成精子缺陷导致病人精液中检测不到任何可测水平的精子，睾丸活检可以将之与梗阻性无精子症相鉴别。
泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0011962	Obstructive azoospermia	梗阻性无精子症	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from post-testicular obstruction or retrograde ejaculation. Can be differentiated from non-obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.	由于睾丸后梗阻或逆行性射精造成病人精液中缺失任何可测水平的精子。睾丸活检可将之与非梗阻性无精子症相鉴别。
泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0011963	Pretesticular azoospermia	睾丸前无精症	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, due to a hypothalamic or pituitary abnormality diagnosed with hypo-gonadotropic-hypogonadism. The diagnosis is made on the basis of low LH and FSH levels and low or normal testosterone levels.	由于下丘脑或垂体异常导致的低促性腺-性腺功能减退，使精液中缺乏任何可测水平的精子。根据LH和FSH水平低、睾酮水平低（或正常）即可作出该项诊断。
神经系统的异常	HP:0011964	Intermittent painful muscle spasms	间歇性痛性肌痉挛	History of repeated intermittent involuntary muscle contractions that were painful.	反复、间歇性、伴疼痛的、不自主的肌肉收缩的病史。

Activated factor V (fVa)  is a cofactor in the formation of the prothrombinase complex.	凝血因子V活性增加。凝血因子V由微量的凝血酶激活后形成因子Va，（然后由较大量的凝血酶灭活）。活化的因子V（FVA）是凝血酶原酶复合物形成的辅助因子。

肿瘤;体壁的异常	HP:0012035	Steatocystoma multiplex	多发性皮脂腺囊瘤	Multiple, localized or widespread, asymptomatic or inflammatory dermal cysts involving the pilosebaceous units. Lesions can appear anywhere on the body, but steatocystoma multiplex is more commonly involved with those areas of the skin with a high density of developed pilosebaceous units (e.g., the axilla, groin, neck, and proximal extremities).	发生于毛囊皮脂腺的多发性，无症状或炎症性皮肤囊肿，局部或广泛分布。皮损可出现在身体的任何部位，但在毛囊皮脂腺分布密集的部位（如腋窝，腹股沟，颈部和四肢近端）更为常见。
