骨骼系统的异常	HP:0100266	Synostosis of carpals/tarsals	腕骨（跗骨）的骨性连合	The carpus consists of the scaphoid, lunate, triquetal, pisiform, captitate, hamate, trapezoid, and trapezium bones. The tarsus consists of the talus, calcaneus, navicular, cuboid, cuneiform, and navicular bones. This term applies if there is any fusion among the bones of the carpus or tarsus.	腕骨由舟状骨、月骨、三角骨、豆状骨、头状骨、钩骨、棱形骨和斜方骨。跗骨由距骨、跟骨、舟状骨、骰骨、楔状骨和舟形骨。如果腕骨和跗骨间发生任何骨融合的，应用此术语。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0100267	Lip pit	唇窝	A depression located on a lip.	嘴唇上的小凹陷。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0100268	Upper lip pit	上唇窝	Depression located on the vermilion of the upper lip, usually paramedian.	上唇唇红中线处两旁形成的凹陷。
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0100269	Paramedian lip pit	正中旁唇窝	Depression located paramedially on the vermilion of a lip.	上嘴唇的唇红正中旁的凹陷。
四肢异常	HP:0100270	Abnormality of dorsoventral patterning of the limbs	四肢的背腹模式异常	An abnormality resulting from a defect or disruption of dorsoventral patterning that normally happens during early development of the limbs. A disruption of the normal development of the dorsoventral axis may lead to a variable spectrum of different phenotypic abnormalities that may affect the nails and or palmar and dorsal side of the hands and/or feet, ultimately changing the normal dorsoventral appearance of the affected limbs.	在四肢早期发育过程中形成背腹模式发生缺陷或破坏造成的异常。背腹轴的正常发展的破坏可能导致不同表型异常，可能影响指甲和/或手掌、手和/或脚的背侧，最终导致受累肢体正常背腹侧外观的改变。
声音的异常	HP:0100271	Hyponasal speech	鼻音低	Hyponasal speech is when there is an abnormally reduced nasal airflow during speech often in a setting of nasal obstruction or congestion.	讲话时通过鼻腔的气流减弱，这种异常发音通常是由于各种原因所致的鼻腔梗塞，气流受阻。
头或颈部的异常	HP:0100272	Branchial sinus	鳃窦	A congenital branchial sinus is a remnant of the embryonic branchial arches and their intervening clefts and pouches that has failed to regress completely. Sinuses typically have their external orifice inferior to the ramus of the mandible. They may traverse the parotid gland, and run in close vicinity to the facial nerve in the external auditory canal.	先天性腮窦是胚胎鳃弓及其中间开裂和口袋未能完全消退的残余。窦外口一般有低于下颌骨升支。他们可能会穿遍腮腺，并在外耳道里紧挨面神经并行。
肿瘤;消化系统的异常	HP:0100273	Neoplasm of the colon	结肠肿瘤		
神经系统的异常;眼睛的异常	HP:0100274	Gustatory lacrimation	味觉流泪	Gustatory lacrimation results from an aberrant innervation of fibres from the seventh cranial nerve to the pterygopalatine ganglion which are destined originally for the submandibular ganglion. This aberrant innervation leads to uncontrollable tearing while eating or in anticipation of a meal.	味觉流泪源于纤维从第七对脑神经到它们原先使用颌下神经节翼腭神经节的异常神经支配。这种异常的神经支配导致无法控制性吃饭时流泪。
神经系统的异常	HP:0100275	Diffuse cerebellar atrophy	弥漫性小脑萎缩	Diffuse unlocalised atrophy affecting the cerebellum.	小脑弥漫非局灶性萎缩。
体壁的异常	HP:0100276	Skin pits	皮肤凹点		
头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0100277	Periauricular skin pits	耳周皮肤凹陷	Benign congenital lesions of the periauricular soft tissue consisting of a blind-ending narrow tube or pit.	耳周软组织的良性先天性病变，包括狭窄的盲管或凹陷。
免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0100279	Ulcerative colitis	溃疡性结肠炎	A chronic inflammatory bowel disease that includes characteristic ulcers, or open sores, in the colon. The main symptom of active disease is usually constant diarrhea mixed with blood, of gradual onset and intermittent periods of exacerbated symptoms contrasting with periods that are relatively symptom-free. In contrast to Crohn's disease this special form of colitis begins in the distal parts of the rectum, spreads continually upwards and affects only mucose and submucose tissue of the colon.	一种慢性炎症性肠病，包括结肠部位特征性的溃疡，或开放性溃疡。活动性疾病的主要症状通常包括带血的腹泻、渐进性发作、周期性、与无症状期相比症状逐渐加重。与克罗恩病相比，这种特殊形式的结肠炎始于直肠的远端，连续向上扩展且只影响结肠的粘膜组织和粘膜下层组织。
免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0100280	Crohn's disease	Crohn's 病	A chronic granulomatous inflammatory disease of the intestines that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms. It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea which may be bloody, vomiting, or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside of the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration. Crohn's disease is thought to be an autoimmune disease, in which the body's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract, causing inflammation.	肠道的一种慢性肉芽肿炎症疾病，可能影响从口到肛门的消化道的任何部分，引起多种症状。该病主要引起腹痛、腹泻（可能便血）、呕吐或体重减轻，但也可能引起肠道外的并发症，如皮疹、关节炎、眼部炎症、疲倦、注意力不集中。克罗恩病被认为是一种自身免疫性疾病，个体的免疫系统攻击胃肠道，引起炎症。
免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0100281	Chronic colitis	慢性结肠炎	A chronic inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).	大肠（结肠、盲肠和直肠）的一种慢性炎症性疾病。
免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常	HP:0100282	Acute colitis	急性结肠炎	An acute and self-limited inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).	大肠（包括结肠，盲肠和直肠）的一种急性和自限性的炎症性疾病。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100283	EMG: continuous motor unit activity at rest	EMG:在休息中持续的运动单位活动	Continuous electromyographic activity of motor units at rest, i.e., without voluntary movement of the muscles.	在休息中，运动单位持续的肌电活动，即没有肌肉的随意运动。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100284	EMG: myotonic discharges	肌电图:肌强直性放电	High frequency discharges in electromyography (EMG) that vary in amplitude and frequency, waxing and waning continuously with firing frequencies ranging from 150/second down to 20/second and producing a sound that has been referred to as a dive bomber sound.	肌电图出现不同振幅和频率的高频放电，发射频率波动于150/s至20/s，并会产生俯冲轰炸机样声音。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100285	EMG: impaired neuromuscular transmission	肌电图:神经肌肉接头传递受损	An electromyographic finding associated with erratic or absent neuromuscular transmission with erratic, moment-to-moment changes in the shape of the motor unit potential (MUP).	肌电图提示不稳定或无神经肌肉传递与不稳定的、时刻变化的运动单位电位（MUP）的形状相关联。
肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100287	EMG: slow motor conduction	肌电图:运动传导慢	The presence of reduced conduction velocity of motor nerves on electromyography.	肌电图提示运动神经上肌电传导速度减小。
神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100288	EMG: myokymic discharges	肌电图:肌纤维颤搐放电	The presence of spontaneous bursts of rapidly firing potentials that recur at regular intervals of 2-10 per second and are unaffected by voluntary effort. This is an electromyographic (EMG) finding.	自发出现以2-10次/秒的频率快速重复的电位发放，不受意识控制。这是一种肌电图（EMG）所见。
眼睛的异常	HP:0100289	Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials	图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常	Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials	图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常
神经系统的异常	HP:0100290	Abnormality of peripheral somatosensory evoked potentials	周围体感诱发电位异常		
神经系统的异常	HP:0100291	Abnormality of central somatosensory evoked potentials	异常的中枢体感诱发电位		
神经系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常	HP:0100292	Amyloidosis of peripheral nerves	外周神经的淀粉样变性病	The presence of `amyloid deposition` (MPATH:34) in the nerves of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903).	周围神经系统（FMA:9903）出现`淀粉样蛋白沉积`（mpath:34）。

肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100301	Muscle fiber tubular inclusions	肌纤维管状包涵体	Unusual regions of densely packed membranous tubules known as tubular aggregates which present as membranous inclusions, derived from membranes of sarcoplasmic reticulum and mitochondria, containing miscellaneous proteins with a variety of enzymatic activities.	为紧密包裹的膜性管状区域，表现为膜性包涵体的管状聚集。这些膜性包涵体来源于肌浆网和线粒体膜，含有多种具有酶活性的蛋白。

肌肉组织的异常	HP:0100305	Ring fibers	肌纤维环化	Ring fibers are formed by a bundle of peripheral myofibrils which are circumferentially oriented such that they encircle the internal portion of the sarcoplasm which is normal in structure and orientation.	肌纤维环化由外周的肌原纤维圆周方向取向，使得它们包围内部有正常结构与方向的肌质。

This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	不均匀增加第四脚趾的近端指骨骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

The normal squamous epithelium lining of the esophagus is replaced by metaplastic columnar epithelium. Columnar epithelium refers to a cell type that is typically found in more distal parts of the gastrointestinal system.	食管下部细胞的一种异常改变（组织转化）。食管的正常鳞状上皮层被化生的柱状上皮层取代。柱状上皮是指一种通常被发现于胃肠系统更远端部分细胞类型。

消化系统的异常	HP:0100594	Esophageal web	食管蹼	Thin (2-3mm) membranes of normal esophageal tissue consisting of mucosa and submucosa that can be congenital or acquired. Congenital webs commonly appear in the middle and inferior third of the esophagus, and they are more likely to be circumferential with a central or eccentric orifice. Acquired webs are much more common than congenital webs and typically appear in the cervical area (postcricoid). Clinical symptoms of this condition are selective (solid more than liquids) dysphagia, thoracic pain, nasopharyngeal reflux, aspiration, perforation and food impaction (the last two are very rare).	先天的或获得性的由粘膜和粘膜下层组成的正常食管组织的薄的（2-3mm）膜。先天的蹼通常出现在食管中部和下三分之一处，它们更可能是一个中心或偏心孔的圆周。获得性的蹼较先天蹼更为常见，通常出现在颈部区域（环状软骨后）。这种情况的临床症状包括选择性的（固体多于液体）吞咽困难、胸痛、鼻咽返流、误吸、穿孔和食物嵌塞（最后两个非常罕见）。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0100595	Camptocormia	驼背	An abnormal forward-flexed posture e.g. forward flexion of the spine, which is noticeable when standing or walking but disappears when lying down. It is becoming an increasingly recognized feature of Parkinson's disease and dystonic disorders.	不正常的向前弯曲的姿势如脊椎，站立或行走时明显，但平躺时前倾前屈位消失。它逐渐成为确认帕金森氏病和肌张力障碍性疾病的特征。

内分泌系统的异常	HP:0100647	Graves disease	Graves病	An autoimmune disease where the thyroid is overactive, producing an excessive amount of thyroid hormones (a serious metabolic imbalance known as hyperthyroidism and thyrotoxicosis). This is caused by autoantibodies to the TSH-receptor (TSHR-Ab) that activate that TSH-receptor (TSHR), thereby stimulating thyroid hormone synthesis and secretion, and thyroid growth (causing a diffusely enlarged goiter). The resulting state of hyperthyroidism can cause a dramatic constellation of neuropsychological and physical signs and symptoms, which can severely compromise the patients.	一种自身免疫性疾病，其中甲状腺过度活跃，产生过量的甲状腺激素（导致严重代谢失衡称为甲状腺功能亢进和甲状腺毒症）。这是由于抗TSH受体的自身抗体激活TSH受体（TSHR），从而刺激甲状腺激素合成和分泌，以及甲状腺生长（导致弥漫性甲状腺肿）引起的。甲状腺功能亢进症可引起神经心理和生理症状和体征，会严重影响患者健康。

The swelling can also occur elsewhere, typically in the hands. Angioedema is similar to urticaria, but the swelling is subcutaneous rather than on the epidermis.	面部皮肤的真皮、皮下组织、粘膜和粘膜下组织的迅速肿胀（水肿），通常在几分钟到几个小时即可涉及口周、口腔和/或喉的粘膜以及舌头。肿胀也可能发生在其他地方，典型的是手部。血管性水肿类似于荨麻疹，但肿胀部位主要在皮下组织而非表皮。

It is characterized by early hematogenous spread to the lungs and belongs to the far end of the spectrum of gestational trophoblastic disease (GTD), a subset of germ cell tumors.	源自胎盘细胞的恶性侵润性滋养细胞癌。它的特点是早期血行播散到肺，属于妊娠滋养细胞疾病谱（GTD）的一种罕见类型，GTS是生殖细胞肿瘤的一个子集。

结缔组织的异常;肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常	HP:0100881	Congenital mesoblastic nephroma	先天性中胚层肾瘤	Congenital mesoblastic nephroma is a type of kidney tumor that is usually found before birth by ultrasound or within the first 3 months of life. It contains fibroblastic cells (connective tissue cells), and may spread to the other kidney or to nearby tissue.	先天性中胚层肾瘤是一种肾脏肿瘤亚型，通常在出生前或出生后三个月内通过超声发现。它包含成纤维细胞（结缔组织细胞），并可以扩散到另一侧肾脏或附近组织。
肿瘤	HP:0100882	Fibrous hamartoma	纤维错构瘤	A rare, benign soft tissue tumor that typically occurs within the first two years of life.	一种罕见的，良性的软组织肿瘤，通常发生在出生后两年内。
胎儿发育或出生异常;肿瘤	HP:0100883	Chorangioma	绒膜血管瘤	Hamartoma-like growth in the placenta consisting of blood vessels.	在胎盘中呈错构瘤样生长，由血管组成。
骨骼系统的异常	HP:0100884	Compensatory scoliosis	代偿性脊柱侧凸	A scoliosis which is the results of a difference in leg length (which might be due to hemihypertrophy or hemihypotrophy of a leg) and the resulting tilting of the pelvis. If untreated this will lead to the development of scoliosis over time.	甲侧凸这是腿的长度的差（这可能是由于偏身肥大或腿的hemihypotrophy），并将所得的骨盆的倾斜的结果。如果不治疗，这将导致脊柱侧弯的发展随着时间的推移。
心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常	HP:0100885	Lateral venous anomaly	外侧静脉异常	Persistence of the embryonic dorsal or sciatic vein system that normally should have involuted around the tenth to twelfth week of intrauterine life.	胚胎脊部或坐骨静脉系统持久性存在，正常情况下应该在胚胎发育第十周至第十二周退化。
